<encodingdesc>
<projectdesc>
This version of the bible is encoded conformant to level 1 specifications of the Corpus Encoding Standard. The English is to serve as the base for the parallel corpus, which will include aligned versions of the text in different languages.
</projectdesc>
<editorialdecl>
<conformance level="1">Corpus Encoding Standard, Version 2.0</conformance>
<correction status=medium method=silent>
</correction>
<segmentation>
Marked up to the level of chapter and verse.
</segmentation>
</editorialdecl>
</encodingdesc>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.3" type=verse>ioudav de egennhsen ton farev kai ton zara ek thv yamar farev de egennhsen ton esrwm esrwm de egennhsen ton aram
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.4" type=verse>aram de egennhsen ton aminadab aminadab de egennhsen ton naasswn naasswn de egennhsen ton salmwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.5" type=verse>salmwn de egennhsen ton booz ek thv racab booz de egennhsen ton wbhd ek thv rouy wbhd de egennhsen ton iessai
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.6" type=verse>iessai de egennhsen ton dabid ton basilea dabid de o basileuv egennhsen ton solomwnta ek thv tou ouriou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.7" type=verse>solomwn de egennhsen ton roboam roboam de egennhsen ton abia abia de egennhsen ton asa
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.8" type=verse>asa de egennhsen ton iwsafat iwsafat de egennhsen ton iwram iwram de egennhsen ton ozian
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.10" type=verse>ezekiav de egennhsen ton manassh manasshv de egennhsen ton amwn amwn de egennhsen ton iwsian
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.11" type=verse>iwsiav de egennhsen ton ieconian kai touv adelfouv autou epi thv metoikesiav babulwnov
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.12" type=verse>meta de thn metoikesian babulwnov ieconiav egennhsen ton salayihl salayihl de egennhsen ton zorobabel
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.13" type=verse>zorobabel de egennhsen ton abioud abioud de egennhsen ton eliakeim eliakeim de egennhsen ton azwr
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.14" type=verse>azwr de egennhsen ton sadwk sadwk de egennhsen ton aceim aceim de egennhsen ton elioud
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.15" type=verse>elioud de egennhsen ton eleazar eleazar de egennhsen ton matyan matyan de egennhsen ton iakwb
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.16" type=verse>iakwb de egennhsen ton iwshf ton andra mariav ex hv egennhyh ihsouv o legomenov cristov
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.17" type=verse>pasai oun ai geneai apo abraam ewv dabid geneai dekatessarev kai apo dabid ewv thv metoikesiav babulwnov geneai dekatessarev kai apo thv metoikesiav babulwnov ewv tou cristou geneai dekatessarev
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.18" type=verse>tou de ihsou cristou h gennhsiv outwv hn mnhsteuyeishv gar thv mhtrov autou mariav tw iwshf prin h sunelyein autouv eureyh en gastri ecousa ek pneumatov agiou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.19" type=verse>iwshf de o anhr authv dikaiov wn kai mh yelwn authn paradeigmatisai eboulhyh layra apolusai authn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.20" type=verse>tauta de autou enyumhyentov idou aggelov kuriou kat onar efanh autw legwn iwshf uiov dabid mh fobhyhv paralabein mariam thn gunaika sou to gar en auth gennhyen ek pneumatov estin agiou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.21" type=verse>texetai de uion kai kaleseiv to onoma autou ihsoun autov gar swsei ton laon autou apo twn amartiwn autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.22" type=verse>touto de olon gegonen ina plhrwyh to rhyen upo tou kuriou dia tou profhtou legontov
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.23" type=verse>idou h paryenov en gastri exei kai texetai uion kai kalesousin to onoma autou emmanouhl o estin meyermhneuomenon mey hmwn o yeov
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.24" type=verse>diegeryeiv de o iwshf apo tou upnou epoihsen wv prosetaxen autw o aggelov kuriou kai parelaben thn gunaika autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.1.25" type=verse>kai ouk eginwsken authn ewv ou eteken ton uion authv ton prwtotokon kai ekalesen to onoma autou ihsoun
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.MAT.2" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.1" type=verse>tou de ihsou gennhyentov en bhyleem thv ioudaiav en hmeraiv hrwdou tou basilewv idou magoi apo anatolwn paregenonto eiv ierosoluma
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.2" type=verse>legontev pou estin o tecyeiv basileuv twn ioudaiwn eidomen gar autou ton astera en th anatolh kai hlyomen proskunhsai autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.3" type=verse>akousav de hrwdhv o basileuv etaracyh kai pasa ierosoluma met autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.4" type=verse>kai sunagagwn pantav touv arciereiv kai grammateiv tou laou epunyaneto par autwn pou o cristov gennatai
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.5" type=verse>oi de eipon autw en bhyleem thv ioudaiav outwv gar gegraptai dia tou profhtou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.6" type=verse>kai su bhyleem gh iouda oudamwv elacisth ei en toiv hgemosin iouda ek sou gar exeleusetai hgoumenov ostiv poimanei ton laon mou ton israhl
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.7" type=verse>tote hrwdhv layra kalesav touv magouv hkribwsen par autwn ton cronon tou fainomenou asterov
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.8" type=verse>kai pemqav autouv eiv bhyleem eipen poreuyentev akribwv exetasate peri tou paidiou epan de eurhte apaggeilate moi opwv kagw elywn proskunhsw autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.9" type=verse>oi de akousantev tou basilewv eporeuyhsan kai idou o asthr on eidon en th anatolh prohgen autouv ewv elywn esth epanw ou hn to paidion
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.10" type=verse>idontev de ton astera ecarhsan caran megalhn sfodra
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.11" type=verse>kai elyontev eiv thn oikian euron to paidion meta mariav thv mhtrov autou kai pesontev prosekunhsan autw kai anoixantev touv yhsaurouv autwn proshnegkan autw dwra cruson kai libanon kai smurnan
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.12" type=verse>kai crhmatisyentev kat onar mh anakamqai prov hrwdhn di allhv odou anecwrhsan eiv thn cwran autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.13" type=verse>anacwrhsantwn de autwn idou aggelov kuriou fainetai kat onar tw iwshf legwn egeryeiv paralabe to paidion kai thn mhtera autou kai feuge eiv aigupton kai isyi ekei ewv an eipw soi mellei gar hrwdhv zhtein to paidion tou apolesai auto
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.14" type=verse>o de egeryeiv parelaben to paidion kai thn mhtera autou nuktov kai anecwrhsen eiv aigupton
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.15" type=verse>kai hn ekei ewv thv teleuthv hrwdou ina plhrwyh to rhyen upo tou kuriou dia tou profhtou legontov ex aiguptou ekalesa ton uion mou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.16" type=verse>tote hrwdhv idwn oti enepaicyh upo twn magwn eyumwyh lian kai aposteilav aneilen pantav touv paidav touv en bhyleem kai en pasin toiv orioiv authv apo dietouv kai katwterw kata ton cronon on hkribwsen para twn magwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.17" type=verse>tote eplhrwyh to rhyen upo ieremiou tou profhtou legontov
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.18" type=verse>fwnh en rama hkousyh yrhnov kai klauymov kai odurmov poluv rachl klaiousa ta tekna authv kai ouk hyelen paraklhyhnai oti ouk eisin
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.19" type=verse>teleuthsantov de tou hrwdou idou aggelov kuriou kat onar fainetai tw iwshf en aiguptw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.20" type=verse>legwn egeryeiv paralabe to paidion kai thn mhtera autou kai poreuou eiv ghn israhl teynhkasin gar oi zhtountev thn quchn tou paidiou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.21" type=verse>o de egeryeiv parelaben to paidion kai thn mhtera autou kai hlyen eiv ghn israhl
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.22" type=verse>akousav de oti arcelaov basileuei epi thv ioudaiav anti hrwdou tou patrov autou efobhyh ekei apelyein crhmatisyeiv de kat onar anecwrhsen eiv ta merh thv galilaiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.2.23" type=verse>kai elywn katwkhsen eiv polin legomenhn nazaret opwv plhrwyh to rhyen dia twn profhtwn oti nazwraiov klhyhsetai
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.MAT.3" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.1" type=verse>en de taiv hmeraiv ekeinaiv paraginetai iwannhv o baptisthv khrusswn en th erhmw thv ioudaiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.2" type=verse>kai legwn metanoeite hggiken gar h basileia twn ouranwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.3" type=verse>outov gar estin o rhyeiv upo hsaiou tou profhtou legontov fwnh bowntov en th erhmw etoimasate thn odon kuriou euyeiav poieite tav tribouv autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.4" type=verse>autov de o iwannhv eicen to enduma autou apo tricwn kamhlou kai zwnhn dermatinhn peri thn osfun autou h de trofh autou hn akridev kai meli agrion
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.5" type=verse>tote exeporeueto prov auton ierosoluma kai pasa h ioudaia kai pasa h pericwrov tou iordanou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.6" type=verse>kai ebaptizonto en tw iordanh up autou exomologoumenoi tav amartiav autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.7" type=verse>idwn de pollouv twn farisaiwn kai saddoukaiwn ercomenouv epi to baptisma autou eipen autoiv gennhmata ecidnwn tiv upedeixen umin fugein apo thv melloushv orghv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.8" type=verse>poihsate oun karpouv axiouv thv metanoiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.9" type=verse>kai mh doxhte legein en eautoiv patera ecomen ton abraam legw gar umin oti dunatai o yeov ek twn liywn toutwn egeirai tekna tw abraam
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.10" type=verse>hdh de kai h axinh prov thn rizan twn dendrwn keitai pan oun dendron mh poioun karpon kalon ekkoptetai kai eiv pur balletai
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.11" type=verse>egw men baptizw umav en udati eiv metanoian o de opisw mou ercomenov iscuroterov mou estin ou ouk eimi ikanov ta upodhmata bastasai autov umav baptisei en pneumati agiw kai puri
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.12" type=verse>ou to ptuon en th ceiri autou kai diakayariei thn alwna autou kai sunaxei ton siton autou eiv thn apoyhkhn to de acuron katakausei puri asbestw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.13" type=verse>tote paraginetai o ihsouv apo thv galilaiav epi ton iordanhn prov ton iwannhn tou baptisyhnai up autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.14" type=verse>o de iwannhv diekwluen auton legwn egw creian ecw upo sou baptisyhnai kai su erch prov me
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.15" type=verse>apokriyeiv de o ihsouv eipen prov auton afev arti outwv gar prepon estin hmin plhrwsai pasan dikaiosunhn tote afihsin auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.16" type=verse>kai baptisyeiv o ihsouv anebh euyuv apo tou udatov kai idou anewcyhsan autw oi ouranoi kai eiden to pneuma tou yeou katabainon wsei peristeran kai ercomenon ep auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.3.17" type=verse>kai idou fwnh ek twn ouranwn legousa outov estin o uiov mou o agaphtov en w eudokhsa
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.MAT.4" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.MAT.4.9" type=verse>kai legei autw tauta panta soi dwsw ean peswn proskunhshv moi

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.11" type=verse>tote afihsin auton o diabolov kai idou aggeloi proshlyon kai dihkonoun autw

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.14" type=verse>ina plhrwyh to rhyen dia hsaiou tou profhtou legontov
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.15" type=verse>gh zaboulwn kai gh nefyaleim odon yalasshv peran tou iordanou galilaia twn eynwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.16" type=verse>o laov o kayhmenov en skotei eide fwv mega kai toiv kayhmenoiv en cwra kai skia yanatou fwv aneteilen autoiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.17" type=verse>apo tote hrxato o ihsouv khrussein kai legein metanoeite hggiken gar h basileia twn ouranwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.18" type=verse>peripatwn de o ihsouv para thn yalassan thv galilaiav eiden duo adelfouv simwna ton legomenon petron kai andrean ton adelfon autou ballontav amfiblhstron eiv thn yalassan hsan gar alieiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.19" type=verse>kai legei autoiv deute opisw mou kai poihsw umav alieiv anyrwpwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.20" type=verse>oi de euyewv afentev ta diktua hkolouyhsan autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.21" type=verse>kai probav ekeiyen eiden allouv duo adelfouv iakwbon ton tou zebedaiou kai iwannhn ton adelfon autou en tw ploiw meta zebedaiou tou patrov autwn katartizontav ta diktua autwn kai ekalesen autouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.22" type=verse>oi de euyewv afentev to ploion kai ton patera autwn hkolouyhsan autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.23" type=verse>kai perihgen olhn thn galilaian o ihsouv didaskwn en taiv sunagwgaiv autwn kai khrusswn to euaggelion thv basileiav kai yerapeuwn pasan noson kai pasan malakian en tw law
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.24" type=verse>kai aphlyen h akoh autou eiv olhn thn surian kai proshnegkan autw pantav touv kakwv econtav poikilaiv nosoiv kai basanoiv sunecomenouv kai daimonizomenouv kai selhniazomenouv kai paralutikouv kai eyerapeusen autouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.4.25" type=verse>kai hkolouyhsan autw ocloi polloi apo thv galilaiav kai dekapolewv kai ierosolumwn kai ioudaiav kai peran tou iordanou
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.MAT.5" type=chapter>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.12" type=verse>cairete kai agalliasye oti o misyov umwn poluv en toiv ouranoiv outwv gar ediwxan touv profhtav touv pro umwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.13" type=verse>umeiv este to alav thv ghv ean de to alav mwranyh en tini alisyhsetai eiv ouden iscuei eti ei mh blhyhnai exw kai katapateisyai upo twn anyrwpwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.14" type=verse>umeiv este to fwv tou kosmou ou dunatai poliv krubhnai epanw orouv keimenh
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.15" type=verse>oude kaiousin lucnon kai tiyeasin auton upo ton modion all epi thn lucnian kai lampei pasin toiv en th oikia
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.16" type=verse>outwv lamqatw to fwv umwn emprosyen twn anyrwpwn opwv idwsin umwn ta kala erga kai doxaswsin ton patera umwn ton en toiv ouranoiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.17" type=verse>mh nomishte oti hlyon katalusai ton nomon h touv profhtav ouk hlyon katalusai alla plhrwsai
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.18" type=verse>amhn gar legw umin ewv an parelyh o ouranov kai h gh iwta en h mia keraia ou mh parelyh apo tou nomou ewv an panta genhtai
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.19" type=verse>ov ean oun lush mian twn entolwn toutwn twn elacistwn kai didaxh outwv touv anyrwpouv elacistov klhyhsetai en th basileia twn ouranwn ov d an poihsh kai didaxh outov megav klhyhsetai en th basileia twn ouranwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.20" type=verse>legw gar umin oti ean mh perisseush h dikaiosunh umwn pleion twn grammatewn kai farisaiwn ou mh eiselyhte eiv thn basileian twn ouranwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.21" type=verse>hkousate oti erreyh toiv arcaioiv ou foneuseiv ov d an foneush enocov estai th krisei
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.22" type=verse>egw de legw umin oti pav o orgizomenov tw adelfw autou eikh enocov estai th krisei ov d an eiph tw adelfw autou raka enocov estai tw sunedriw ov d an eiph mwre enocov estai eiv thn geennan tou purov
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.23" type=verse>ean oun prosferhv to dwron sou epi to yusiasthrion kakei mnhsyhv oti o adelfov sou ecei ti kata sou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.24" type=verse>afev ekei to dwron sou emprosyen tou yusiasthriou kai upage prwton diallaghyi tw adelfw sou kai tote elywn prosfere to dwron sou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.25" type=verse>isyi eunown tw antidikw sou tacu ewv otou ei en th odw met autou mhpote se paradw o antidikov tw krith kai o krithv se paradw tw uphreth kai eiv fulakhn blhyhsh
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.29" type=verse>ei de o ofyalmov sou o dexiov skandalizei se exele auton kai bale apo sou sumferei gar soi ina apolhtai en twn melwn sou kai mh olon to swma sou blhyh eiv geennan
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.30" type=verse>kai ei h dexia sou ceir skandalizei se ekkoqon authn kai bale apo sou sumferei gar soi ina apolhtai en twn melwn sou kai mh olon to swma sou blhyh eiv geennan
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.32" type=verse>egw de legw umin oti ov an apolush thn gunaika autou parektov logou porneiav poiei authn moicasyai kai ov ean apolelumenhn gamhsh moicatai
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.33" type=verse>palin hkousate oti erreyh toiv arcaioiv ouk epiorkhseiv apodwseiv de tw kuriw touv orkouv sou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.34" type=verse>egw de legw umin mh omosai olwv mhte en tw ouranw oti yronov estin tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.35" type=verse>mhte en th gh oti upopodion estin twn podwn autou mhte eiv ierosoluma oti poliv estin tou megalou basilewv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.36" type=verse>mhte en th kefalh sou omoshv oti ou dunasai mian trica leukhn h melainan poihsai
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.37" type=verse>estw de o logov umwn nai nai ou ou to de perisson toutwn ek tou ponhrou estin
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.39" type=verse>egw de legw umin mh antisthnai tw ponhrw all ostiv se rapisei epi thn dexian sou siagona streqon autw kai thn allhn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.40" type=verse>kai tw yelonti soi kriyhnai kai ton citwna sou labein afev autw kai to imation
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.41" type=verse>kai ostiv se aggareusei milion en upage met autou duo
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.42" type=verse>tw aitounti se didou kai ton yelonta apo sou daneisasyai mh apostrafhv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.43" type=verse>hkousate oti erreyh agaphseiv ton plhsion sou kai mishseiv ton ecyron sou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.5.44" type=verse>egw de legw umin agapate touv ecyrouv umwn eulogeite touv katarwmenouv umav kalwv poieite touv misountav umav kai proseucesye uper twn ephreazontwn umav kai diwkontwn umav

<div id="b.MAT.6" type=chapter>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.6.2" type=verse>otan oun poihv elehmosunhn mh salpishv emprosyen sou wsper oi upokritai poiousin en taiv sunagwgaiv kai en taiv rumaiv opwv doxasywsin upo twn anyrwpwn amhn legw umin apecousin ton misyon autwn

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.10" type=verse>kai idou anyrwpov hn thn ceira ecwn xhran kai ephrwthsan auton legontev ei exestin toiv sabbasin yerapeuein ina kathgorhswsin autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.11" type=verse>o de eipen autoiv tiv estai ex umwn anyrwpov ov exei probaton en kai ean empesh touto toiv sabbasin eiv boyunon ouci krathsei auto kai egerei
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.14" type=verse>oi de farisaioi sumboulion elabon kat autou exelyontev opwv auton apoleswsin
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.15" type=verse>o de ihsouv gnouv anecwrhsen ekeiyen kai hkolouyhsan autw ocloi polloi kai eyerapeusen autouv pantav

<seg id="b.MAT.12.16" type=verse>kai epetimhsen autoiv ina mh faneron auton poihswsin

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.18" type=verse>idou o paiv mou on hretisa o agaphtov mou eiv on eudokhsen h quch mou yhsw to pneuma mou ep auton kai krisin toiv eynesin apaggelei

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.22" type=verse>tote proshnecyh autw daimonizomenov tuflov kai kwfov kai eyerapeusen auton wste ton tuflon kai kwfon kai lalein kai blepein
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.23" type=verse>kai existanto pantev oi ocloi kai elegon mhti outov estin o uiov dabid
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.25" type=verse>eidwv de o ihsouv tav enyumhseiv autwn eipen autoiv pasa basileia merisyeisa kay eauthv erhmoutai kai pasa poliv h oikia merisyeisa kay eauthv ou stayhsetai

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.30" type=verse>o mh wn met emou kat emou estin kai o mh sunagwn met emou skorpizei
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.31" type=verse>dia touto legw umin pasa amartia kai blasfhmia afeyhsetai toiv anyrwpoiv h de tou pneumatov blasfhmia ouk afeyhsetai toiv anyrwpoiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.32" type=verse>kai ov an eiph logon kata tou uiou tou anyrwpou afeyhsetai autw ov d an eiph kata tou pneumatov tou agiou ouk afeyhsetai autw oute en toutw tw aiwni oute en tw mellonti

<seg id="b.MAT.12.33" type=verse>h poihsate to dendron kalon kai ton karpon autou kalon h poihsate to dendron sapron kai ton karpon autou sapron ek gar tou karpou to dendron ginwsketai
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.35" type=verse>o agayov anyrwpov ek tou agayou yhsaurou thv kardiav ekballei ta agaya kai o ponhrov anyrwpov ek tou ponhrou yhsaurou ekballei ponhra
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.39" type=verse>o de apokriyeiv eipen autoiv genea ponhra kai moicaliv shmeion epizhtei kai shmeion ou doyhsetai auth ei mh to shmeion iwna tou profhtou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.40" type=verse>wsper gar hn iwnav en th koilia tou khtouv treiv hmerav kai treiv nuktav outwv estai o uiov tou anyrwpou en th kardia thv ghv treiv hmerav kai treiv nuktav
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.41" type=verse>andrev nineuitai anasthsontai en th krisei meta thv geneav tauthv kai katakrinousin authn oti metenohsan eiv to khrugma iwna kai idou pleion iwna wde
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.42" type=verse>basilissa notou egeryhsetai en th krisei meta thv geneav tauthv kai katakrinei authn oti hlyen ek twn peratwn thv ghv akousai thn sofian solomwntov kai idou pleion solomwntov wde
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.44" type=verse>tote legei epistreqw eiv ton oikon mou oyen exhlyon kai elyon euriskei scolazonta sesarwmenon kai kekosmhmenon
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.12.45" type=verse>tote poreuetai kai paralambanei mey eautou epta etera pneumata ponhrotera eautou kai eiselyonta katoikei ekei kai ginetai ta escata tou anyrwpou ekeinou ceirona twn prwtwn outwv estai kai th genea tauth th ponhra
</seg>

<div id="b.MAT.13" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.MAT.13.14" type=verse>kai anaplhroutai ep autoiv h profhteia hsaiou h legousa akoh akousete kai ou mh sunhte kai blepontev bleqete kai ou mh idhte

<seg id="b.MAT.13.15" type=verse>epacunyh gar h kardia tou laou toutou kai toiv wsin barewv hkousan kai touv ofyalmouv autwn ekammusan mhpote idwsin toiv ofyalmoiv kai toiv wsin akouswsin kai th kardia sunwsin kai epistreqwsin kai iaswmai autouv

<div id="b.MAT.14" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.MAT.14.13" type=verse>kai akousav o ihsouv anecwrhsen ekeiyen en ploiw eiv erhmon topon kat idian kai akousantev oi ocloi hkolouyhsan autw pezh apo twn polewn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.14.14" type=verse>kai exelywn o ihsouv eiden polun oclon kai esplagcnisyh ep autouv kai eyerapeusen touv arrwstouv autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.14.15" type=verse>oqiav de genomenhv proshlyon autw oi mayhtai autou legontev erhmov estin o topov kai h wra hdh parhlyen apoluson touv oclouv ina apelyontev eiv tav kwmav agoraswsin eautoiv brwmata
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.14.16" type=verse>o de ihsouv eipen autoiv ou creian ecousin apelyein dote autoiv umeiv fagein
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.14.17" type=verse>oi de legousin autw ouk ecomen wde ei mh pente artouv kai duo icyuav
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.14.18" type=verse>o de eipen ferete moi autouv wde
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.14.19" type=verse>kai keleusav touv oclouv anakliyhnai epi touv cortouv kai labwn touv pente artouv kai touv duo icyuav anableqav eiv ton ouranon euloghsen kai klasav edwken toiv mayhtaiv touv artouv oi de mayhtai toiv ocloiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.14.20" type=verse>kai efagon pantev kai ecortasyhsan kai hran to perisseuon twn klasmatwn dwdeka kofinouv plhreiv
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.14.26" type=verse>kai idontev auton oi mayhtai epi thn yalassan peripatounta etaracyhsan legontev oti fantasma estin kai apo tou fobou ekraxan

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<div id="b.MAT.18" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.MAT.18.1" type=verse>en ekeinh th wra proshlyon oi mayhtai tw ihsou legontev tiv ara meizwn estin en th basileia twn ouranwn

<seg id="b.MAT.18.2" type=verse>kai proskalesamenov o ihsouv paidion esthsen auto en mesw autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.18.3" type=verse>kai eipen amhn legw umin ean mh strafhte kai genhsye wv ta paidia ou mh eiselyhte eiv thn basileian twn ouranwn

</seg>

<seg id="b.MAT.18.6" type=verse>ov d an skandalish ena twn mikrwn toutwn twn pisteuontwn eiv eme sumferei autw ina kremasyh mulov onikov epi ton trachlon autou kai katapontisyh en tw pelagei thv yalasshv

<seg id="b.MAT.18.7" type=verse>ouai tw kosmw apo twn skandalwn anagkh gar estin elyein ta skandala plhn ouai tw anyrwpw ekeinw di ou to skandalon ercetai

<seg id="b.MAT.18.8" type=verse>ei de h ceir sou h o pouv sou skandalizei se ekkoqon auta kai bale apo sou kalon soi estin eiselyein eiv thn zwhn cwlon h kullon h duo ceirav h duo podav econta blhyhnai eiv to pur to aiwnion
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.18.9" type=verse>kai ei o ofyalmov sou skandalizei se exele auton kai bale apo sou kalon soi estin monofyalmon eiv thn zwhn eiselyein h duo ofyalmouv econta blhyhnai eiv thn geennan tou purov
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.18.10" type=verse>orate mh katafronhshte enov twn mikrwn toutwn legw gar umin oti oi aggeloi autwn en ouranoiv dia pantov blepousin to proswpon tou patrov mou tou en ouranoiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.18.11" type=verse>hlyen gar o uiov tou anyrwpou swsai to apolwlov
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.18.13" type=verse>kai ean genhtai eurein auto amhn legw umin oti cairei ep autw mallon h epi toiv ennenhkontaennea toiv mh peplanhmenoiv

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.18.18" type=verse>amhn legw umin osa ean dhshte epi thv ghv estai dedemena en tw ouranw kai osa ean lushte epi thv ghv estai lelumena en tw ouranw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.18.19" type=verse>palin legw umin oti ean duo umwn sumfwnhswsin epi thv ghv peri pantov pragmatov ou ean aithswntai genhsetai autoiv para tou patrov mou tou en ouranoiv

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.18.32" type=verse>tote proskalesamenov auton o kuriov autou legei autw doule ponhre pasan thn ofeilhn ekeinhn afhka soi epei parekalesav me

</seg>

</seg>

<seg id="b.MAT.21.31" type=verse>tiv ek twn duo epoihsen to yelhma tou patrov legousin autw o prwtov legei autoiv o ihsouv amhn legw umin oti oi telwnai kai ai pornai proagousin umav eiv thn basileian tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.32" type=verse>hlyen gar prov umav iwannhv en odw dikaiosunhv kai ouk episteusate autw oi de telwnai kai ai pornai episteusan autw umeiv de idontev ou metemelhyhte usteron tou pisteusai autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.33" type=verse>allhn parabolhn akousate anyrwpov tiv hn oikodespothv ostiv efuteusen ampelwna kai fragmon autw perieyhken kai wruxen en autw lhnon kai wkodomhsen purgon kai exedoto auton gewrgoiv kai apedhmhsen
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.34" type=verse>ote de hggisen o kairov twn karpwn apesteilen touv doulouv autou prov touv gewrgouv labein touv karpouv autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.35" type=verse>kai labontev oi gewrgoi touv doulouv autou on men edeiran on de apekteinan on de eliyobolhsan
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.36" type=verse>palin apesteilen allouv doulouv pleionav twn prwtwn kai epoihsan autoiv wsautwv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.37" type=verse>usteron de apesteilen prov autouv ton uion autou legwn entraphsontai ton uion mou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.38" type=verse>oi de gewrgoi idontev ton uion eipon en eautoiv outov estin o klhronomov deute apokteinwmen auton kai katascwmen thn klhronomian autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.39" type=verse>kai labontev auton exebalon exw tou ampelwnov kai apekteinan
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.40" type=verse>otan oun elyh o kuriov tou ampelwnov ti poihsei toiv gewrgoiv ekeinoiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.41" type=verse>legousin autw kakouv kakwv apolesei autouv kai ton ampelwna ekdosetai alloiv gewrgoiv oitinev apodwsousin autw touv karpouv en toiv kairoiv autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.42" type=verse>legei autoiv o ihsouv oudepote anegnwte en taiv grafaiv liyon on apedokimasan oi oikodomountev outov egenhyh eiv kefalhn gwniav para kuriou egeneto auth kai estin yaumasth en ofyalmoiv hmwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.43" type=verse>dia touto legw umin oti aryhsetai af umwn h basileia tou yeou kai doyhsetai eynei poiounti touv karpouv authv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.44" type=verse>kai o peswn epi ton liyon touton sunylasyhsetai ef on d an pesh likmhsei auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.45" type=verse>kai akousantev oi arciereiv kai oi farisaioi tav parabolav autou egnwsan oti peri autwn legei
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.21.46" type=verse>kai zhtountev auton krathsai efobhyhsan touv oclouv epeidh wv profhthn auton eicon
</seg>
</div>

</seg>

<seg id="b.MAT.24.32" type=verse>apo de thv sukhv mayete thn parabolhn otan hdh o kladov authv genhtai apalov kai ta fulla ekfuh ginwskete oti egguv to yerov

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAT.26.64" type=verse>legei autw o ihsouv su eipav plhn legw umin ap arti oqesye ton uion tou anyrwpou kayhmenon ek dexiwn thv dunamewv kai ercomenon epi twn nefelwn tou ouranou

<seg id="b.MAR.1.27" type=verse>kai eyambhyhsan pantev wste suzhtein prov autouv legontav ti estin touto tiv h didach h kainh auth oti kat exousian kai toiv pneumasin toiv akayartoiv epitassei kai upakouousin autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.28" type=verse>exhlyen de h akoh autou euyuv eiv olhn thn pericwron thv galilaiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.29" type=verse>kai euyewv ek thv sunagwghv exelyontev hlyon eiv thn oikian simwnov kai andreou meta iakwbou kai iwannou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.30" type=verse>h de penyera simwnov katekeito puressousa kai euyewv legousin autw peri authv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.31" type=verse>kai proselywn hgeiren authn krathsav thv ceirov authv kai afhken authn o puretov euyewv kai dihkonei autoiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.32" type=verse>oqiav de genomenhv ote edu o hliov eferon prov auton pantav touv kakwv econtav kai touv daimonizomenouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.33" type=verse>kai h poliv olh episunhgmenh hn prov thn yuran
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.34" type=verse>kai eyerapeusen pollouv kakwv econtav poikilaiv nosoiv kai daimonia polla exebalen kai ouk hfien lalein ta daimonia oti hdeisan auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.35" type=verse>kai prwi ennucon lian anastav exhlyen kai aphlyen eiv erhmon topon kakei proshuceto
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.36" type=verse>kai katediwxan auton o simwn kai oi met autou
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.38" type=verse>kai legei autoiv agwmen eiv tav ecomenav kwmopoleiv ina kakei khruxw eiv touto gar exelhluya
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.39" type=verse>kai hn khrusswn en taiv sunagwgaiv autwn eiv olhn thn galilaian kai ta daimonia ekballwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.40" type=verse>kai ercetai prov auton leprov parakalwn auton kai gonupetwn auton kai legwn autw oti ean yelhv dunasai me kayarisai
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.42" type=verse>kai eipontov autou euyewv aphlyen ap autou h lepra kai ekayarisyh
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.43" type=verse>kai embrimhsamenov autw euyewv exebalen auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.44" type=verse>kai legei autw ora mhdeni mhden eiphv all upage seauton deixon tw ierei kai prosenegke peri tou kayarismou sou a prosetaxen mwshv eiv marturion autoiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.1.45" type=verse>o de exelywn hrxato khrussein polla kai diafhmizein ton logon wste mhketi auton dunasyai fanerwv eiv polin eiselyein all exw en erhmoiv topoiv hn kai hrconto prov auton pantacoyen
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.MAR.2" type=chapter>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.2" type=verse>kai euyewv sunhcyhsan polloi wste mhketi cwrein mhde ta prov thn yuran kai elalei autoiv ton logon

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.4" type=verse>kai mh dunamenoi proseggisai autw dia ton oclon apestegasan thn steghn opou hn kai exoruxantev calwsin ton krabbaton ef w o paralutikov katekeito
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.5" type=verse>idwn de o ihsouv thn pistin autwn legei tw paralutikw teknon afewntai soi ai amartiai sou

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.9" type=verse>ti estin eukopwteron eipein tw paralutikw afewntai soi ai amartiai h eipein egeirai kai aron sou ton krabbaton kai peripatei

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.12" type=verse>kai hgeryh euyewv kai arav ton krabbaton exhlyen enantion pantwn wste existasyai pantav kai doxazein ton yeon legontav oti oudepote outwv eidomen
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.13" type=verse>kai exhlyen palin para thn yalassan kai pav o oclov hrceto prov auton kai edidasken autouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.14" type=verse>kai paragwn eiden leuin ton tou alfaiou kayhmenon epi to telwnion kai legei autw akolouyei moi kai anastav hkolouyhsen autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.15" type=verse>kai egeneto en tw katakeisyai auton en th oikia autou kai polloi telwnai kai amartwloi sunanekeinto tw ihsou kai toiv mayhtaiv autou hsan gar polloi kai hkolouyhsan autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.16" type=verse>kai oi grammateiv kai oi farisaioi idontev auton esyionta meta twn telwnwn kai amartwlwn elegon toiv mayhtaiv autou ti oti meta twn telwnwn kai amartwlwn esyiei kai pinei
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.17" type=verse>kai akousav o ihsouv legei autoiv ou creian ecousin oi iscuontev iatrou all oi kakwv econtev ouk hlyon kalesai dikaiouv alla amartwlouv eiv metanoian
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.18" type=verse>kai hsan oi mayhtai iwannou kai oi twn farisaiwn nhsteuontev kai ercontai kai legousin autw diati oi mayhtai iwannou kai oi twn farisaiwn nhsteuousin oi de soi mayhtai ou nhsteuousin
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.19" type=verse>kai eipen autoiv o ihsouv mh dunantai oi uioi tou numfwnov en w o numfiov met autwn estin nhsteuein oson cronon mey eautwn ecousin ton numfion ou dunantai nhsteuein
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.20" type=verse>eleusontai de hmerai otan aparyh ap autwn o numfiov kai tote nhsteusousin en ekeinaiv taiv hmeraiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.21" type=verse>kai oudeiv epiblhma rakouv agnafou epirraptei epi imatiw palaiw ei de mh airei to plhrwma autou to kainon tou palaiou kai ceiron scisma ginetai
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.22" type=verse>kai oudeiv ballei oinon neon eiv askouv palaiouv ei de mh rhssei o oinov o neov touv askouv kai o oinov ekceitai kai oi askoi apolountai alla oinon neon eiv askouv kainouv blhteon
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.23" type=verse>kai egeneto paraporeuesyai auton en toiv sabbasin dia twn sporimwn kai hrxanto oi mayhtai autou odon poiein tillontev touv stacuav
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.2.26" type=verse>pwv eishlyen eiv ton oikon tou yeou epi abiayar tou arcierewv kai touv artouv thv proyesewv efagen ouv ouk exestin fagein ei mh toiv iereusin kai edwken kai toiv sun autw ousin
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<seg id="b.MAR.3.18" type=verse>kai andrean kai filippon kai baryolomaion kai matyaion kai ywman kai iakwbon ton tou alfaiou kai yaddaion kai simwna ton kananithn

<div id="b.MAR.5" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.MAR.5.1" type=verse>kai hlyon eiv to peran thv yalasshv eiv thn cwran twn gadarhnwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.5.2" type=verse>kai exelyonti autw ek tou ploiou euyewv aphnthsen autw ek twn mnhmeiwn anyrwpov en pneumati akayartw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.5.3" type=verse>ov thn katoikhsin eicen en toiv mnhmeioiv kai oute alusesin oudeiv hdunato auton dhsai
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.5.4" type=verse>dia to auton pollakiv pedaiv kai alusesin dedesyai kai diespasyai up autou tav aluseiv kai tav pedav suntetrifyai kai oudeiv auton iscuen damasai
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.5.5" type=verse>kai diapantov nuktov kai hmerav en toiv oresin kai en toiv mnhmasin hn krazwn kai katakoptwn eauton liyoiv

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.5.7" type=verse>kai kraxav fwnh megalh eipen ti emoi kai soi ihsou uie tou yeou tou uqistou orkizw se ton yeon mh me basanishv

<seg id="b.MAR.5.14" type=verse>oi de boskontev touv coirouv efugon kai anhggeilan eiv thn polin kai eiv touv agrouv kai exhlyon idein ti estin to gegonov

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.5.33" type=verse>h de gunh fobhyeisa kai tremousa eiduia o gegonen ep auth hlyen kai prosepesen autw kai eipen autw pasan thn alhyeian
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.5.35" type=verse>eti autou lalountov ercontai apo tou arcisunagwgou legontev oti h yugathr sou apeyanen ti eti skulleiv ton didaskalon

</seg>

</seg>

<seg id="b.MAR.7.24" type=verse>kai ekeiyen anastav aphlyen eiv ta meyoria turou kai sidwnov kai eiselywn eiv thn oikian oudena hyelen gnwnai kai ouk hdunhyh layein

<seg id="b.MAR.7.25" type=verse>akousasa gar gunh peri autou hv eicen to yugatrion authv pneuma akayarton elyousa prosepesen prov touv podav autou

<seg id="b.MAR.7.26" type=verse>hn de h gunh ellhniv surofoinissa tw genei kai hrwta auton ina to daimonion ekballh ek thv yugatrov authv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.7.27" type=verse>o de ihsouv eipen auth afev prwton cortasyhnai ta tekna ou gar kalon estin labein ton arton twn teknwn kai balein toiv kunarioiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.7.28" type=verse>h de apekriyh kai legei autw nai kurie kai gar ta kunaria upokatw thv trapezhv esyiei apo twn qiciwn twn paidiwn

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<div id="b.MAR.8" type=chapter>

<div id="b.MAR.10" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.MAR.10.1" type=verse>kakeiyen anastav ercetai eiv ta oria thv ioudaiav dia tou peran tou iordanou kai sumporeuontai palin ocloi prov auton kai wv eiwyei palin edidasken autouv

<seg id="b.MAR.10.13" type=verse>kai proseferon autw paidia ina aqhtai autwn oi de mayhtai epetimwn toiv prosferousin

<seg id="b.MAR.10.14" type=verse>idwn de o ihsouv hganakthsen kai eipen autoiv afete ta paidia ercesyai prov me kai mh kwluete auta twn gar toioutwn estin h basileia tou yeou

<seg id="b.MAR.10.18" type=verse>o de ihsouv eipen autw ti me legeiv agayon oudeiv agayov ei mh eiv o yeov
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.10.19" type=verse>tav entolav oidav mh moiceushv mh foneushv mh kleqhv mh qeudomarturhshv mh aposterhshv tima ton patera sou kai thn mhtera

<seg id="b.MAR.10.20" type=verse>o de apokriyeiv eipen autw didaskale tauta panta efulaxamhn ek neothtov mou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.10.21" type=verse>o de ihsouv embleqav autw hgaphsen auton kai eipen autw en soi usterei upage osa eceiv pwlhson kai dov toiv ptwcoiv kai exeiv yhsauron en ouranw kai deuro akolouyei moi arav ton stauron

<seg id="b.MAR.10.22" type=verse>o de stugnasav epi tw logw aphlyen lupoumenov hn gar ecwn kthmata polla
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.10.23" type=verse>kai peribleqamenov o ihsouv legei toiv mayhtaiv autou pwv duskolwv oi ta crhmata econtev eiv thn basileian tou yeou eiseleusontai
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.10.24" type=verse>oi de mayhtai eyambounto epi toiv logoiv autou o de ihsouv palin apokriyeiv legei autoiv tekna pwv duskolon estin touv pepoiyotav epi toiv crhmasin eiv thn basileian tou yeou eiselyein
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.10.25" type=verse>eukopwteron estin kamhlon dia thv trumaliav thv rafidov eiselyein h plousion eiv thn basileian tou yeou eiselyein
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.10.30" type=verse>ean mh labh ekatontaplasiona nun en tw kairw toutw oikiav kai adelfouv kai adelfav kai mhterav kai tekna kai agrouv meta diwgmwn kai en tw aiwni tw ercomenw zwhn aiwnion
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.10.33" type=verse>oti idou anabainomen eiv ierosoluma kai o uiov tou anyrwpou paradoyhsetai toiv arciereusin kai toiv grammateusin kai katakrinousin auton yanatw kai paradwsousin auton toiv eynesin

<seg id="b.MAR.10.34" type=verse>kai empaixousin autw kai mastigwsousin auton kai emptusousin autw kai apoktenousin auton kai th trith hmera anasthsetai

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.10.43" type=verse>ouc outwv de estai en umin all ov ean yelh genesyai megav en umin estai diakonov umwn

</seg>

<seg id="b.MAR.10.46" type=verse>kai ercontai eiv iericw kai ekporeuomenou autou apo iericw kai twn mayhtwn autou kai oclou ikanou uiov timaiou bartimaiov o tuflov ekayhto para thn odon prosaitwn

<seg id="b.MAR.10.52" type=verse>o de ihsouv eipen autw upage h pistiv sou seswken se kai euyewv anebleqen kai hkolouyei tw ihsou en th odw

<div id="b.MAR.13" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.MAR.13.1" type=verse>kai ekporeuomenou autou ek tou ierou legei autw eiv twn mayhtwn autou didaskale ide potapoi liyoi kai potapai oikodomai

<seg id="b.MAR.13.2" type=verse>kai o ihsouv apokriyeiv eipen autw blepeiv tautav tav megalav oikodomav ou mh afeyh liyov epi liyw ov ou mh kataluyh

<seg id="b.MAR.13.3" type=verse>kai kayhmenou autou eiv to orov twn elaiwn katenanti tou ierou ephrwtwn auton kat idian petrov kai iakwbov kai iwannhv kai andreav

<seg id="b.MAR.13.9" type=verse>blepete de umeiv eautouv paradwsousin gar umav eiv sunedria kai eiv sunagwgav darhsesye kai epi hgemonwn kai basilewn stayhsesye eneken emou eiv marturion autoiv

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.13.12" type=verse>paradwsei de adelfov adelfon eiv yanaton kai pathr teknon kai epanasthsontai tekna epi goneiv kai yanatwsousin autouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.13.13" type=verse>kai esesye misoumenoi upo pantwn dia to onoma mou o de upomeinav eiv telov outov swyhsetai

</seg>

<seg id="b.MAR.15.34" type=verse>kai th wra th ennath ebohsen o ihsouv fwnh megalh legwn elwi elwi lamma sabacyani o estin meyermhneuomenon o yeov mou o yeov mou eiv ti me egkatelipev
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.35" type=verse>kai tinev twn paresthkotwn akousantev elegon idou hlian fwnei
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.36" type=verse>dramwn de eiv kai gemisav spoggon oxouv periyeiv te kalamw epotizen auton legwn afete idwmen ei ercetai hliav kayelein auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.37" type=verse>o de ihsouv afeiv fwnhn megalhn exepneusen
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.38" type=verse>kai to katapetasma tou naou escisyh eiv duo apo anwyen ewv katw
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.39" type=verse>idwn de o kenturiwn o paresthkwv ex enantiav autou oti outwv kraxav exepneusen eipen alhywv o anyrwpov outov uiov hn yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.40" type=verse>hsan de kai gunaikev apo makroyen yewrousai en aiv hn kai maria h magdalhnh kai maria h tou iakwbou tou mikrou kai iwsh mhthr kai salwmh
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.41" type=verse>ai kai ote hn en th galilaia hkolouyoun autw kai dihkonoun autw kai allai pollai ai sunanabasai autw eiv ierosoluma
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.42" type=verse>kai hdh oqiav genomenhv epei hn paraskeuh o estin prosabbaton
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.44" type=verse>o de pilatov eyaumasen ei hdh teynhken kai proskalesamenov ton kenturiwna ephrwthsen auton ei palai apeyanen
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.45" type=verse>kai gnouv apo tou kenturiwnov edwrhsato to swma tw iwshf
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.46" type=verse>kai agorasav sindona kai kayelwn auton eneilhsen th sindoni kai kateyhken auton en mnhmeiw o hn lelatomhmenon ek petrav kai prosekulisen liyon epi thn yuran tou mnhmeiou
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.15.47" type=verse>h de maria h magdalhnh kai maria iwsh eyewroun pou tiyetai
</seg>

<div id="b.MAR.16" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.MAR.16.1" type=verse>kai diagenomenou tou sabbatou maria h magdalhnh kai maria h tou iakwbou kai salwmh hgorasan arwmata ina elyousai aleiqwsin auton

<seg id="b.MAR.16.6" type=verse>o de legei autaiv mh ekyambeisye ihsoun zhteite ton nazarhnon ton estaurwmenon hgeryh ouk estin wde ide o topov opou eyhkan auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.16.7" type=verse>all upagete eipate toiv mayhtaiv autou kai tw petrw oti proagei umav eiv thn galilaian ekei auton oqesye kaywv eipen umin

<seg id="b.MAR.16.8" type=verse>kai exelyousai tacu efugon apo tou mnhmeiou eicen de autav tromov kai ekstasiv kai oudeni ouden eipon efobounto gar

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.16.15" type=verse>kai eipen autoiv poreuyentev eiv ton kosmon apanta khruxate to euaggelion pash th ktisei
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.16.17" type=verse>shmeia de toiv pisteusasin tauta parakolouyhsei en tw onomati mou daimonia ekbalousin glwssaiv lalhsousin kainaiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.16.18" type=verse>ofeiv arousin kan yanasimon ti piwsin ou mh autouv blaqei epi arrwstouv ceirav epiyhsousin kai kalwv exousin
</seg>
<seg id="b.MAR.16.19" type=verse>o men oun kuriov meta to lalhsai autoiv anelhfyh eiv ton ouranon kai ekayisen ek dexiwn tou yeou

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<seg id="b.LUK.1.18" type=verse>kai eipen zacariav prov ton aggelon kata ti gnwsomai touto egw gar eimi presbuthv kai h gunh mou probebhkuia en taiv hmeraiv authv

<seg id="b.LUK.1.20" type=verse>kai idou esh siwpwn kai mh dunamenov lalhsai acri hv hmerav genhtai tauta any wn ouk episteusav toiv logoiv mou oitinev plhrwyhsontai eiv ton kairon autwn

<seg id="b.LUK.1.67" type=verse>kai zacariav o pathr autou eplhsyh pneumatov agiou kai proefhteusen legwn
</seg>

<seg id="b.LUK.1.69" type=verse>kai hgeiren kerav swthriav hmin en tw oikw dabid tou paidov autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.1.70" type=verse>kaywv elalhsen dia stomatov twn agiwn twn ap aiwnov profhtwn autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.1.71" type=verse>swthrian ex ecyrwn hmwn kai ek ceirov pantwn twn misountwn hmav
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.1.72" type=verse>poihsai eleov meta twn paterwn hmwn kai mnhsyhnai diayhkhv agiav autou
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.1.74" type=verse>afobwv ek ceirov twn ecyrwn hmwn rusyentav latreuein autw

</seg>

<seg id="b.LUK.1.78" type=verse>dia splagcna eleouv yeou hmwn en oiv epeskeqato hmav anatolh ex uqouv

</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.1.80" type=verse>to de paidion huxanen kai ekrataiouto pneumati kai hn en taiv erhmoiv ewv hmerav anadeixewv autou prov ton israhl
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.LUK.2" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.1" type=verse>egeneto de en taiv hmeraiv ekeinaiv exhlyen dogma para kaisarov augoustou apografesyai pasan thn oikoumenhn

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.4" type=verse>anebh de kai iwshf apo thv galilaiav ek polewv nazaret eiv thn ioudaian eiv polin dabid htiv kaleitai bhyleem dia to einai auton ex oikou kai patriav dabid
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.5" type=verse>apograqasyai sun mariam th memnhsteumenh autw gunaiki oush egkuw
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.6" type=verse>egeneto de en tw einai autouv ekei eplhsyhsan ai hmerai tou tekein authn
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.7" type=verse>kai eteken ton uion authv ton prwtotokon kai esparganwsen auton kai aneklinen auton en th fatnh dioti ouk hn autoiv topov en tw katalumati
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.8" type=verse>kai poimenev hsan en th cwra th auth agraulountev kai fulassontev fulakav thv nuktov epi thn poimnhn autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.9" type=verse>kai idou aggelov kuriou epesth autoiv kai doxa kuriou perielamqen autouv kai efobhyhsan fobon megan
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.10" type=verse>kai eipen autoiv o aggelov mh fobeisye idou gar euaggelizomai umin caran megalhn htiv estai panti tw law
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.11" type=verse>oti etecyh umin shmeron swthr ov estin cristov kuriov en polei dabid
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.12" type=verse>kai touto umin to shmeion eurhsete brefov esparganwmenon keimenon en th fatnh
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.13" type=verse>kai exaifnhv egeneto sun tw aggelw plhyov stratiav ouraniou ainountwn ton yeon kai legontwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.14" type=verse>doxa en uqistoiv yew kai epi ghv eirhnh en anyrwpoiv eudokia
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.15" type=verse>kai egeneto wv aphlyon ap autwn eiv ton ouranon oi aggeloi kai oi anyrwpoi oi poimenev eipon prov allhlouv dielywmen dh ewv bhyleem kai idwmen to rhma touto to gegonov o o kuriov egnwrisen hmin
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.16" type=verse>kai hlyon speusantev kai aneuron thn te mariam kai ton iwshf kai to brefov keimenon en th fatnh
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.2.17" type=verse>idontev de diegnwrisan peri tou rhmatov tou lalhyentov autoiv peri tou paidiou toutou
</seg>

<div id="b.LUK.5" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.LUK.5.7" type=verse>kai kateneusan toiv metocoiv toiv en tw eterw ploiw tou elyontav sullabesyai autoiv kai hlyon kai eplhsan amfotera ta ploia wste buyizesyai auta

<seg id="b.LUK.7.32" type=verse>omoioi eisin paidioiv toiv en agora kayhmenoiv kai prosfwnousin allhloiv kai legousin hulhsamen umin kai ouk wrchsasye eyrhnhsamen umin kai ouk eklausate
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.33" type=verse>elhluyen gar iwannhv o baptisthv mhte arton esyiwn mhte oinon pinwn kai legete daimonion ecei
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.35" type=verse>kai edikaiwyh h sofia apo twn teknwn authv pantwn
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.37" type=verse>kai idou gunh en th polei htiv hn amartwlov epignousa oti anakeitai en th oikia tou farisaiou komisasa alabastron murou
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.38" type=verse>kai stasa para touv podav autou opisw klaiousa hrxato brecein touv podav autou toiv dakrusin kai taiv yrixin thv kefalhv authv exemassen kai katefilei touv podav autou kai hleifen tw murw
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.39" type=verse>idwn de o farisaiov o kalesav auton eipen en eautw legwn outov ei hn profhthv eginwsken an tiv kai potaph h gunh htiv aptetai autou oti amartwlov estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.40" type=verse>kai apokriyeiv o ihsouv eipen prov auton simwn ecw soi ti eipein o de fhsin didaskale eipe
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.41" type=verse>duo crewfeiletai hsan daneisth tini o eiv wfeilen dhnaria pentakosia o de eterov penthkonta
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.42" type=verse>mh econtwn de autwn apodounai amfoteroiv ecarisato tiv oun autwn eipe pleion auton agaphsei
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.43" type=verse>apokriyeiv de o simwn eipen upolambanw oti w to pleion ecarisato o de eipen autw orywv ekrinav
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.44" type=verse>kai strafeiv prov thn gunaika tw simwni efh blepeiv tauthn thn gunaika eishlyon sou eiv thn oikian udwr epi touv podav mou ouk edwkav auth de toiv dakrusin ebrexen mou touv podav kai taiv yrixin thv kefalhv authv exemaxen
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.47" type=verse>ou carin legw soi afewntai ai amartiai authv ai pollai oti hgaphsen polu w de oligon afietai oligon agapa
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.48" type=verse>eipen de auth afewntai sou ai amartiai
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.49" type=verse>kai hrxanto oi sunanakeimenoi legein en eautoiv tiv outov estin ov kai amartiav afihsin
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.7.50" type=verse>eipen de prov thn gunaika h pistiv sou seswken se poreuou eiv eirhnhn
</seg>

<seg id="b.LUK.9.39" type=verse>kai idou pneuma lambanei auton kai exaifnhv krazei kai sparassei auton meta afrou kai mogiv apocwrei ap autou suntribon auton

<seg id="b.LUK.9.40" type=verse>kai edehyhn twn mayhtwn sou ina ekballwsin auto kai ouk hdunhyhsan
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.41" type=verse>apokriyeiv de o ihsouv eipen w genea apistov kai diestrammenh ewv pote esomai prov umav kai anexomai umwn prosagage wde ton uion sou
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.42" type=verse>eti de prosercomenou autou errhxen auton to daimonion kai sunesparaxen epetimhsen de o ihsouv tw pneumati tw akayartw kai iasato ton paida kai apedwken auton tw patri autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.43" type=verse>exeplhssonto de pantev epi th megaleiothti tou yeou pantwn de yaumazontwn epi pasin oiv epoihsen o ihsouv eipen prov touv mayhtav autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.44" type=verse>yesye umeiv eiv ta wta umwn touv logouv toutouv o gar uiov tou anyrwpou mellei paradidosyai eiv ceirav anyrwpwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.45" type=verse>oi de hgnooun to rhma touto kai hn parakekalummenon ap autwn ina mh aisywntai auto kai efobounto erwthsai auton peri tou rhmatov toutou
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.46" type=verse>eishlyen de dialogismov en autoiv to tiv an eih meizwn autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.47" type=verse>o de ihsouv idwn ton dialogismon thv kardiav autwn epilabomenov paidiou esthsen auto par eautw
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.48" type=verse>kai eipen autoiv ov ean dexhtai touto to paidion epi tw onomati mou eme decetai kai ov ean eme dexhtai decetai ton aposteilanta me o gar mikroterov en pasin umin uparcwn outov estai megav
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.49" type=verse>apokriyeiv de o iwannhv eipen epistata eidomen tina epi tw onomati sou ekballonta ta daimonia kai ekwlusamen auton oti ouk akolouyei mey hmwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.50" type=verse>kai eipen prov auton o ihsouv mh kwluete ov gar ouk estin kay hmwn uper hmwn estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.51" type=verse>egeneto de en tw sumplhrousyai tav hmerav thv analhqewv autou kai autov to proswpon autou esthrixen tou poreuesyai eiv ierousalhm
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.52" type=verse>kai apesteilen aggelouv pro proswpou autou kai poreuyentev eishlyon eiv kwmhn samareitwn wste etoimasai autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.53" type=verse>kai ouk edexanto auton oti to proswpon autou hn poreuomenon eiv ierousalhm
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.54" type=verse>idontev de oi mayhtai autou iakwbov kai iwannhv eipon kurie yeleiv eipwmen pur katabhnai apo tou ouranou kai analwsai autouv wv kai hliav epoihsen
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.55" type=verse>strafeiv de epetimhsen autoiv kai eipen ouk oidate oiou pneumatov este umeiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.56" type=verse>o gar uiov tou anyrwpou ouk hlyen qucav anyrwpwn apolesai alla swsai kai eporeuyhsan eiv eteran kwmhn
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.57" type=verse>egeneto de poreuomenwn autwn en th odw eipen tiv prov auton akolouyhsw soi opou an aperch kurie
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.58" type=verse>kai eipen autw o ihsouv ai alwpekev fwleouv ecousin kai ta peteina tou ouranou kataskhnwseiv o de uiov tou anyrwpou ouk ecei pou thn kefalhn klinh
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.59" type=verse>eipen de prov eteron akolouyei moi o de eipen kurie epitreqon moi apelyonti prwton yaqai ton patera mou
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.60" type=verse>eipen de autw o ihsouv afev touv nekrouv yaqai touv eautwn nekrouv su de apelywn diaggelle thn basileian tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.61" type=verse>eipen de kai eterov akolouyhsw soi kurie prwton de epitreqon moi apotaxasyai toiv eiv ton oikon mou
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.9.62" type=verse>eipen de prov auton o ihsouv oudeiv epibalwn thn ceira autou ep arotron kai blepwn eiv ta opisw euyetov estin eiv thn basileian tou yeou
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.LUK.10" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.LUK.10.35" type=verse>kai epi thn aurion exelywn ekbalwn duo dhnaria edwken tw pandocei kai eipen autw epimelhyhti autou kai o ti an prosdapanhshv egw en tw epanercesyai me apodwsw soi

<div id="b.LUK.11" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.LUK.11.1" type=verse>kai egeneto en tw einai auton en topw tini proseucomenon wv epausato eipen tiv twn mayhtwn autou prov auton kurie didaxon hmav proseucesyai kaywv kai iwannhv edidaxen touv mayhtav autou

<seg id="b.LUK.11.2" type=verse>eipen de autoiv otan proseuchsye legete pater hmwn o en toiv ouranoiv agiasyhtw to onoma sou elyetw h basileia sou genhyhtw to yelhma sou wv en ouranw kai epi thv ghv

</seg>

<seg id="b.LUK.11.14" type=verse>kai hn ekballwn daimonion kai auto hn kwfon egeneto de tou daimoniou exelyontov elalhsen o kwfov kai eyaumasan oi ocloi

<seg id="b.LUK.11.33" type=verse>oudeiv de lucnon aqav eiv krupton tiyhsin oude upo ton modion all epi thn lucnian ina oi eisporeuomenoi to feggov blepwsin

<seg id="b.LUK.11.49" type=verse>dia touto kai h sofia tou yeou eipen apostelw eiv autouv profhtav kai apostolouv kai ex autwn apoktenousin kai ekdiwxousin

<seg id="b.LUK.11.52" type=verse>ouai umin toiv nomikoiv oti hrate thn kleida thv gnwsewv autoi ouk eishlyete kai touv eisercomenouv ekwlusate
</seg>

<seg id="b.LUK.14.21" type=verse>kai paragenomenov o doulov ekeinov aphggeilen tw kuriw autou tauta tote orgisyeiv o oikodespothv eipen tw doulw autou exelye tacewv eiv tav plateiav kai rumav thv polewv kai touv ptwcouv kai anaphrouv kai cwlouv kai tuflouv eisagage wde

<seg id="b.LUK.14.22" type=verse>kai eipen o doulov kurie gegonen wv epetaxav kai eti topov estin

<div id="b.LUK.21" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.LUK.21.1" type=verse>anableqav de eiden touv ballontav ta dwra autwn eiv to gazofulakion plousiouv
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<seg id="b.LUK.23.25" type=verse>apelusen de autoiv ton dia stasin kai fonon beblhmenon eiv thn fulakhn on htounto ton de ihsoun paredwken tw yelhmati autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.26" type=verse>kai wv aphgagon auton epilabomenoi simwnov tinov kurhnaiou tou ercomenou ap agrou epeyhkan autw ton stauron ferein opisyen tou ihsou
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.29" type=verse>oti idou ercontai hmerai en aiv erousin makariai ai steirai kai koiliai ai ouk egennhsan kai mastoi oi ouk eyhlasan

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.33" type=verse>kai ote aphlyon epi ton topon ton kaloumenon kranion ekei estaurwsan auton kai touv kakourgouv on men ek dexiwn on de ex aristerwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.34" type=verse>o de ihsouv elegen pater afev autoiv ou gar oidasin ti poiousin diamerizomenoi de ta imatia autou ebalon klhron
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.35" type=verse>kai eisthkei o laov yewrwn exemukthrizon de kai oi arcontev sun autoiv legontev allouv eswsen swsatw eauton ei outov estin o cristov o tou yeou eklektov

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.41" type=verse>kai hmeiv men dikaiwv axia gar wn epraxamen apolambanomen outov de ouden atopon epraxen
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.43" type=verse>kai eipen autw o ihsouv amhn legw soi shmeron met emou esh en tw paradeisw
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.44" type=verse>hn de wsei wra ekth kai skotov egeneto ef olhn thn ghn ewv wrav ennathv
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.45" type=verse>kai eskotisyh o hliov kai escisyh to katapetasma tou naou meson
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.46" type=verse>kai fwnhsav fwnh megalh o ihsouv eipen pater eiv ceirav sou parayhsomai to pneuma mou kai tauta eipwn exepneusen
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.47" type=verse>idwn de o ekatontarcov to genomenon edoxasen ton yeon legwn ontwv o anyrwpov outov dikaiov hn
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.48" type=verse>kai pantev oi sumparagenomenoi ocloi epi thn yewrian tauthn yewrountev ta genomena tuptontev eautwn ta sthyh upestrefon
</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.49" type=verse>eisthkeisan de pantev oi gnwstoi autou makroyen kai gunaikev ai sunakolouyhsasai autw apo thv galilaiav orwsai tauta
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.LUK.23.51" type=verse>outov ouk hn sugkatateyeimenov th boulh kai th praxei autwn apo arimayaiav polewv twn ioudaiwn ov kai prosedeceto kai autov thn basileian tou yeou

</seg>

<seg id="b.LUK.23.54" type=verse>kai hmera hn paraskeuh kai sabbaton epefwsken
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<div id="b.JOH" type=book>
<div id="b.JOH.1" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.1" type=verse>en arch hn o logov kai o logov hn prov ton yeon kai yeov hn o logov
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.2" type=verse>outov hn en arch prov ton yeon
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.3" type=verse>panta di autou egeneto kai cwriv autou egeneto oude en o gegonen
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.4" type=verse>en autw zwh hn kai h zwh hn to fwv twn anyrwpwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.5" type=verse>kai to fwv en th skotia fainei kai h skotia auto ou katelaben
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.6" type=verse>egeneto anyrwpov apestalmenov para yeou onoma autw iwannhv
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.7" type=verse>outov hlyen eiv marturian ina marturhsh peri tou fwtov ina pantev pisteuswsin di autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.8" type=verse>ouk hn ekeinov to fwv all ina marturhsh peri tou fwtov
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.9" type=verse>hn to fwv to alhyinon o fwtizei panta anyrwpon ercomenon eiv ton kosmon
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.10" type=verse>en tw kosmw hn kai o kosmov di autou egeneto kai o kosmov auton ouk egnw
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.11" type=verse>eiv ta idia hlyen kai oi idioi auton ou parelabon
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.12" type=verse>osoi de elabon auton edwken autoiv exousian tekna yeou genesyai toiv pisteuousin eiv to onoma autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.13" type=verse>oi ouk ex aimatwn oude ek yelhmatov sarkov oude ek yelhmatov androv all ek yeou egennhyhsan
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.14" type=verse>kai o logov sarx egeneto kai eskhnwsen en hmin kai eyeasameya thn doxan autou doxan wv monogenouv para patrov plhrhv caritov kai alhyeiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.15" type=verse>iwannhv marturei peri autou kai kekragen legwn outov hn on eipon o opisw mou ercomenov emprosyen mou gegonen oti prwtov mou hn
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.16" type=verse>kai ek tou plhrwmatov autou hmeiv pantev elabomen kai carin anti caritov
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.17" type=verse>oti o nomov dia mwsewv edoyh h cariv kai h alhyeia dia ihsou cristou egeneto
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.18" type=verse>yeon oudeiv ewraken pwpote o monogenhv uiov o wn eiv ton kolpon tou patrov ekeinov exhghsato
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.19" type=verse>kai auth estin h marturia tou iwannou ote apesteilan oi ioudaioi ex ierosolumwn iereiv kai leuitav ina erwthswsin auton su tiv ei
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.20" type=verse>kai wmologhsen kai ouk hrnhsato kai wmologhsen oti ouk eimi egw o cristov
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.21" type=verse>kai hrwthsan auton ti oun hliav ei su kai legei ouk eimi o profhthv ei su kai apekriyh ou
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.22" type=verse>eipon oun autw tiv ei ina apokrisin dwmen toiv pemqasin hmav ti legeiv peri seautou
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.23" type=verse>efh egw fwnh bowntov en th erhmw euyunate thn odon kuriou kaywv eipen hsaiav o profhthv
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.24" type=verse>kai oi apestalmenoi hsan ek twn farisaiwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.25" type=verse>kai hrwthsan auton kai eipon autw ti oun baptizeiv ei su ouk ei o cristov oute hliav oute o profhthv
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.26" type=verse>apekriyh autoiv o iwannhv legwn egw baptizw en udati mesov de umwn esthken on umeiv ouk oidate
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.27" type=verse>autov estin o opisw mou ercomenov ov emprosyen mou gegonen ou egw ouk eimi axiov ina lusw autou ton imanta tou upodhmatov
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.28" type=verse>tauta en bhyabara egeneto peran tou iordanou opou hn iwannhv baptizwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.29" type=verse>th epaurion blepei o iwannhv ton ihsoun ercomenon prov auton kai legei ide o amnov tou yeou o airwn thn amartian tou kosmou
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.30" type=verse>outov estin peri ou egw eipon opisw mou ercetai anhr ov emprosyen mou gegonen oti prwtov mou hn
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.31" type=verse>kagw ouk hdein auton all ina fanerwyh tw israhl dia touto hlyon egw en tw udati baptizwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.32" type=verse>kai emarturhsen iwannhv legwn oti teyeamai to pneuma katabainon wsei peristeran ex ouranou kai emeinen ep auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.33" type=verse>kagw ouk hdein auton all o pemqav me baptizein en udati ekeinov moi eipen ef on an idhv to pneuma katabainon kai menon ep auton outov estin o baptizwn en pneumati agiw
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.34" type=verse>kagw ewraka kai memarturhka oti outov estin o uiov tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.35" type=verse>th epaurion palin eisthkei o iwannhv kai ek twn mayhtwn autou duo
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.36" type=verse>kai embleqav tw ihsou peripatounti legei ide o amnov tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.37" type=verse>kai hkousan autou oi duo mayhtai lalountov kai hkolouyhsan tw ihsou
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.38" type=verse>strafeiv de o ihsouv kai yeasamenov autouv akolouyountav legei autoiv ti zhteite oi de eipon autw rabbi o legetai ermhneuomenon didaskale pou meneiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.39" type=verse>legei autoiv ercesye kai idete hlyon kai eidon pou menei kai par autw emeinan thn hmeran ekeinhn wra de hn wv dekath
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.40" type=verse>hn andreav o adelfov simwnov petrou eiv ek twn duo twn akousantwn para iwannou kai akolouyhsantwn autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.41" type=verse>euriskei outov prwtov ton adelfon ton idion simwna kai legei autw eurhkamen ton messian o estin meyermhneuomenon o cristov
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.42" type=verse>kai hgagen auton prov ton ihsoun embleqav de autw o ihsouv eipen su ei simwn o uiov iwna su klhyhsh khfav o ermhneuetai petrov
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.43" type=verse>th epaurion hyelhsen o ihsouv exelyein eiv thn galilaian kai euriskei filippon kai legei autw akolouyei moi
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.44" type=verse>hn de o filippov apo bhysaida ek thv polewv andreou kai petrou
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.45" type=verse>euriskei filippov ton nayanahl kai legei autw on egraqen mwshv en tw nomw kai oi profhtai eurhkamen ihsoun ton uion tou iwshf ton apo nazaret
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.1.46" type=verse>kai eipen autw nayanahl ek nazaret dunatai ti agayon einai legei autw filippov ercou kai ide
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<div id="b.JOH.2" type=chapter>

<div id="b.JOH.5" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.JOH.5.1" type=verse>meta tauta hn eorth twn ioudaiwn kai anebh o ihsouv eiv ierosoluma
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.5.2" type=verse>estin de en toiv ierosolumoiv epi th probatikh kolumbhyra h epilegomenh ebraisti bhyesda pente stoav ecousa
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.5.20" type=verse>o gar pathr filei ton uion kai panta deiknusin autw a autov poiei kai meizona toutwn deixei autw erga ina umeiv yaumazhte

<seg id="b.JOH.5.24" type=verse>amhn amhn legw umin oti o ton logon mou akouwn kai pisteuwn tw pemqanti me ecei zwhn aiwnion kai eiv krisin ouk ercetai alla metabebhken ek tou yanatou eiv thn zwhn

<seg id="b.JOH.5.29" type=verse>kai ekporeusontai oi ta agaya poihsantev eiv anastasin zwhv oi de ta faula praxantev eiv anastasin krisewv

</seg>

<div id="b.JOH.7" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.JOH.7.1" type=verse>kai periepatei o ihsouv meta tauta en th galilaia ou gar hyelen en th ioudaia peripatein oti ezhtoun auton oi ioudaioi apokteinai

<seg id="b.JOH.7.8" type=verse>umeiv anabhte eiv thn eorthn tauthn egw oupw anabainw eiv thn eorthn tauthn oti o kairov o emov oupw peplhrwtai

<seg id="b.JOH.7.9" type=verse>tauta de eipwn autoiv emeinen en th galilaia
</seg>

<seg id="b.JOH.15.14" type=verse>umeiv filoi mou este ean poihte osa egw entellomai umin
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.15.15" type=verse>ouketi umav legw doulouv oti o doulov ouk oiden ti poiei autou o kuriov umav de eirhka filouv oti panta a hkousa para tou patrov mou egnwrisa umin
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.15.16" type=verse>ouc umeiv me exelexasye all egw exelexamhn umav kai eyhka umav ina umeiv upaghte kai karpon ferhte kai o karpov umwn menh ina o ti an aithshte ton patera en tw onomati mou dw umin
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.15.17" type=verse>tauta entellomai umin ina agapate allhlouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.15.18" type=verse>ei o kosmov umav misei ginwskete oti eme prwton umwn memishken
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.15.19" type=verse>ei ek tou kosmou hte o kosmov an to idion efilei oti de ek tou kosmou ouk este all egw exelexamhn umav ek tou kosmou dia touto misei umav o kosmov
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.15.20" type=verse>mnhmoneuete tou logou ou egw eipon umin ouk estin doulov meizwn tou kuriou autou ei eme ediwxan kai umav diwxousin ei ton logon mou ethrhsan kai ton umeteron thrhsousin
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.15.21" type=verse>alla tauta panta poihsousin umin dia to onoma mou oti ouk oidasin ton pemqanta me
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.15.23" type=verse>o eme miswn kai ton patera mou misei
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.15.24" type=verse>ei ta erga mh epoihsa en autoiv a oudeiv allov pepoihken amartian ouk eicon nun de kai ewrakasin kai memishkasin kai eme kai ton patera mou
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.15.25" type=verse>all ina plhrwyh o logov o gegrammenov en tw nomw autwn oti emishsan me dwrean
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.15.26" type=verse>otan de elyh o paraklhtov on egw pemqw umin para tou patrov to pneuma thv alhyeiav o para tou patrov ekporeuetai ekeinov marturhsei peri emou
</seg>

</seg>

<div id="b.JOH.16" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.JOH.16.16" type=verse>mikron kai ou yewreite me kai palin mikron kai oqesye me oti egw upagw prov ton patera

</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.16.18" type=verse>elegon oun touto ti estin o legei to mikron ouk oidamen ti lalei
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.16.19" type=verse>egnw oun o ihsouv oti hyelon auton erwtan kai eipen autoiv peri toutou zhteite met allhlwn oti eipon mikron kai ou yewreite me kai palin mikron kai oqesye me
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.16.20" type=verse>amhn amhn legw umin oti klausete kai yrhnhsete umeiv o de kosmov carhsetai umeiv de luphyhsesye all h luph umwn eiv caran genhsetai

<seg id="b.JOH.16.21" type=verse>h gunh otan tikth luphn ecei oti hlyen h wra authv otan de gennhsh to paidion ouk eti mnhmoneuei thv yliqewv dia thn caran oti egennhyh anyrwpov eiv ton kosmon
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.16.22" type=verse>kai umeiv oun luphn men nun ecete palin de oqomai umav kai carhsetai umwn h kardia kai thn caran umwn oudeiv airei af umwn

<seg id="b.JOH.16.23" type=verse>kai en ekeinh th hmera eme ouk erwthsete ouden amhn amhn legw umin oti osa an aithshte ton patera en tw onomati mou dwsei umin

<div id="b.JOH.19" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.1" type=verse>tote oun elaben o pilatov ton ihsoun kai emastigwsen
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.2" type=verse>kai oi stratiwtai plexantev stefanon ex akanywn epeyhkan autou th kefalh kai imation porfuroun periebalon auton

</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.4" type=verse>exhlyen oun palin exw o pilatov kai legei autoiv ide agw umin auton exw ina gnwte oti en autw oudemian aitian euriskw
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.5" type=verse>exhlyen oun o ihsouv exw forwn ton akanyinon stefanon kai to porfuroun imation kai legei autoiv ide o anyrwpov

<seg id="b.JOH.19.6" type=verse>ote oun eidon auton oi arciereiv kai oi uphretai ekraugasan legontev staurwson staurwson legei autoiv o pilatov labete auton umeiv kai staurwsate egw gar ouc euriskw en autw aitian
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.7" type=verse>apekriyhsan autw oi ioudaioi hmeiv nomon ecomen kai kata ton nomon hmwn ofeilei apoyanein oti eauton uion yeou epoihsen
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.8" type=verse>ote oun hkousen o pilatov touton ton logon mallon efobhyh
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.9" type=verse>kai eishlyen eiv to praitwrion palin kai legei tw ihsou poyen ei su o de ihsouv apokrisin ouk edwken autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.10" type=verse>legei oun autw o pilatov emoi ou laleiv ouk oidav oti exousian ecw staurwsai se kai exousian ecw apolusai se
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.11" type=verse>apekriyh o ihsouv ouk eicev exousian oudemian kat emou ei mh hn soi dedomenon anwyen dia touto o paradidouv me soi meizona amartian ecei
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.12" type=verse>ek toutou ezhtei o pilatov apolusai auton oi de ioudaioi ekrazon legontev ean touton apolushv ouk ei filov tou kaisarov pav o basilea auton poiwn antilegei tw kaisari
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.13" type=verse>o oun pilatov akousav touton ton logon hgagen exw ton ihsoun kai ekayisen epi tou bhmatov eiv topon legomenon liyostrwton ebraisti de gabbaya

</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.21" type=verse>elegon oun tw pilatw oi arciereiv twn ioudaiwn mh grafe o basileuv twn ioudaiwn all oti ekeinov eipen basileuv eimi twn ioudaiwn

<seg id="b.JOH.19.22" type=verse>apekriyh o pilatov o gegrafa gegrafa
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.23" type=verse>oi oun stratiwtai ote estaurwsan ton ihsoun elabon ta imatia autou kai epoihsan tessara merh ekastw stratiwth merov kai ton citwna hn de o citwn arrafov ek twn anwyen ufantov di olou
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.24" type=verse>eipon oun prov allhlouv mh sciswmen auton alla lacwmen peri autou tinov estai ina h grafh plhrwyh h legousa diemerisanto ta imatia mou eautoiv kai epi ton imatismon mou ebalon klhron oi men oun stratiwtai tauta epoihsan
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.25" type=verse>eisthkeisan de para tw staurw tou ihsou h mhthr autou kai h adelfh thv mhtrov autou maria h tou klwpa kai maria h magdalhnh
</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.26" type=verse>ihsouv oun idwn thn mhtera kai ton mayhthn parestwta on hgapa legei th mhtri autou gunai idou o uiov sou

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.31" type=verse>oi oun ioudaioi ina mh meinh epi tou staurou ta swmata en tw sabbatw epei paraskeuh hn hn gar megalh h hmera ekeinou tou sabbatou hrwthsan ton pilaton ina kateagwsin autwn ta skelh kai arywsin

</seg>
<seg id="b.JOH.19.35" type=verse>kai o ewrakwv memarturhken kai alhyinh autou estin h marturia kakeinov oiden oti alhyh legei ina umeiv pisteushte

<seg id="b.JOH.19.39" type=verse>hlyen de kai nikodhmov o elywn prov ton ihsoun nuktov to prwton ferwn migma smurnhv kai alohv wsei litrav ekaton
</seg>

<seg id="b.JOH.19.41" type=verse>hn de en tw topw opou estaurwyh khpov kai en tw khpw mnhmeion kainon en w oudepw oudeiv eteyh

<div id="b.JOH.20" type=chapter>

<div id="b.ACT" type=book>
<div id="b.ACT.1" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.1" type=verse>ton men prwton logon epoihsamhn peri pantwn w yeofile wn hrxato o ihsouv poiein te kai didaskein
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.2" type=verse>acri hv hmerav enteilamenov toiv apostoloiv dia pneumatov agiou ouv exelexato anelhfyh
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.3" type=verse>oiv kai paresthsen eauton zwnta meta to payein auton en polloiv tekmhrioiv di hmerwn tessarakonta optanomenov autoiv kai legwn ta peri thv basileiav tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.4" type=verse>kai sunalizomenov parhggeilen autoiv apo ierosolumwn mh cwrizesyai alla perimenein thn epaggelian tou patrov hn hkousate mou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.5" type=verse>oti iwannhv men ebaptisen udati umeiv de baptisyhsesye en pneumati agiw ou meta pollav tautav hmerav
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.6" type=verse>oi men oun sunelyontev ephrwtwn auton legontev kurie ei en tw cronw toutw apokayistaneiv thn basileian tw israhl
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.7" type=verse>eipen de prov autouv ouc umwn estin gnwnai cronouv h kairouv ouv o pathr eyeto en th idia exousia
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.8" type=verse>alla lhqesye dunamin epelyontov tou agiou pneumatov ef umav kai esesye moi marturev en te ierousalhm kai en pash th ioudaia kai samareia kai ewv escatou thv ghv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.9" type=verse>kai tauta eipwn blepontwn autwn ephryh kai nefelh upelaben auton apo twn ofyalmwn autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.10" type=verse>kai wv atenizontev hsan eiv ton ouranon poreuomenou autou kai idou andrev duo pareisthkeisan autoiv en esyhti leukh
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.11" type=verse>oi kai eipon andrev galilaioi ti esthkate emblepontev eiv ton ouranon outov o ihsouv o analhfyeiv af umwn eiv ton ouranon outwv eleusetai on tropon eyeasasye auton poreuomenon eiv ton ouranon
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.12" type=verse>tote upestreqan eiv ierousalhm apo orouv tou kaloumenou elaiwnov o estin egguv ierousalhm sabbatou econ odon
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.13" type=verse>kai ote eishlyon anebhsan eiv to uperwon ou hsan katamenontev o te petrov kai iakwbov kai iwannhv kai andreav filippov kai ywmav baryolomaiov kai matyaiov iakwbov alfaiou kai simwn o zhlwthv kai ioudav iakwbou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.14" type=verse>outoi pantev hsan proskarterountev omoyumadon th proseuch kai th dehsei sun gunaixin kai maria th mhtri tou ihsou kai sun toiv adelfoiv autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.15" type=verse>kai en taiv hmeraiv tautaiv anastav petrov en mesw twn mayhtwn eipen hn te oclov onomatwn epi to auto wv ekaton eikosin
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.16" type=verse>andrev adelfoi edei plhrwyhnai thn grafhn tauthn hn proeipen to pneuma to agion dia stomatov dabid peri iouda tou genomenou odhgou toiv sullabousin ton ihsoun

<seg id="b.ACT.1.17" type=verse>oti kathriymhmenov hn sun hmin kai elacen ton klhron thv diakoniav tauthv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.18" type=verse>outov men oun ekthsato cwrion ek tou misyou thv adikiav kai prhnhv genomenov elakhsen mesov kai execuyh panta ta splagcna autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.19" type=verse>kai gnwston egeneto pasin toiv katoikousin ierousalhm wste klhyhnai to cwrion ekeino th idia dialektw autwn akeldama toutestin cwrion aimatov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.20" type=verse>gegraptai gar en biblw qalmwn genhyhtw h epauliv autou erhmov kai mh estw o katoikwn en auth kai thn episkophn autou laboi eterov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.1.21" type=verse>dei oun twn sunelyontwn hmin andrwn en panti cronw en w eishlyen kai exhlyen ef hmav o kuriov ihsouv
</seg>

</seg>

<seg id="b.ACT.5.1" type=verse>anhr de tiv ananiav onomati sun sapfeirh th gunaiki autou epwlhsen kthma

<seg id="b.ACT.5.2" type=verse>kai enosfisato apo thv timhv suneiduiav kai thv gunaikov autou kai enegkav merov ti para touv podav twn apostolwn eyhken

<seg id="b.ACT.5.3" type=verse>eipen de petrov anania diati eplhrwsen o satanav thn kardian sou qeusasyai se to pneuma to agion kai nosfisasyai apo thv timhv tou cwriou

<seg id="b.ACT.5.4" type=verse>ouci menon soi emenen kai prayen en th sh exousia uphrcen ti oti eyou en th kardia sou to pragma touto ouk eqeusw anyrwpoiv alla tw yew
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.5" type=verse>akouwn de ananiav touv logouv toutouv peswn exequxen kai egeneto fobov megav epi pantav touv akouontav tauta
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.7" type=verse>egeneto de wv wrwn triwn diasthma kai h gunh autou mh eiduia to gegonov eishlyen
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.8" type=verse>apekriyh de auth o petrov eipe moi ei tosoutou to cwrion apedosye h de eipen nai tosoutou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.9" type=verse>o de petrov eipen prov authn ti oti sunefwnhyh umin peirasai to pneuma kuriou idou oi podev twn yaqantwn ton andra sou epi th yura kai exoisousin se
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.10" type=verse>epesen de paracrhma para touv podav autou kai exequxen eiselyontev de oi neaniskoi euron authn nekran kai exenegkantev eyaqan prov ton andra authv

<seg id="b.ACT.5.13" type=verse>twn de loipwn oudeiv etolma kollasyai autoiv all emegalunen autouv o laov
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.15" type=verse>wste kata tav plateiav ekferein touv asyeneiv kai tiyenai epi klinwn kai krabbatwn ina ercomenou petrou kan h skia episkiash tini autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.16" type=verse>sunhrceto de kai to plhyov twn perix polewn eiv ierousalhm ferontev asyeneiv kai ocloumenouv upo pneumatwn akayartwn oitinev eyerapeuonto apantev

<seg id="b.ACT.5.20" type=verse>poreuesye kai stayentev laleite en tw ierw tw law panta ta rhmata thv zwhv tauthv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.21" type=verse>akousantev de eishlyon upo ton oryron eiv to ieron kai edidaskon paragenomenov de o arciereuv kai oi sun autw sunekalesan to sunedrion kai pasan thn gerousian twn uiwn israhl kai apesteilan eiv to desmwthrion acyhnai autouv

<seg id="b.ACT.5.22" type=verse>oi de uphretai paragenomenoi ouc euron autouv en th fulakh anastreqantev de aphggeilan
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.23" type=verse>legontev oti to men desmwthrion euromen kekleismenon en pash asfaleia kai touv fulakav exw estwtav pro twn yurwn anoixantev de esw oudena euromen
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.24" type=verse>wv de hkousan touv logouv toutouv o te iereuv kai o strathgov tou ierou kai oi arciereiv dihporoun peri autwn ti an genoito touto
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.25" type=verse>paragenomenov de tiv aphggeilen autoiv legwn oti idou oi andrev ouv eyesye en th fulakh eisin en tw ierw estwtev kai didaskontev ton laon
</seg>

<seg id="b.ACT.5.33" type=verse>oi de akousantev dieprionto kai ebouleuonto anelein autouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.34" type=verse>anastav de tiv en tw sunedriw farisaiov onomati gamalihl nomodidaskalov timiov panti tw law ekeleusen exw bracu ti touv apostolouv poihsai

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.37" type=verse>meta touton anesth ioudav o galilaiov en taiv hmeraiv thv apografhv kai apesthsen laon ikanon opisw autou kakeinov apwleto kai pantev osoi epeiyonto autw dieskorpisyhsan
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.5.38" type=verse>kai ta nun legw umin aposthte apo twn anyrwpwn toutwn kai easate autouv oti ean h ex anyrwpwn h boulh auth h to ergon touto kataluyhsetai

<div id="b.ACT.6" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.ACT.6.12" type=verse>sunekinhsan te ton laon kai touv presbuterouv kai touv grammateiv kai epistantev sunhrpasan auton kai hgagon eiv to sunedrion

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.6.14" type=verse>akhkoamen gar autou legontov oti ihsouv o nazwraiov outov katalusei ton topon touton kai allaxei ta eyh a paredwken hmin mwushv

</seg>

</seg>

<seg id="b.ACT.7.5" type=verse>kai ouk edwken autw klhronomian en auth oude bhma podov kai ephggeilato autw dounai eiv katascesin authn kai tw spermati autou met auton ouk ontov autw teknou

<seg id="b.ACT.7.6" type=verse>elalhsen de outwv o yeov oti estai to sperma autou paroikon en gh allotria kai doulwsousin auto kai kakwsousin eth tetrakosia

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.7.35" type=verse>touton ton mwushn on hrnhsanto eipontev tiv se katesthsen arconta kai dikasthn touton o yeov arconta kai lutrwthn apesteilen en ceiri aggelou tou ofyentov autw en th batw

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.7.41" type=verse>kai emoscopoihsan en taiv hmeraiv ekeinaiv kai anhgagon yusian tw eidwlw kai eufrainonto en toiv ergoiv twn ceirwn autwn

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.7.43" type=verse>kai anelabete thn skhnhn tou moloc kai to astron tou yeou umwn remfan touv tupouv ouv epoihsate proskunein autoiv kai metoikiw umav epekeina babulwnov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.7.44" type=verse>h skhnh tou marturiou hn en toiv patrasin hmwn en th erhmw kaywv dietaxato o lalwn tw mwsh poihsai authn kata ton tupon on ewrakei
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.7.45" type=verse>hn kai eishgagon diadexamenoi oi paterev hmwn meta ihsou en th katascesei twn eynwn wn exwsen o yeov apo proswpou twn paterwn hmwn ewv twn hmerwn dabid

<seg id="b.ACT.7.50" type=verse>ouci h ceir mou epoihsen tauta panta

<seg id="b.ACT.7.52" type=verse>tina twn profhtwn ouk ediwxan oi paterev umwn kai apekteinan touv prokataggeilantav peri thv eleusewv tou dikaiou ou nun umeiv prodotai kai foneiv gegenhsye

<seg id="b.ACT.7.58" type=verse>kai ekbalontev exw thv polewv eliyoboloun kai oi marturev apeyento ta imatia autwn para touv podav neaniou kaloumenou saulou
