<div id="b.ACT.8" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.1" type=verse>saulov de hn suneudokwn th anairesei autou egeneto de en ekeinh th hmera diwgmov megav epi thn ekklhsian thn en ierosolumoiv pantev te diesparhsan kata tav cwrav thv ioudaiav kai samareiav plhn twn apostolwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.2" type=verse>sunekomisan de ton stefanon andrev eulabeiv kai epoihsanto kopeton megan ep autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.3" type=verse>saulov de elumaineto thn ekklhsian kata touv oikouv eisporeuomenov surwn te andrav kai gunaikav paredidou eiv fulakhn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.4" type=verse>oi men oun diasparentev dihlyon euaggelizomenoi ton logon
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.5" type=verse>filippov de katelywn eiv polin thv samareiav ekhrussen autoiv ton criston
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.6" type=verse>proseicon te oi ocloi toiv legomenoiv upo tou filippou omoyumadon en tw akouein autouv kai blepein ta shmeia a epoiei
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.7" type=verse>pollwn gar twn econtwn pneumata akayarta bownta megalh fwnh exhrceto polloi de paralelumenoi kai cwloi eyerapeuyhsan
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.8" type=verse>kai egeneto cara megalh en th polei ekeinh
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.9" type=verse>anhr de tiv onomati simwn prouphrcen en th polei mageuwn kai existwn to eynov thv samareiav legwn einai tina eauton megan
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.10" type=verse>w proseicon pantev apo mikrou ewv megalou legontev outov estin h dunamiv tou yeou h megalh
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.11" type=verse>proseicon de autw dia to ikanw cronw taiv mageiaiv exestakenai autouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.12" type=verse>ote de episteusan tw filippw euaggelizomenw ta peri thv basileiav tou yeou kai tou onomatov tou ihsou cristou ebaptizonto andrev te kai gunaikev
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.13" type=verse>o de simwn kai autov episteusen kai baptisyeiv hn proskarterwn tw filippw yewrwn te shmeia kai dunameiv megalav ginomenav existato
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.14" type=verse>akousantev de oi en ierosolumoiv apostoloi oti dedektai h samareia ton logon tou yeou apesteilan prov autouv ton petron kai iwannhn

<seg id="b.ACT.8.17" type=verse>tote epetiyoun tav ceirav ep autouv kai elambanon pneuma agion
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.20" type=verse>petrov de eipen prov auton to argurion sou sun soi eih eiv apwleian oti thn dwrean tou yeou enomisav dia crhmatwn ktasyai

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.23" type=verse>eiv gar colhn pikriav kai sundesmon adikiav orw se onta
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.24" type=verse>apokriyeiv de o simwn eipen dehyhte umeiv uper emou prov ton kurion opwv mhden epelyh ep eme wn eirhkate
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.25" type=verse>oi men oun diamarturamenoi kai lalhsantev ton logon tou kuriou upestreqan eiv ierousalhm pollav te kwmav twn samareitwn euhggelisanto
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.26" type=verse>aggelov de kuriou elalhsen prov filippon legwn anasthyi kai poreuou kata meshmbrian epi thn odon thn katabainousan apo ierousalhm eiv gazan auth estin erhmov

<seg id="b.ACT.8.27" type=verse>kai anastav eporeuyh kai idou anhr aiyioq eunoucov dunasthv kandakhv thv basilisshv aiyiopwn ov hn epi pashv thv gazhv authv ov elhluyei proskunhswn eiv ierousalhm
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.28" type=verse>hn te upostrefwn kai kayhmenov epi tou armatov autou kai aneginwsken ton profhthn hsaian

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.31" type=verse>o de eipen pwv gar an dunaimhn ean mh tiv odhghsh me parekalesen te ton filippon anabanta kayisai sun autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.32" type=verse>h de perioch thv grafhv hn aneginwsken hn auth wv probaton epi sfaghn hcyh kai wv amnov enantion tou keirontov auton afwnov outwv ouk anoigei to stoma autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.33" type=verse>en th tapeinwsei autou h krisiv autou hryh thn de genean autou tiv dihghsetai oti airetai apo thv ghv h zwh autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.34" type=verse>apokriyeiv de o eunoucov tw filippw eipen deomai sou peri tinov o profhthv legei touto peri eautou h peri eterou tinov
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.36" type=verse>wv de eporeuonto kata thn odon hlyon epi ti udwr kai fhsin o eunoucov idou udwr ti kwluei me baptisyhnai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.37" type=verse>eipen de o filippov ei pisteueiv ex olhv thv kardiav exestin apokriyeiv de eipen pisteuw ton uion tou yeou einai ton ihsoun criston
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.38" type=verse>kai ekeleusen sthnai to arma kai katebhsan amfoteroi eiv to udwr o te filippov kai o eunoucov kai ebaptisen auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.39" type=verse>ote de anebhsan ek tou udatov pneuma kuriou hrpasen ton filippon kai ouk eiden auton ouketi o eunoucov eporeueto gar thn odon autou cairwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.8.40" type=verse>filippov de eureyh eiv azwton kai diercomenov euhggelizeto tav poleiv pasav ewv tou elyein auton eiv kaisareian
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.ACT.9" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.ACT.9.6" type=verse>tremwn te kai yambwn eipen kurie ti me yeleiv poihsai kai o kuriov prov auton anasthyi kai eiselye eiv thn polin kai lalhyhsetai soi ti se dei poiein
</seg>

<seg id="b.ACT.9.8" type=verse>hgeryh de o saulov apo thv ghv anewgmenwn de twn ofyalmwn autou oudena eblepen ceiragwgountev de auton eishgagon eiv damaskon

<seg id="b.ACT.9.11" type=verse>o de kuriov prov auton anastav poreuyhti epi thn rumhn thn kaloumenhn euyeian kai zhthson en oikia iouda saulon onomati tarsea idou gar proseucetai

<seg id="b.ACT.9.16" type=verse>egw gar upodeixw autw osa dei auton uper tou onomatov mou payein

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.9.22" type=verse>saulov de mallon enedunamouto kai sunecunen touv ioudaiouv touv katoikountav en damaskw sumbibazwn oti outov estin o cristov

<div id="b.ACT.10" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.1" type=verse>anhr de tiv hn en kaisareia onomati kornhliov ekatontarchv ek speirhv thv kaloumenhv italikhv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.2" type=verse>eusebhv kai foboumenov ton yeon sun panti tw oikw autou poiwn te elehmosunav pollav tw law kai deomenov tou yeou diapantov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.3" type=verse>eiden en oramati fanerwv wsei wran ennathn thv hmerav aggelon tou yeou eiselyonta prov auton kai eiponta autw kornhlie
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.4" type=verse>o de atenisav autw kai emfobov genomenov eipen ti estin kurie eipen de autw ai proseucai sou kai ai elehmosunai sou anebhsan eiv mnhmosunon enwpion tou yeou

<seg id="b.ACT.10.7" type=verse>wv de aphlyen o aggelov o lalwn tw kornhliw fwnhsav duo twn oiketwn autou kai stratiwthn eusebh twn proskarterountwn autw

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.11" type=verse>kai yewrei ton ouranon anewgmenon kai katabainon ep auton skeuov ti wv oyonhn megalhn tessarsin arcaiv dedemenon kai kayiemenon epi thv ghv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.12" type=verse>en w uphrcen panta ta tetrapoda thv ghv kai ta yhria kai ta erpeta kai ta peteina tou ouranou

<seg id="b.ACT.10.13" type=verse>kai egeneto fwnh prov auton anastav petre yuson kai fage

<seg id="b.ACT.10.14" type=verse>o de petrov eipen mhdamwv kurie oti oudepote efagon pan koinon h akayarton

<seg id="b.ACT.10.15" type=verse>kai fwnh palin ek deuterou prov auton a o yeov ekayarisen su mh koinou

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.17" type=verse>wv de en eautw dihporei o petrov ti an eih to orama o eiden kai idou oi andrev oi apestalmenoi apo tou kornhliou dierwthsantev thn oikian simwnov epesthsan epi ton pulwna
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.18" type=verse>kai fwnhsantev epunyanonto ei simwn o epikaloumenov petrov enyade xenizetai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.19" type=verse>tou de petrou enyumoumenou peri tou oramatov eipen autw to pneuma idou andrev treiv zhtousin se

<seg id="b.ACT.10.20" type=verse>alla anastav katabhyi kai poreuou sun autoiv mhden diakrinomenov dioti egw apestalka autouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.21" type=verse>katabav de petrov prov touv andrav touv apestalmenouv apo tou kornhliou prov auton eipen idou egw eimi on zhteite tiv h aitia di hn pareste
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.22" type=verse>oi de eipon kornhliov ekatontarchv anhr dikaiov kai foboumenov ton yeon marturoumenov te upo olou tou eynouv twn ioudaiwn ecrhmatisyh upo aggelou agiou metapemqasyai se eiv ton oikon autou kai akousai rhmata para sou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.23" type=verse>eiskalesamenov oun autouv exenisen th de epaurion o petrov exhlyen sun autoiv kai tinev twn adelfwn twn apo thv iopphv sunhlyon autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.24" type=verse>kai th epaurion eishlyon eiv thn kaisareian o de kornhliov hn prosdokwn autouv sugkalesamenov touv suggeneiv autou kai touv anagkaiouv filouv

<seg id="b.ACT.10.26" type=verse>o de petrov auton hgeiren legwn anasthyi kagw autov anyrwpov eimi

<seg id="b.ACT.10.27" type=verse>kai sunomilwn autw eishlyen kai euriskei sunelhluyotav pollouv

<seg id="b.ACT.10.28" type=verse>efh te prov autouv umeiv epistasye wv ayemiton estin andri ioudaiw kollasyai h prosercesyai allofulw kai emoi o yeov edeixen mhdena koinon h akayarton legein anyrwpon
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.29" type=verse>dio kai anantirrhtwv hlyon metapemfyeiv punyanomai oun tini logw metepemqasye me
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.30" type=verse>kai o kornhliov efh apo tetarthv hmerav mecri tauthv thv wrav hmhn nhsteuwn kai thn ennathn wran proseucomenov en tw oikw mou kai idou anhr esth enwpion mou en esyhti lampra
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.31" type=verse>kai fhsin kornhlie eishkousyh sou h proseuch kai ai elehmosunai sou emnhsyhsan enwpion tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.32" type=verse>pemqon oun eiv iopphn kai metakalesai simwna ov epikaleitai petrov outov xenizetai en oikia simwnov bursewv para yalassan ov paragenomenov lalhsei soi
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.33" type=verse>exauthv oun epemqa prov se su te kalwv epoihsav paragenomenov nun oun pantev hmeiv enwpion tou yeou paresmen akousai panta ta prostetagmena soi upo tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.34" type=verse>anoixav de petrov to stoma eipen ep alhyeiav katalambanomai oti ouk estin proswpolhpthv o yeov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.35" type=verse>all en panti eynei o foboumenov auton kai ergazomenov dikaiosunhn dektov autw estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.36" type=verse>ton logon on apesteilen toiv uioiv israhl euaggelizomenov eirhnhn dia ihsou cristou outov estin pantwn kuriov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.37" type=verse>umeiv oidate to genomenon rhma kay olhv thv ioudaiav arxamenon apo thv galilaiav meta to baptisma o ekhruxen iwannhv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.38" type=verse>ihsoun ton apo nazaret wv ecrisen auton o yeov pneumati agiw kai dunamei ov dihlyen euergetwn kai iwmenov pantav touv katadunasteuomenouv upo tou diabolou oti o yeov hn met autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.39" type=verse>kai hmeiv esmen marturev pantwn wn epoihsen en te th cwra twn ioudaiwn kai en ierousalhm on aneilon kremasantev epi xulou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.40" type=verse>touton o yeov hgeiren th trith hmera kai edwken auton emfanh genesyai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.41" type=verse>ou panti tw law alla martusin toiv prokeceirotonhmenoiv upo tou yeou hmin oitinev sunefagomen kai sunepiomen autw meta to anasthnai auton ek nekrwn

<seg id="b.ACT.10.42" type=verse>kai parhggeilen hmin khruxai tw law kai diamarturasyai oti autov estin o wrismenov upo tou yeou krithv zwntwn kai nekrwn

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.10.45" type=verse>kai exesthsan oi ek peritomhv pistoi osoi sunhlyon tw petrw oti kai epi ta eynh h dwrea tou agiou pneumatov ekkecutai

<seg id="b.ACT.13.50" type=verse>oi de ioudaioi parwtrunan tav sebomenav gunaikav kai tav euschmonav kai touv prwtouv thv polewv kai ephgeiran diwgmon epi ton paulon kai ton barnaban kai exebalon autouv apo twn oriwn autwn

<div id="b.ACT.14" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.ACT.14.1" type=verse>egeneto de en ikoniw kata to auto eiselyein autouv eiv thn sunagwghn twn ioudaiwn kai lalhsai outwv wste pisteusai ioudaiwn te kai ellhnwn polu plhyov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.14.2" type=verse>oi de apeiyountev ioudaioi ephgeiran kai ekakwsan tav qucav twn eynwn kata twn adelfwn
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<seg id="b.ACT.17.10" type=verse>oi de adelfoi euyewv dia thv nuktov exepemqan ton te paulon kai ton silan eiv beroian oitinev paragenomenoi eiv thn sunagwghn twn ioudaiwn aphesan
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.11" type=verse>outoi de hsan eugenesteroi twn en yessalonikh oitinev edexanto ton logon meta pashv proyumiav to kay hmeran anakrinontev tav grafav ei ecoi tauta outwv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.12" type=verse>polloi men oun ex autwn episteusan kai twn ellhnidwn gunaikwn twn euschmonwn kai andrwn ouk oligoi
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.13" type=verse>wv de egnwsan oi apo thv yessalonikhv ioudaioi oti kai en th beroia kathggelh upo tou paulou o logov tou yeou hlyon kakei saleuontev touv oclouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.14" type=verse>euyewv de tote ton paulon exapesteilan oi adelfoi poreuesyai wv epi thn yalassan upemenon de o te silav kai o timoyeov ekei
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.15" type=verse>oi de kayistwntev ton paulon hgagon auton ewv ayhnwn kai labontev entolhn prov ton silan kai timoyeon ina wv tacista elywsin prov auton exhesan
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.16" type=verse>en de taiv ayhnaiv ekdecomenou autouv tou paulou parwxuneto to pneuma autou en autw yewrounti kateidwlon ousan thn polin
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.17" type=verse>dielegeto men oun en th sunagwgh toiv ioudaioiv kai toiv sebomenoiv kai en th agora kata pasan hmeran prov touv paratugcanontav
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.18" type=verse>tinev de twn epikoureiwn kai twn stwikwn filosofwn suneballon autw kai tinev elegon ti an yeloi o spermologov outov legein oi de xenwn daimoniwn dokei kataggeleuv einai oti ton ihsoun kai thn anastasin autoiv euhggelizeto
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.19" type=verse>epilabomenoi te autou epi ton areion pagon hgagon legontev dunameya gnwnai tiv h kainh auth h upo sou laloumenh didach
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.20" type=verse>xenizonta gar tina eisfereiv eiv tav akoav hmwn boulomeya oun gnwnai ti an yeloi tauta einai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.21" type=verse>ayhnaioi de pantev kai oi epidhmountev xenoi eiv ouden eteron eukairoun h legein ti kai akouein kainoteron
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.22" type=verse>stayeiv de o paulov en mesw tou areiou pagou efh andrev ayhnaioi kata panta wv deisidaimonesterouv umav yewrw
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.23" type=verse>diercomenov gar kai anayewrwn ta sebasmata umwn euron kai bwmon en w epegegrapto agnwstw yew on oun agnoountev eusebeite touton egw kataggellw umin
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.24" type=verse>o yeov o poihsav ton kosmon kai panta ta en autw outov ouranou kai ghv kuriov uparcwn ouk en ceiropoihtoiv naoiv katoikei
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.25" type=verse>oude upo ceirwn anyrwpwn yerapeuetai prosdeomenov tinov autov didouv pasin zwhn kai pnohn kata panta
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.26" type=verse>epoihsen te ex enov aimatov pan eynov anyrwpwn katoikein epi pan to proswpon thv ghv orisav protetagmenouv kairouv kai tav oroyesiav thv katoikiav autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.27" type=verse>zhtein ton kurion ei ara ge qhlafhseian auton kai euroien kaitoige ou makran apo enov ekastou hmwn uparconta
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.28" type=verse>en autw gar zwmen kai kinoumeya kai esmen wv kai tinev twn kay umav poihtwn eirhkasin tou gar kai genov esmen
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.29" type=verse>genov oun uparcontev tou yeou ouk ofeilomen nomizein crusw h argurw h liyw caragmati tecnhv kai enyumhsewv anyrwpou to yeion einai omoion
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.30" type=verse>touv men oun cronouv thv agnoiav uperidwn o yeov ta nun paraggellei toiv anyrwpoiv pasin pantacou metanoein
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.31" type=verse>dioti esthsen hmeran en h mellei krinein thn oikoumenhn en dikaiosunh en andri w wrisen pistin parascwn pasin anasthsav auton ek nekrwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.32" type=verse>akousantev de anastasin nekrwn oi men ecleuazon oi de eipon akousomeya sou palin peri toutou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.33" type=verse>kai outwv o paulov exhlyen ek mesou autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.17.34" type=verse>tinev de andrev kollhyentev autw episteusan en oiv kai dionusiov o areopagithv kai gunh onomati damariv kai eteroi sun autoiv
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.ACT.18" type=chapter>

<div id="b.ACT.19" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.ACT.20.7" type=verse>en de th mia twn sabbatwn sunhgmenwn twn mayhtwn tou klasai arton o paulov dielegeto autoiv mellwn exienai th epaurion pareteinen te ton logon mecri mesonuktiou

<seg id="b.ACT.20.12" type=verse>hgagon de ton paida zwnta kai pareklhyhsan ou metriwv

<seg id="b.ACT.20.13" type=verse>hmeiv de proelyontev epi to ploion anhcyhmen eiv thn asson ekeiyen mellontev analambanein ton paulon outwv gar hn diatetagmenov mellwn autov pezeuein

<seg id="b.ACT.20.14" type=verse>wv de sunebalen hmin eiv thn asson analabontev auton hlyomen eiv mitulhnhn

<seg id="b.ACT.20.15" type=verse>kakeiyen apopleusantev th epioush kathnthsamen antikru ciou th de etera parebalomen eiv samon kai meinantev en trwgulliw th ecomenh hlyomen eiv milhton
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.16" type=verse>ekrinen gar o paulov parapleusai thn efeson opwv mh genhtai autw cronotribhsai en th asia espeuden gar ei dunaton hn autw thn hmeran thv penthkosthv genesyai eiv ierosoluma

<seg id="b.ACT.20.17" type=verse>apo de thv milhtou pemqav eiv efeson metekalesato touv presbuterouv thv ekklhsiav

<seg id="b.ACT.20.18" type=verse>wv de paregenonto prov auton eipen autoiv umeiv epistasye apo prwthv hmerav af hv epebhn eiv thn asian pwv mey umwn ton panta cronon egenomhn

<seg id="b.ACT.20.19" type=verse>douleuwn tw kuriw meta pashv tapeinofrosunhv kai pollwn dakruwn kai peirasmwn twn sumbantwn moi en taiv epiboulaiv twn ioudaiwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.20" type=verse>wv ouden upesteilamhn twn sumferontwn tou mh anaggeilai umin kai didaxai umav dhmosia kai kat oikouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.21" type=verse>diamarturomenov ioudaioiv te kai ellhsin thn eiv ton yeon metanoian kai pistin thn eiv ton kurion hmwn ihsoun criston
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.22" type=verse>kai nun idou egw dedemenov tw pneumati poreuomai eiv ierousalhm ta en auth sunanthsonta moi mh eidwv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.23" type=verse>plhn oti to pneuma to agion kata polin diamarturetai legon oti desma me kai yliqeiv menousin
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.24" type=verse>all oudenov logon poioumai oude ecw thn quchn mou timian emautw wv teleiwsai ton dromon mou meta carav kai thn diakonian hn elabon para tou kuriou ihsou diamarturasyai to euaggelion thv caritov tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.25" type=verse>kai nun idou egw oida oti ouketi oqesye to proswpon mou umeiv pantev en oiv dihlyon khrusswn thn basileian tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.26" type=verse>dio marturomai umin en th shmeron hmera oti kayarov egw apo tou aimatov pantwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.27" type=verse>ou gar upesteilamhn tou mh anaggeilai umin pasan thn boulhn tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.28" type=verse>prosecete oun eautoiv kai panti tw poimniw en w umav to pneuma to agion eyeto episkopouv poimainein thn ekklhsian tou yeou hn periepoihsato dia tou idiou aimatov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.29" type=verse>egw gar oida touto oti eiseleusontai meta thn afixin mou lukoi bareiv eiv umav mh feidomenoi tou poimniou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.30" type=verse>kai ex umwn autwn anasthsontai andrev lalountev diestrammena tou apospan touv mayhtav opisw autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.31" type=verse>dio grhgoreite mnhmoneuontev oti trietian nukta kai hmeran ouk epausamhn meta dakruwn nouyetwn ena ekaston
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.32" type=verse>kai tanun paratiyemai umav adelfoi tw yew kai tw logw thv caritov autou tw dunamenw epoikodomhsai kai dounai umin klhronomian en toiv hgiasmenoiv pasin
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.33" type=verse>arguriou h crusiou h imatismou oudenov epeyumhsa
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.34" type=verse>autoi de ginwskete oti taiv creiaiv mou kai toiv ousin met emou uphrethsan ai ceirev autai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.35" type=verse>panta upedeixa umin oti outwv kopiwntav dei antilambanesyai twn asyenountwn mnhmoneuein te twn logwn tou kuriou ihsou oti autov eipen makarion estin didonai mallon h lambanein
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.36" type=verse>kai tauta eipwn yeiv ta gonata autou sun pasin autoiv proshuxato
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.37" type=verse>ikanov de egeneto klauymov pantwn kai epipesontev epi ton trachlon tou paulou katefiloun auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.20.38" type=verse>odunwmenoi malista epi tw logw w eirhkei oti ouketi mellousin to proswpon autou yewrein proepempon de auton eiv to ploion
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.ACT.21" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.1" type=verse>wv de egeneto anacyhnai hmav apospasyentav ap autwn euyudromhsantev hlyomen eiv thn kwn th de exhv eiv thn rodon kakeiyen eiv patara
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.2" type=verse>kai eurontev ploion diaperwn eiv foinikhn epibantev anhcyhmen
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.3" type=verse>anafanantev de thn kupron kai katalipontev authn euwnumon epleomen eiv surian kai kathcyhmen eiv turon ekeise gar hn to ploion apofortizomenon ton gomon
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.4" type=verse>kai aneurontev touv mayhtav epemeinamen autou hmerav epta oitinev tw paulw elegon dia tou pneumatov mh anabainein eiv ierousalhm
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.5" type=verse>ote de egeneto hmav exartisai tav hmerav exelyontev eporeuomeya propempontwn hmav pantwn sun gunaixin kai teknoiv ewv exw thv polewv kai yentev ta gonata epi ton aigialon proshuxameya
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.6" type=verse>kai aspasamenoi allhlouv epebhmen eiv to ploion ekeinoi de upestreqan eiv ta idia
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.7" type=verse>hmeiv de ton ploun dianusantev apo turou kathnthsamen eiv ptolemaida kai aspasamenoi touv adelfouv emeinamen hmeran mian par autoiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.8" type=verse>th de epaurion exelyontev oi peri ton paulon hlyon eiv kaisareian kai eiselyontev eiv ton oikon filippou tou euaggelistou tou ontov ek twn epta emeinamen par autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.9" type=verse>toutw de hsan yugaterev paryenoi tessarev profhteuousai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.10" type=verse>epimenontwn de hmwn hmerav pleiouv kathlyen tiv apo thv ioudaiav profhthv onomati agabov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.11" type=verse>kai elywn prov hmav kai arav thn zwnhn tou paulou dhsav te autou tav ceirav kai touv podav eipen tade legei to pneuma to agion ton andra ou estin h zwnh auth outwv dhsousin en ierousalhm oi ioudaioi kai paradwsousin eiv ceirav eynwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.12" type=verse>wv de hkousamen tauta parekaloumen hmeiv te kai oi entopioi tou mh anabainein auton eiv ierousalhm
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.13" type=verse>apekriyh de o paulov ti poieite klaiontev kai sunyruptontev mou thn kardian egw gar ou monon deyhnai alla kai apoyanein eiv ierousalhm etoimwv ecw uper tou onomatov tou kuriou ihsou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.14" type=verse>mh peiyomenou de autou hsucasamen eipontev to yelhma tou kuriou genesyw
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.15" type=verse>meta de tav hmerav tautav aposkeuasamenoi anebainomen eiv ierousalhm
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.16" type=verse>sunhlyon de kai twn mayhtwn apo kaisareiav sun hmin agontev par w xenisywmen mnaswni tini kupriw arcaiw mayhth
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.17" type=verse>genomenwn de hmwn eiv ierosoluma asmenwv edexanto hmav oi adelfoi
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.18" type=verse>th de epioush eishei o paulov sun hmin prov iakwbon pantev te paregenonto oi presbuteroi
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.19" type=verse>kai aspasamenov autouv exhgeito kay en ekaston wn epoihsen o yeov en toiv eynesin dia thv diakoniav autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.20" type=verse>oi de akousantev edoxazon ton kurion eipon te autw yewreiv adelfe posai muriadev eisin ioudaiwn twn pepisteukotwn kai pantev zhlwtai tou nomou uparcousin
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.21" type=verse>kathchyhsan de peri sou oti apostasian didaskeiv apo mwsewv touv kata ta eynh pantav ioudaiouv legwn mh peritemnein autouv ta tekna mhde toiv eyesin peripatein
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.22" type=verse>ti oun estin pantwv dei plhyov sunelyein akousontai gar oti elhluyav
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.23" type=verse>touto oun poihson o soi legomen eisin hmin andrev tessarev euchn econtev ef eautwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.24" type=verse>toutouv paralabwn agnisyhti sun autoiv kai dapanhson ep autoiv ina xurhswntai thn kefalhn kai gnwsin pantev oti wn kathchntai peri sou ouden estin alla stoiceiv kai autov ton nomon fulasswn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.25" type=verse>peri de twn pepisteukotwn eynwn hmeiv epesteilamen krinantev mhden toiouton threin autouv ei mh fulassesyai autouv to te eidwloyuton kai to aima kai pnikton kai porneian
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.26" type=verse>tote o paulov paralabwn touv andrav th ecomenh hmera sun autoiv agnisyeiv eishei eiv to ieron diaggellwn thn ekplhrwsin twn hmerwn tou agnismou ewv ou proshnecyh uper enov ekastou autwn h prosfora
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.27" type=verse>wv de emellon ai epta hmerai sunteleisyai oi apo thv asiav ioudaioi yeasamenoi auton en tw ierw suneceon panta ton oclon kai epebalon tav ceirav ep auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.28" type=verse>krazontev andrev israhlitai bohyeite outov estin o anyrwpov o kata tou laou kai tou nomou kai tou topou toutou pantav pantacou didaskwn eti te kai ellhnav eishgagen eiv to ieron kai kekoinwken ton agion topon touton
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.29" type=verse>hsan gar proewrakotev trofimon ton efesion en th polei sun autw on enomizon oti eiv to ieron eishgagen o paulov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.30" type=verse>ekinhyh te h poliv olh kai egeneto sundromh tou laou kai epilabomenoi tou paulou eilkon auton exw tou ierou kai euyewv ekleisyhsan ai yurai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.31" type=verse>zhtountwn de auton apokteinai anebh fasiv tw ciliarcw thv speirhv oti olh sugkecutai ierousalhm
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.32" type=verse>ov exauthv paralabwn stratiwtav kai ekatontarcouv katedramen ep autouv oi de idontev ton ciliarcon kai touv stratiwtav epausanto tuptontev ton paulon
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.33" type=verse>tote eggisav o ciliarcov epelabeto autou kai ekeleusen deyhnai alusesin dusin kai epunyaneto tiv an eih kai ti estin pepoihkwv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.34" type=verse>alloi de allo ti ebown en tw oclw mh dunamenov de gnwnai to asfalev dia ton yorubon ekeleusen agesyai auton eiv thn parembolhn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.35" type=verse>ote de egeneto epi touv anabaymouv sunebh bastazesyai auton upo twn stratiwtwn dia thn bian tou oclou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.36" type=verse>hkolouyei gar to plhyov tou laou krazon aire auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.37" type=verse>mellwn te eisagesyai eiv thn parembolhn o paulov legei tw ciliarcw ei exestin moi eipein ti prov se o de efh ellhnisti ginwskeiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.38" type=verse>ouk ara su ei o aiguptiov o pro toutwn twn hmerwn anastatwsav kai exagagwn eiv thn erhmon touv tetrakisciliouv andrav twn sikariwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.39" type=verse>eipen de o paulov egw anyrwpov men eimi ioudaiov tarseuv thv kilikiav ouk ashmou polewv polithv deomai de sou epitreqon moi lalhsai prov ton laon
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.21.40" type=verse>epitreqantov de autou o paulov estwv epi twn anabaymwn kateseisen th ceiri tw law pollhv de sighv genomenhv prosefwnhsen th ebraidi dialektw legwn
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.ACT.22" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.1" type=verse>andrev adelfoi kai paterev akousate mou thv prov umav nun apologiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.2" type=verse>akousantev de oti th ebraidi dialektw prosefwnei autoiv mallon parescon hsucian kai fhsin
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.3" type=verse>egw men eimi anhr ioudaiov gegennhmenov en tarsw thv kilikiav anateyrammenov de en th polei tauth para touv podav gamalihl pepaideumenov kata akribeian tou patrwou nomou zhlwthv uparcwn tou yeou kaywv pantev umeiv este shmeron
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.4" type=verse>ov tauthn thn odon ediwxa acri yanatou desmeuwn kai paradidouv eiv fulakav andrav te kai gunaikav
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.5" type=verse>wv kai o arciereuv marturei moi kai pan to presbuterion par wn kai epistolav dexamenov prov touv adelfouv eiv damaskon eporeuomhn axwn kai touv ekeise ontav dedemenouv eiv ierousalhm ina timwrhywsin
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.6" type=verse>egeneto de moi poreuomenw kai eggizonti th damaskw peri meshmbrian exaifnhv ek tou ouranou periastraqai fwv ikanon peri eme
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.7" type=verse>epeson te eiv to edafov kai hkousa fwnhv legoushv moi saoul saoul ti me diwkeiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.8" type=verse>egw de apekriyhn tiv ei kurie eipen te prov me egw eimi ihsouv o nazwraiov on su diwkeiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.9" type=verse>oi de sun emoi ontev to men fwv eyeasanto kai emfoboi egenonto thn de fwnhn ouk hkousan tou lalountov moi
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.10" type=verse>eipon de ti poihsw kurie o de kuriov eipen prov me anastav poreuou eiv damaskon kakei soi lalhyhsetai peri pantwn wn tetaktai soi poihsai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.11" type=verse>wv de ouk eneblepon apo thv doxhv tou fwtov ekeinou ceiragwgoumenov upo twn sunontwn moi hlyon eiv damaskon
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.12" type=verse>ananiav de tiv anhr eusebhv kata ton nomon marturoumenov upo pantwn twn katoikountwn ioudaiwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.13" type=verse>elywn prov me kai epistav eipen moi saoul adelfe anableqon kagw auth th wra anebleqa eiv auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.14" type=verse>o de eipen o yeov twn paterwn hmwn proeceirisato se gnwnai to yelhma autou kai idein ton dikaion kai akousai fwnhn ek tou stomatov autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.15" type=verse>oti esh martuv autw prov pantav anyrwpouv wn ewrakav kai hkousav
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.16" type=verse>kai nun ti melleiv anastav baptisai kai apolousai tav amartiav sou epikalesamenov to onoma tou kuriou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.17" type=verse>egeneto de moi upostreqanti eiv ierousalhm kai proseucomenou mou en tw ierw genesyai me en ekstasei
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.18" type=verse>kai idein auton legonta moi speuson kai exelye en tacei ex ierousalhm dioti ou paradexontai sou thn marturian peri emou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.19" type=verse>kagw eipon kurie autoi epistantai oti egw hmhn fulakizwn kai derwn kata tav sunagwgav touv pisteuontav epi se
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.20" type=verse>kai ote execeito to aima stefanou tou marturov sou kai autov hmhn efestwv kai suneudokwn th anairesei autou kai fulasswn ta imatia twn anairountwn auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.21" type=verse>kai eipen prov me poreuou oti egw eiv eynh makran exapostelw se
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.22" type=verse>hkouon de autou acri toutou tou logou kai ephran thn fwnhn autwn legontev aire apo thv ghv ton toiouton ou gar kayhkon auton zhn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.23" type=verse>kraugazontwn de autwn kai riptountwn ta imatia kai koniorton ballontwn eiv ton aera
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.24" type=verse>ekeleusen auton o ciliarcov agesyai eiv thn parembolhn eipwn mastixin anetazesyai auton ina epignw di hn aitian outwv epefwnoun autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.25" type=verse>wv de proeteinen auton toiv imasin eipen prov ton estwta ekatontarcon o paulov ei anyrwpon rwmaion kai akatakriton exestin umin mastizein
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.26" type=verse>akousav de o ekatontarcov proselywn aphggeilen tw ciliarcw legwn ora ti melleiv poiein o gar anyrwpov outov rwmaiov estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.27" type=verse>proselywn de o ciliarcov eipen autw lege moi ei su rwmaiov ei o de efh nai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.28" type=verse>apekriyh te o ciliarcov egw pollou kefalaiou thn politeian tauthn ekthsamhn o de paulov efh egw de kai gegennhmai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.29" type=verse>euyewv oun apesthsan ap autou oi mellontev auton anetazein kai o ciliarcov de efobhyh epignouv oti rwmaiov estin kai oti hn auton dedekwv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.22.30" type=verse>th de epaurion boulomenov gnwnai to asfalev to ti kathgoreitai para twn ioudaiwn elusen auton apo twn desmwn kai ekeleusen elyein touv arciereiv kai olon to sunedrion autwn kai katagagwn ton paulon esthsen eiv autouv
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.ACT.23" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.1" type=verse>atenisav de o paulov tw sunedriw eipen andrev adelfoi egw pash suneidhsei agayh pepoliteumai tw yew acri tauthv thv hmerav
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.2" type=verse>o de arciereuv ananiav epetaxen toiv parestwsin autw tuptein autou to stoma
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.3" type=verse>tote o paulov prov auton eipen tuptein se mellei o yeov toice kekoniamene kai su kayh krinwn me kata ton nomon kai paranomwn keleueiv me tuptesyai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.4" type=verse>oi de parestwtev eipon ton arcierea tou yeou loidoreiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.5" type=verse>efh te o paulov ouk hdein adelfoi oti estin arciereuv gegraptai gar arconta tou laou sou ouk ereiv kakwv
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.6" type=verse>gnouv de o paulov oti to en merov estin saddoukaiwn to de eteron farisaiwn ekraxen en tw sunedriw andrev adelfoi egw farisaiov eimi uiov farisaiou peri elpidov kai anastasewv nekrwn egw krinomai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.7" type=verse>touto de autou lalhsantov egeneto stasiv twn farisaiwn kai twn saddoukaiwn kai escisyh to plhyov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.8" type=verse>saddoukaioi men gar legousin mh einai anastasin mhde aggelon mhte pneuma farisaioi de omologousin ta amfotera
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.9" type=verse>egeneto de kraugh megalh kai anastantev oi grammateiv tou merouv twn farisaiwn diemaconto legontev ouden kakon euriskomen en tw anyrwpw toutw ei de pneuma elalhsen autw h aggelov mh yeomacwmen
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.10" type=verse>pollhv de genomenhv stasewv eulabhyeiv o ciliarcov mh diaspasyh o paulov up autwn ekeleusen to strateuma kataban arpasai auton ek mesou autwn agein te eiv thn parembolhn
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.11" type=verse>th de epioush nukti epistav autw o kuriov eipen yarsei paule wv gar diemarturw ta peri emou eiv ierousalhm outwv se dei kai eiv rwmhn marturhsai
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.12" type=verse>genomenhv de hmerav poihsantev tinev twn ioudaiwn sustrofhn aneyematisan eautouv legontev mhte fagein mhte piein ewv ou apokteinwsin ton paulon
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.13" type=verse>hsan de pleiouv tessarakonta oi tauthn thn sunwmosian pepoihkotev
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.14" type=verse>oitinev proselyontev toiv arciereusin kai toiv presbuteroiv eipon anayemati aneyematisamen eautouv mhdenov geusasyai ewv ou apokteinwmen ton paulon
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.15" type=verse>nun oun umeiv emfanisate tw ciliarcw sun tw sunedriw opwv aurion auton katagagh prov umav wv mellontav diaginwskein akribesteron ta peri autou hmeiv de pro tou eggisai auton etoimoi esmen tou anelein auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.16" type=verse>akousav de o uiov thv adelfhv paulou to enedron paragenomenov kai eiselywn eiv thn parembolhn aphggeilen tw paulw
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.17" type=verse>proskalesamenov de o paulov ena twn ekatontarcwn efh ton neanian touton apagage prov ton ciliarcon ecei gar ti apaggeilai autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.18" type=verse>o men oun paralabwn auton hgagen prov ton ciliarcon kai fhsin o desmiov paulov proskalesamenov me hrwthsen touton ton neanian agagein prov se econta ti lalhsai soi
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.19" type=verse>epilabomenov de thv ceirov autou o ciliarcov kai anacwrhsav kat idian epunyaneto ti estin o eceiv apaggeilai moi
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.20" type=verse>eipen de oti oi ioudaioi suneyento tou erwthsai se opwv aurion eiv to sunedrion katagaghv ton paulon wv mellontev ti akribesteron punyanesyai peri autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.21" type=verse>su oun mh peisyhv autoiv enedreuousin gar auton ex autwn andrev pleiouv tessarakonta oitinev aneyematisan eautouv mhte fagein mhte piein ewv ou anelwsin auton kai nun etoimoi eisin prosdecomenoi thn apo sou epaggelian
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.22" type=verse>o men oun ciliarcov apelusen ton neanian paraggeilav mhdeni eklalhsai oti tauta enefanisav prov me
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.23" type=verse>kai proskalesamenov duo tinav twn ekatontarcwn eipen etoimasate stratiwtav diakosiouv opwv poreuywsin ewv kaisareiav kai ippeiv ebdomhkonta kai dexiolabouv diakosiouv apo trithv wrav thv nuktov
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.24" type=verse>kthnh te parasthsai ina epibibasantev ton paulon diaswswsin prov fhlika ton hgemona
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.25" type=verse>graqav epistolhn periecousan ton tupon touton
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.23.27" type=verse>ton andra touton sullhfyenta upo twn ioudaiwn kai mellonta anaireisyai up autwn epistav sun tw strateumati exeilomhn auton maywn oti rwmaiov estin

<seg id="b.ACT.27.3" type=verse>th te etera kathcyhmen eiv sidwna filanyrwpwv te o iouliov tw paulw crhsamenov epetreqen prov filouv poreuyenta epimeleiav tucein

<seg id="b.ACT.27.10" type=verse>legwn autoiv andrev yewrw oti meta ubrewv kai pollhv zhmiav ou monon tou fortou kai tou ploiou alla kai twn qucwn hmwn mellein esesyai ton ploun

<seg id="b.ACT.27.12" type=verse>aneuyetou de tou limenov uparcontov prov paraceimasian oi pleiouv eyento boulhn anacyhnai kakeiyen eipwv dunainto katanthsantev eiv foinika paraceimasai limena thv krhthv bleponta kata liba kai kata cwron

<seg id="b.ACT.27.13" type=verse>upopneusantov de notou doxantev thv proyesewv kekrathkenai arantev asson parelegonto thn krhthn

<seg id="b.ACT.27.15" type=verse>sunarpasyentov de tou ploiou kai mh dunamenou antofyalmein tw anemw epidontev eferomeya
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.27.16" type=verse>nhsion de ti upodramontev kaloumenon klaudhn moliv iscusamen perikrateiv genesyai thv skafhv

<seg id="b.ACT.27.17" type=verse>hn arantev bohyeiaiv ecrwnto upozwnnuntev to ploion foboumenoi te mh eiv thn surtin ekpeswsin calasantev to skeuov outwv eferonto
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.27.18" type=verse>sfodrwv de ceimazomenwn hmwn th exhv ekbolhn epoiounto
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.27.19" type=verse>kai th trith autoceirev thn skeuhn tou ploiou erriqamen
</seg>
<seg id="b.ACT.27.20" type=verse>mhte de hliou mhte astrwn epifainontwn epi pleionav hmerav ceimwnov te ouk oligou epikeimenou loipon perihreito pasa elpiv tou swzesyai hmav
</seg>

<seg id="b.1CO.1.18" type=verse>o logov gar o tou staurou toiv men apollumenoiv mwria estin toiv de swzomenoiv hmin dunamiv yeou estin

<seg id="b.1CO.1.19" type=verse>gegraptai gar apolw thn sofian twn sofwn kai thn sunesin twn sunetwn ayethsw
</seg>
<seg id="b.1CO.1.20" type=verse>pou sofov pou grammateuv pou suzhththv tou aiwnov toutou ouci emwranen o yeov thn sofian tou kosmou toutou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1CO.1.21" type=verse>epeidh gar en th sofia tou yeou ouk egnw o kosmov dia thv sofiav ton yeon eudokhsen o yeov dia thv mwriav tou khrugmatov swsai touv pisteuontav
</seg>
<seg id="b.1CO.1.22" type=verse>epeidh kai ioudaioi shmeion aitousin kai ellhnev sofian zhtousin
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<div id="b.1CO.12" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.1CO.12.1" type=verse>peri de twn pneumatikwn adelfoi ou yelw umav agnoein
</seg>
<seg id="b.1CO.12.2" type=verse>oidate oti eynh hte prov ta eidwla ta afwna wv an hgesye apagomenoi
</seg>
<seg id="b.1CO.12.3" type=verse>dio gnwrizw umin oti oudeiv en pneumati yeou lalwn legei anayema ihsoun kai oudeiv dunatai eipein kurion ihsoun ei mh en pneumati agiw
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<div id="b.GAL.4" type=chapter>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.GAL.4.14" type=verse>kai ton peirasmon mou ton en th sarki mou ouk exouyenhsate oude exeptusate all wv aggelon yeou edexasye me wv criston ihsoun

<seg id="b.GAL.4.15" type=verse>tiv oun hn o makarismov umwn marturw gar umin oti ei dunaton touv ofyalmouv umwn exoruxantev an edwkate moi

<seg id="b.GAL.4.16" type=verse>wste ecyrov umwn gegona alhyeuwn umin
</seg>
<seg id="b.GAL.4.17" type=verse>zhlousin umav ou kalwv alla ekkleisai umav yelousin ina autouv zhloute
</seg>
<seg id="b.GAL.4.18" type=verse>kalon de to zhlousyai en kalw pantote kai mh monon en tw pareinai me prov umav
</seg>
<seg id="b.GAL.4.19" type=verse>teknia mou ouv palin wdinw acriv ou morfwyh cristov en umin
</seg>
<seg id="b.GAL.4.20" type=verse>hyelon de pareinai prov umav arti kai allaxai thn fwnhn mou oti aporoumai en umin
</seg>
<seg id="b.GAL.4.21" type=verse>legete moi oi upo nomon yelontev einai ton nomon ouk akouete
</seg>
<seg id="b.GAL.4.22" type=verse>gegraptai gar oti abraam duo uiouv escen ena ek thv paidiskhv kai ena ek thv eleuyerav

</seg>

<seg id="b.GAL.4.26" type=verse>h de anw ierousalhm eleuyera estin htiv estin mhthr pantwn hmwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.GAL.4.27" type=verse>gegraptai gar eufranyhti steira h ou tiktousa rhxon kai bohson h ouk wdinousa oti polla ta tekna thv erhmou mallon h thv ecoushv ton andra

<div id="b.GAL.5" type=chapter>

</seg>

<div id="b.EPH.3" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.EPH.3.10" type=verse>ina gnwrisyh nun taiv arcaiv kai taiv exousiaiv en toiv epouranioiv dia thv ekklhsiav h polupoikilov sofia tou yeou

<seg id="b.EPH.3.13" type=verse>dio aitoumai mh ekkakein en taiv yliqesin mou uper umwn htiv estin doxa umwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.EPH.3.14" type=verse>toutou carin kamptw ta gonata mou prov ton patera tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou
</seg>
<seg id="b.EPH.3.15" type=verse>ex ou pasa patria en ouranoiv kai epi ghv onomazetai
</seg>
<seg id="b.EPH.3.16" type=verse>ina dwh umin kata ton plouton thv doxhv autou dunamei krataiwyhnai dia tou pneumatov autou eiv ton esw anyrwpon
</seg>
<seg id="b.EPH.3.17" type=verse>katoikhsai ton criston dia thv pistewv en taiv kardiaiv umwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.EPH.3.18" type=verse>en agaph errizwmenoi kai teyemeliwmenoi ina exiscushte katalabesyai sun pasin toiv agioiv ti to platov kai mhkov kai bayov kai uqov
</seg>
<seg id="b.EPH.3.19" type=verse>gnwnai te thn uperballousan thv gnwsewv agaphn tou cristou ina plhrwyhte eiv pan to plhrwma tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.EPH.3.20" type=verse>tw de dunamenw uper panta poihsai uper ek perissou wn aitoumeya h nooumen kata thn dunamin thn energoumenhn en hmin
</seg>

</seg>

<div id="b.EPH.4" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.PHI.1.1" type=verse>paulov kai timoyeov douloi ihsou cristou pasin toiv agioiv en cristw ihsou toiv ousin en filippoiv sun episkopoiv kai diakonoiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.2" type=verse>cariv umin kai eirhnh apo yeou patrov hmwn kai kuriou ihsou cristou
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.4" type=verse>pantote en pash dehsei mou uper pantwn umwn meta carav thn dehsin poioumenov
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.5" type=verse>epi th koinwnia umwn eiv to euaggelion apo prwthv hmerav acri tou nun
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.7" type=verse>kaywv estin dikaion emoi touto fronein uper pantwn umwn dia to ecein me en th kardia umav en te toiv desmoiv mou kai th apologia kai bebaiwsei tou euaggeliou sugkoinwnouv mou thv caritov pantav umav ontav
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.8" type=verse>martuv gar mou estin o yeov wv epipoyw pantav umav en splagcnoiv ihsou cristou
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.9" type=verse>kai touto proseucomai ina h agaph umwn eti mallon kai mallon perisseuh en epignwsei kai pash aisyhsei
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.13" type=verse>wste touv desmouv mou fanerouv en cristw genesyai en olw tw praitwriw kai toiv loipoiv pasin
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.14" type=verse>kai touv pleionav twn adelfwn en kuriw pepoiyotav toiv desmoiv mou perissoterwv tolman afobwv ton logon lalein
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.15" type=verse>tinev men kai dia fyonon kai erin tinev de kai di eudokian ton criston khrussousin
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.16" type=verse>oi men ex eriyeiav ton criston kataggellousin ouc agnwv oiomenoi yliqin epiferein toiv desmoiv mou
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.17" type=verse>oi de ex agaphv eidotev oti eiv apologian tou euaggeliou keimai
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.18" type=verse>ti gar plhn panti tropw eite profasei eite alhyeia cristov kataggelletai kai en toutw cairw alla kai carhsomai
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.19" type=verse>oida gar oti touto moi apobhsetai eiv swthrian dia thv umwn dehsewv kai epicorhgiav tou pneumatov ihsou cristou
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.20" type=verse>kata thn apokaradokian kai elpida mou oti en oudeni aiscunyhsomai all en pash parrhsia wv pantote kai nun megalunyhsetai cristov en tw swmati mou eite dia zwhv eite dia yanatou
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.21" type=verse>emoi gar to zhn cristov kai to apoyanein kerdov
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.22" type=verse>ei de to zhn en sarki touto moi karpov ergou kai ti airhsomai ou gnwrizw
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.23" type=verse>sunecomai gar ek twn duo thn epiyumian ecwn eiv to analusai kai sun cristw einai pollw mallon kreisson
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.24" type=verse>to de epimenein en th sarki anagkaioteron di umav
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.25" type=verse>kai touto pepoiywv oida oti menw kai sumparamenw pasin umin eiv thn umwn prokophn kai caran thv pistewv
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.26" type=verse>ina to kauchma umwn perisseuh en cristw ihsou en emoi dia thv emhv parousiav palin prov umav
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.27" type=verse>monon axiwv tou euaggeliou tou cristou politeuesye ina eite elywn kai idwn umav eite apwn akousw ta peri umwn oti sthkete en eni pneumati mia quch sunaylountev th pistei tou euaggeliou
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.28" type=verse>kai mh pturomenoi en mhdeni upo twn antikeimenwn htiv autoiv men estin endeixiv apwleiav umin de swthriav kai touto apo yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.29" type=verse>oti umin ecarisyh to uper cristou ou monon to eiv auton pisteuein alla kai to uper autou pascein
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.1.30" type=verse>ton auton agwna econtev oion idete en emoi kai nun akouete en emoi
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.PHI.2" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.PHI.2.1" type=verse>ei tiv oun paraklhsiv en cristw ei ti paramuyion agaphv ei tiv koinwnia pneumatov ei tina splagcna kai oiktirmoi
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.2.2" type=verse>plhrwsate mou thn caran ina to auto fronhte thn authn agaphn econtev sumqucoi to en fronountev
</seg>
<seg id="b.PHI.2.3" type=verse>mhden kata eriyeian h kenodoxian alla th tapeinofrosunh allhlouv hgoumenoi uperecontav eautwn
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<div id="b.COL.3" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.COL.3.1" type=verse>ei oun sunhgeryhte tw cristw ta anw zhteite ou o cristov estin en dexia tou yeou kayhmenov
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.2" type=verse>ta anw froneite mh ta epi thv ghv
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.3" type=verse>apeyanete gar kai h zwh umwn kekruptai sun tw cristw en tw yew
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.4" type=verse>otan o cristov fanerwyh h zwh hmwn tote kai umeiv sun autw fanerwyhsesye en doxh
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.5" type=verse>nekrwsate oun ta melh umwn ta epi thv ghv porneian akayarsian payov epiyumian kakhn kai thn pleonexian htiv estin eidwlolatreia
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.6" type=verse>di a ercetai h orgh tou yeou epi touv uiouv thv apeiyeiav
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.12" type=verse>endusasye oun wv eklektoi tou yeou agioi kai hgaphmenoi splagcna oiktirmwn crhstothta tapeinofrosunhn praothta makroyumian
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.13" type=verse>anecomenoi allhlwn kai carizomenoi eautoiv ean tiv prov tina ech momfhn kaywv kai o cristov ecarisato umin outwv kai umeiv

<seg id="b.COL.3.14" type=verse>epi pasin de toutoiv thn agaphn htiv estin sundesmov thv teleiothtov
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.15" type=verse>kai h eirhnh tou yeou brabeuetw en taiv kardiaiv umwn eiv hn kai eklhyhte en eni swmati kai eucaristoi ginesye
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.16" type=verse>o logov tou cristou enoikeitw en umin plousiwv en pash sofia didaskontev kai nouyetountev eautouv qalmoiv kai umnoiv kai wdaiv pneumatikaiv en cariti adontev en th kardia umwn tw kuriw

</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.18" type=verse>ai gunaikev upotassesye toiv idioiv andrasin wv anhken en kuriw
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.19" type=verse>oi andrev agapate tav gunaikav kai mh pikrainesye prov autav
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.20" type=verse>ta tekna upakouete toiv goneusin kata panta touto gar estin euareston tw kuriw
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.21" type=verse>oi paterev mh ereyizete ta tekna umwn ina mh ayumwsin
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.22" type=verse>oi douloi upakouete kata panta toiv kata sarka kurioiv mh en ofyalmodouleiaiv wv anyrwpareskoi all en aplothti kardiav foboumenoi ton yeon
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.23" type=verse>kai pan o ti ean poihte ek quchv ergazesye wv tw kuriw kai ouk anyrwpoiv
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.3.25" type=verse>o de adikwn komieitai o hdikhsen kai ouk estin proswpolhqia
</seg>

<div id="b.COL.4" type=chapter>

</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.4.10" type=verse>aspazetai umav aristarcov o sunaicmalwtov mou kai markov o aneqiov barnaba peri ou elabete entolav ean elyh prov umav dexasye auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.4.11" type=verse>kai ihsouv o legomenov ioustov oi ontev ek peritomhv outoi monoi sunergoi eiv thn basileian tou yeou oitinev egenhyhsan moi parhgoria
</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.4.12" type=verse>aspazetai umav epafrav o ex umwn doulov cristou pantote agwnizomenov uper umwn en taiv proseucaiv ina sthte teleioi kai peplhrwmenoi en panti yelhmati tou yeou

</seg>
<seg id="b.COL.4.16" type=verse>kai otan anagnwsyh par umin h epistolh poihsate ina kai en th laodikewn ekklhsia anagnwsyh kai thn ek laodikeiav ina kai umeiv anagnwte
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.1TH.1.9" type=verse>autoi gar peri hmwn apaggellousin opoian eisodon ecomen prov umav kai pwv epestreqate prov ton yeon apo twn eidwlwn douleuein yew zwnti kai alhyinw
</seg>
<seg id="b.1TH.1.10" type=verse>kai anamenein ton uion autou ek twn ouranwn on hgeiren ek nekrwn ihsoun ton ruomenon hmav apo thv orghv thv ercomenhv
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.1TH.2.9" type=verse>mnhmoneuete gar adelfoi ton kopon hmwn kai ton mocyon nuktov gar kai hmerav ergazomenoi prov to mh epibarhsai tina umwn ekhruxamen eiv umav to euaggelion tou yeou

</seg>
<seg id="b.1TH.2.16" type=verse>kwluontwn hmav toiv eynesin lalhsai ina swywsin eiv to anaplhrwsai autwn tav amartiav pantote efyasen de ep autouv h orgh eiv telov

<seg id="b.1TH.5.18" type=verse>en panti eucaristeite touto gar yelhma yeou en cristw ihsou eiv umav

<seg id="b.1TH.5.19" type=verse>to pneuma mh sbennute
</seg>
<seg id="b.1TH.5.20" type=verse>profhteiav mh exouyeneite
</seg>
<seg id="b.1TH.5.21" type=verse>panta dokimazete to kalon katecete
</seg>
<seg id="b.1TH.5.22" type=verse>apo pantov eidouv ponhrou apecesye
</seg>
<seg id="b.1TH.5.23" type=verse>autov de o yeov thv eirhnhv agiasai umav oloteleiv kai oloklhron umwn to pneuma kai h quch kai to swma amemptwv en th parousia tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou thrhyeih
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.2TH.1.4" type=verse>wste hmav autouv en umin kaucasyai en taiv ekklhsiaiv tou yeou uper thv upomonhv umwn kai pistewv en pasin toiv diwgmoiv umwn kai taiv yliqesin aiv anecesye

</seg>
<seg id="b.2TH.1.8" type=verse>en puri flogov didontov ekdikhsin toiv mh eidosin yeon kai toiv mh upakouousin tw euaggeliw tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.2TH.1.11" type=verse>eiv o kai proseucomeya pantote peri umwn ina umav axiwsh thv klhsewv o yeov hmwn kai plhrwsh pasan eudokian agaywsunhv kai ergon pistewv en dunamei
</seg>
<seg id="b.2TH.1.12" type=verse>opwv endoxasyh to onoma tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou en umin kai umeiv en autw kata thn carin tou yeou hmwn kai kuriou ihsou cristou
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

<seg id="b.1TI.5.7" type=verse>kai tauta paraggelle ina anepilhptoi wsin
</seg>

<div id="b.TIT" type=book>
<div id="b.TIT.1" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.TIT.1.1" type=verse>paulov doulov yeou apostolov de ihsou cristou kata pistin eklektwn yeou kai epignwsin alhyeiav thv kat eusebeian
</seg>
<seg id="b.TIT.1.2" type=verse>ep elpidi zwhv aiwniou hn ephggeilato o aqeudhv yeov pro cronwn aiwniwn
</seg>

<seg id="b.HEB.4.5" type=verse>kai en toutw palin ei eiseleusontai eiv thn katapausin mou
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.4.6" type=verse>epei oun apoleipetai tinav eiselyein eiv authn kai oi proteron euaggelisyentev ouk eishlyon di apeiyeian
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.4.7" type=verse>palin tina orizei hmeran shmeron en dabid legwn meta tosouton cronon kaywv eirhtai shmeron ean thv fwnhv autou akoushte mh sklhrunhte tav kardiav umwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.4.8" type=verse>ei gar autouv ihsouv katepausen ouk an peri allhv elalei meta tauta hmerav
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.4.9" type=verse>ara apoleipetai sabbatismov tw law tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.4.10" type=verse>o gar eiselywn eiv thn katapausin autou kai autov katepausen apo twn ergwn autou wsper apo twn idiwn o yeov
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.4.11" type=verse>spoudaswmen oun eiselyein eiv ekeinhn thn katapausin ina mh en tw autw tiv upodeigmati pesh thv apeiyeiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.4.12" type=verse>zwn gar o logov tou yeou kai energhv kai tomwterov uper pasan macairan distomon kai diiknoumenov acri merismou quchv te kai pneumatov armwn te kai muelwn kai kritikov enyumhsewn kai ennoiwn kardiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.4.13" type=verse>kai ouk estin ktisiv afanhv enwpion autou panta de gumna kai tetrachlismena toiv ofyalmoiv autou prov on hmin o logov
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.4.14" type=verse>econtev oun arcierea megan dielhluyota touv ouranouv ihsoun ton uion tou yeou kratwmen thv omologiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.4.15" type=verse>ou gar ecomen arcierea mh dunamenon sumpayhsai taiv asyeneiaiv hmwn pepeiramenon de kata panta kay omoiothta cwriv amartiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.4.16" type=verse>prosercwmeya oun meta parrhsiav tw yronw thv caritov ina labwmen eleon kai carin eurwmen eiv eukairon bohyeian
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.HEB.5" type=chapter>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.5.12" type=verse>kai gar ofeilontev einai didaskaloi dia ton cronon palin creian ecete tou didaskein umav tina ta stoiceia thv archv twn logiwn tou yeou kai gegonate creian econtev galaktov kai ou stereav trofhv

</seg>

<seg id="b.HEB.9.10" type=verse>monon epi brwmasin kai pomasin kai diaforoiv baptismoiv kai dikaiwmasin sarkov mecri kairou diorywsewv epikeimena

</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.9.14" type=verse>posw mallon to aima tou cristou ov dia pneumatov aiwniou eauton proshnegken amwmon tw yew kayariei thn suneidhsin umwn apo nekrwn ergwn eiv to latreuein yew zwnti
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.9.15" type=verse>kai dia touto diayhkhv kainhv mesithv estin opwv yanatou genomenou eiv apolutrwsin twn epi th prwth diayhkh parabasewn thn epaggelian labwsin oi keklhmenoi thv aiwniou klhronomiav

</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.9.24" type=verse>ou gar eiv ceiropoihta agia eishlyen o cristov antitupa twn alhyinwn all eiv auton ton ouranon nun emfanisyhnai tw proswpw tou yeou uper hmwn

<seg id="b.HEB.9.25" type=verse>oud ina pollakiv prosferh eauton wsper o arciereuv eisercetai eiv ta agia kat eniauton en aimati allotriw

<seg id="b.HEB.9.26" type=verse>epei edei auton pollakiv payein apo katabolhv kosmou nun de apax epi sunteleia twn aiwnwn eiv ayethsin amartiav dia thv yusiav autou pefanerwtai

<seg id="b.HEB.9.27" type=verse>kai kay oson apokeitai toiv anyrwpoiv apax apoyanein meta de touto krisiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.9.28" type=verse>outwv o cristov apax prosenecyeiv eiv to pollwn anenegkein amartiav ek deuterou cwriv amartiav ofyhsetai toiv auton apekdecomenoiv eiv swthrian
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.HEB.10" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.1" type=verse>skian gar ecwn o nomov twn mellontwn agaywn ouk authn thn eikona twn pragmatwn kat eniauton taiv autaiv yusiaiv av prosferousin eiv to dihnekev oudepote dunatai touv prosercomenouv teleiwsai
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.2" type=verse>epei ouk an epausanto prosferomenai dia to mhdemian ecein eti suneidhsin amartiwn touv latreuontav apax kekayarmenouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.3" type=verse>all en autaiv anamnhsiv amartiwn kat eniauton
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.4" type=verse>adunaton gar aima taurwn kai tragwn afairein amartiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.5" type=verse>dio eisercomenov eiv ton kosmon legei yusian kai prosforan ouk hyelhsav swma de kathrtisw moi
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.6" type=verse>olokautwmata kai peri amartiav ouk eudokhsav
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.7" type=verse>tote eipon idou hkw en kefalidi bibliou gegraptai peri emou tou poihsai o yeov to yelhma sou
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.8" type=verse>anwteron legwn oti yusian kai prosforan kai olokautwmata kai peri amartiav ouk hyelhsav oude eudokhsav aitinev kata ton nomon prosferontai
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.9" type=verse>tote eirhken idou hkw tou poihsai o yeov to yelhma sou anairei to prwton ina to deuteron sthsh
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.10" type=verse>en w yelhmati hgiasmenoi esmen oi dia thv prosforav tou swmatov tou ihsou cristou efapax
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.11" type=verse>kai pav men iereuv esthken kay hmeran leitourgwn kai tav autav pollakiv prosferwn yusiav aitinev oudepote dunantai perielein amartiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.12" type=verse>autov de mian uper amartiwn prosenegkav yusian eiv to dihnekev ekayisen en dexia tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.13" type=verse>to loipon ekdecomenov ewv teywsin oi ecyroi autou upopodion twn podwn autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.14" type=verse>mia gar prosfora teteleiwken eiv to dihnekev touv agiazomenouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.15" type=verse>marturei de hmin kai to pneuma to agion meta gar to proeirhkenai
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.16" type=verse>auth h diayhkh hn diayhsomai prov autouv meta tav hmerav ekeinav legei kuriov didouv nomouv mou epi kardiav autwn kai epi twn dianoiwn autwn epigraqw autouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.17" type=verse>kai twn amartiwn autwn kai twn anomiwn autwn ou mh mnhsyw eti
</seg>

</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.20" type=verse>hn enekainisen hmin odon prosfaton kai zwsan dia tou katapetasmatov toutestin thv sarkov autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.21" type=verse>kai ierea megan epi ton oikon tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.22" type=verse>prosercwmeya meta alhyinhv kardiav en plhroforia pistewv errantismenoi tav kardiav apo suneidhsewv ponhrav kai leloumenoi to swma udati kayarw
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.23" type=verse>katecwmen thn omologian thv elpidov aklinh pistov gar o epaggeilamenov
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.24" type=verse>kai katanowmen allhlouv eiv paroxusmon agaphv kai kalwn ergwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.25" type=verse>mh egkataleipontev thn episunagwghn eautwn kaywv eyov tisin alla parakalountev kai tosoutw mallon osw blepete eggizousan thn hmeran
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.26" type=verse>ekousiwv gar amartanontwn hmwn meta to labein thn epignwsin thv alhyeiav ouketi peri amartiwn apoleipetai yusia
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.27" type=verse>fobera de tiv ekdoch krisewv kai purov zhlov esyiein mellontov touv upenantiouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.28" type=verse>ayethsav tiv nomon mwsewv cwriv oiktirmwn epi dusin h trisin martusin apoynhskei
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.29" type=verse>posw dokeite ceironov axiwyhsetai timwriav o ton uion tou yeou katapathsav kai to aima thv diayhkhv koinon hghsamenov en w hgiasyh kai to pneuma thv caritov enubrisav
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.30" type=verse>oidamen gar ton eiponta emoi ekdikhsiv egw antapodwsw legei kuriov kai palin kuriov krinei ton laon autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.31" type=verse>foberon to empesein eiv ceirav yeou zwntov
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.32" type=verse>anamimnhskesye de tav proteron hmerav en aiv fwtisyentev pollhn aylhsin upemeinate payhmatwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.33" type=verse>touto men oneidismoiv te kai yliqesin yeatrizomenoi touto de koinwnoi twn outwv anastrefomenwn genhyentev
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.34" type=verse>kai gar toiv desmoiv mou sunepayhsate kai thn arpaghn twn uparcontwn umwn meta carav prosedexasye ginwskontev ecein en eautoiv kreittona uparxin en ouranoiv kai menousan
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.35" type=verse>mh apobalhte oun thn parrhsian umwn htiv ecei misyapodosian megalhn
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.36" type=verse>upomonhv gar ecete creian ina to yelhma tou yeou poihsantev komishsye thn epaggelian
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.37" type=verse>eti gar mikron oson oson o ercomenov hxei kai ou croniei
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.10.39" type=verse>hmeiv de ouk esmen upostolhv eiv apwleian alla pistewv eiv peripoihsin quchv
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.HEB.11" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.HEB.11.8" type=verse>pistei kaloumenov abraam uphkousen exelyein eiv ton topon on hmellen lambanein eiv klhronomian kai exhlyen mh epistamenov pou ercetai

<seg id="b.HEB.11.17" type=verse>pistei prosenhnocen abraam ton isaak peirazomenov kai ton monogenh proseferen o tav epaggeliav anadexamenov

<seg id="b.HEB.11.23" type=verse>pistei mwshv gennhyeiv ekrubh trimhnon upo twn paterwn autou dioti eidon asteion to paidion kai ouk efobhyhsan to diatagma tou basilewv

</seg>

</seg>

<div id="b.HEB.13" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.1" type=verse>h filadelfia menetw
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.2" type=verse>thv filoxeniav mh epilanyanesye dia tauthv gar elayon tinev xenisantev aggelouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.3" type=verse>mimnhskesye twn desmiwn wv sundedemenoi twn kakoucoumenwn wv kai autoi ontev en swmati

<seg id="b.HEB.13.4" type=verse>timiov o gamov en pasin kai h koith amiantov pornouv de kai moicouv krinei o yeov
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.5" type=verse>afilargurov o tropov arkoumenoi toiv parousin autov gar eirhken ou mh se anw oud ou mh se egkatalipw

<seg id="b.HEB.13.6" type=verse>wste yarrountav hmav legein kuriov emoi bohyov kai ou fobhyhsomai ti poihsei moi anyrwpov

<seg id="b.HEB.13.7" type=verse>mnhmoneuete twn hgoumenwn umwn oitinev elalhsan umin ton logon tou yeou wn anayewrountev thn ekbasin thv anastrofhv mimeisye thn pistin

<seg id="b.HEB.13.8" type=verse>ihsouv cristov cyev kai shmeron o autov kai eiv touv aiwnav

<seg id="b.HEB.13.9" type=verse>didacaiv poikilaiv kai xenaiv mh periferesye kalon gar cariti bebaiousyai thn kardian ou brwmasin en oiv ouk wfelhyhsan oi peripathsantev

<seg id="b.HEB.13.10" type=verse>ecomen yusiasthrion ex ou fagein ouk ecousin exousian oi th skhnh latreuontev
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.11" type=verse>wn gar eisferetai zwwn to aima peri amartiav eiv ta agia dia tou arcierewv toutwn ta swmata katakaietai exw thv parembolhv
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.12" type=verse>dio kai ihsouv ina agiash dia tou idiou aimatov ton laon exw thv pulhv epayen
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.13" type=verse>toinun exercwmeya prov auton exw thv parembolhv ton oneidismon autou ferontev
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.14" type=verse>ou gar ecomen wde menousan polin alla thn mellousan epizhtoumen
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.15" type=verse>di autou oun anaferwmen yusian ainesewv diapantov tw yew toutestin karpon ceilewn omologountwn tw onomati autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.16" type=verse>thv de eupoiiav kai koinwniav mh epilanyanesye toiautaiv gar yusiaiv euaresteitai o yeov
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.17" type=verse>peiyesye toiv hgoumenoiv umwn kai upeikete autoi gar agrupnousin uper twn qucwn umwn wv logon apodwsontev ina meta carav touto poiwsin kai mh stenazontev alusitelev gar umin touto
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.18" type=verse>proseucesye peri hmwn pepoiyamen gar oti kalhn suneidhsin ecomen en pasin kalwv yelontev anastrefesyai
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.19" type=verse>perissoterwv de parakalw touto poihsai ina tacion apokatastayw umin
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.20" type=verse>o de yeov thv eirhnhv o anagagwn ek nekrwn ton poimena twn probatwn ton megan en aimati diayhkhv aiwniou ton kurion hmwn ihsoun
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.21" type=verse>katartisai umav en panti ergw agayw eiv to poihsai to yelhma autou poiwn en umin to euareston enwpion autou dia ihsou cristou w h doxa eiv touv aiwnav twn aiwnwn amhn
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.22" type=verse>parakalw de umav adelfoi anecesye tou logou thv paraklhsewv kai gar dia bracewn epesteila umin
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.23" type=verse>ginwskete ton adelfon timoyeon apolelumenon mey ou ean tacion erchtai oqomai umav
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.24" type=verse>aspasasye pantav touv hgoumenouv umwn kai pantav touv agiouv aspazontai umav oi apo thv italiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.HEB.13.25" type=verse>h cariv meta pantwn umwn amhn [prov ebraiouv egrafh apo thv italiav dia timoyeou]
</seg>
</div>

<seg id="b.1PE.1.3" type=verse>euloghtov o yeov kai pathr tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou o kata to polu autou eleov anagennhsav hmav eiv elpida zwsan di anastasewv ihsou cristou ek nekrwn

</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.7" type=verse>ina to dokimion umwn thv pistewv polu timiwteron crusiou tou apollumenou dia purov de dokimazomenou eureyh eiv epainon kai timhn kai doxan en apokaluqei ihsou cristou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.8" type=verse>on ouk eidotev agapate eiv on arti mh orwntev pisteuontev de agalliasye cara aneklalhtw kai dedoxasmenh
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.9" type=verse>komizomenoi to telov thv pistewv umwn swthrian qucwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.10" type=verse>peri hv swthriav exezhthsan kai exhreunhsan profhtai oi peri thv eiv umav caritov profhteusantev
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.11" type=verse>ereunwntev eiv tina h poion kairon edhlou to en autoiv pneuma cristou promarturomenon ta eiv criston payhmata kai tav meta tauta doxav
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.12" type=verse>oiv apekalufyh oti ouc eautoiv hmin de dihkonoun auta a nun anhggelh umin dia twn euaggelisamenwn umav en pneumati agiw apostalenti ap ouranou eiv a epiyumousin aggeloi parakuqai
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.13" type=verse>dio anazwsamenoi tav osfuav thv dianoiav umwn nhfontev teleiwv elpisate epi thn feromenhn umin carin en apokaluqei ihsou cristou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.14" type=verse>wv tekna upakohv mh suschmatizomenoi taiv proteron en th agnoia umwn epiyumiaiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.15" type=verse>alla kata ton kalesanta umav agion kai autoi agioi en pash anastrofh genhyhte
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.16" type=verse>dioti gegraptai agioi genesye oti egw agiov eimi
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.17" type=verse>kai ei patera epikaleisye ton aproswpolhptwv krinonta kata to ekastou ergon en fobw ton thv paroikiav umwn cronon anastrafhte
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.18" type=verse>eidotev oti ou fyartoiv arguriw h crusiw elutrwyhte ek thv mataiav umwn anastrofhv patroparadotou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.19" type=verse>alla timiw aimati wv amnou amwmou kai aspilou cristou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.20" type=verse>proegnwsmenou men pro katabolhv kosmou fanerwyentov de ep escatwn twn cronwn di umav
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.21" type=verse>touv di autou pisteuontav eiv yeon ton egeiranta auton ek nekrwn kai doxan autw donta wste thn pistin umwn kai elpida einai eiv yeon
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.22" type=verse>tav qucav umwn hgnikotev en th upakoh thv alhyeiav dia pneumatov eiv filadelfian anupokriton ek kayarav kardiav allhlouv agaphsate ektenwv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.23" type=verse>anagegennhmenoi ouk ek sporav fyarthv alla afyartou dia logou zwntov yeou kai menontov eiv ton aiwna
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.24" type=verse>dioti pasa sarx wv cortov kai pasa doxa anyrwpou wv anyov cortou exhranyh o cortov kai to anyov autou exepesen
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.1.25" type=verse>to de rhma kuriou menei eiv ton aiwna touto de estin to rhma to euaggelisyen eiv umav
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.1PE.2" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.1" type=verse>apoyemenoi oun pasan kakian kai panta dolon kai upokriseiv kai fyonouv kai pasav katalaliav
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.2" type=verse>wv artigennhta brefh to logikon adolon gala epipoyhsate ina en autw auxhyhte
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.3" type=verse>eiper egeusasye oti crhstov o kuriov
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.4" type=verse>prov on prosercomenoi liyon zwnta upo anyrwpwn men apodedokimasmenon para de yew eklekton entimon
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.5" type=verse>kai autoi wv liyoi zwntev oikodomeisye oikov pneumatikov ierateuma agion anenegkai pneumatikav yusiav euprosdektouv tw yew dia ihsou cristou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.6" type=verse>dio kai periecei en th grafh idou tiyhmi en siwn liyon akrogwniaion eklekton entimon kai o pisteuwn ep autw ou mh kataiscunyh
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.7" type=verse>umin oun h timh toiv pisteuousin apeiyousin de liyon on apedokimasan oi oikodomountev outov egenhyh eiv kefalhn gwniav
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.8" type=verse>kai liyov proskommatov kai petra skandalou oi proskoptousin tw logw apeiyountev eiv o kai eteyhsan
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.9" type=verse>umeiv de genov eklekton basileion ierateuma eynov agion laov eiv peripoihsin opwv tav aretav exaggeilhte tou ek skotouv umav kalesantov eiv to yaumaston autou fwv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.10" type=verse>oi pote ou laov nun de laov yeou oi ouk hlehmenoi nun de elehyentev
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.11" type=verse>agaphtoi parakalw wv paroikouv kai parepidhmouv apecesyai twn sarkikwn epiyumiwn aitinev strateuontai kata thv quchv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.12" type=verse>thn anastrofhn umwn en toiv eynesin econtev kalhn ina en w katalalousin umwn wv kakopoiwn ek twn kalwn ergwn epopteusantev doxaswsin ton yeon en hmera episkophv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.13" type=verse>upotaghte oun pash anyrwpinh ktisei dia ton kurion eite basilei wv upereconti
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.14" type=verse>eite hgemosin wv di autou pempomenoiv eiv ekdikhsin men kakopoiwn epainon de agayopoiwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.15" type=verse>oti outwv estin to yelhma tou yeou agayopoiountav fimoun thn twn afronwn anyrwpwn agnwsian
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.16" type=verse>wv eleuyeroi kai mh wv epikalumma econtev thv kakiav thn eleuyerian all wv douloi yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.17" type=verse>pantav timhsate thn adelfothta agapate ton yeon fobeisye ton basilea timate
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.18" type=verse>oi oiketai upotassomenoi en panti fobw toiv despotaiv ou monon toiv agayoiv kai epieikesin alla kai toiv skolioiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.19" type=verse>touto gar cariv ei dia suneidhsin yeou upoferei tiv lupav pascwn adikwv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.20" type=verse>poion gar kleov ei amartanontev kai kolafizomenoi upomeneite all ei agayopoiountev kai pascontev upomeneite touto cariv para yew
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.21" type=verse>eiv touto gar eklhyhte oti kai cristov epayen uper hmwn hmin upolimpanwn upogrammon ina epakolouyhshte toiv icnesin autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.22" type=verse>ov amartian ouk epoihsen oude eureyh dolov en tw stomati autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.23" type=verse>ov loidoroumenov ouk anteloidorei pascwn ouk hpeilei paredidou de tw krinonti dikaiwv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.24" type=verse>ov tav amartiav hmwn autov anhnegken en tw swmati autou epi to xulon ina taiv amartiaiv apogenomenoi th dikaiosunh zhswmen ou tw mwlwpi autou iayhte
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.2.25" type=verse>hte gar wv probata planwmena all epestrafhte nun epi ton poimena kai episkopon twn qucwn umwn
</seg>
</div>

<seg id="b.1PE.3.6" type=verse>wv sarra uphkousen tw abraam kurion auton kalousa hv egenhyhte tekna agayopoiousai kai mh foboumenai mhdemian ptohsin

<seg id="b.1PE.3.7" type=verse>oi andrev omoiwv sunoikountev kata gnwsin wv asyenesterw skeuei tw gunaikeiw aponemontev timhn wv kai sugklhronomoi caritov zwhv eiv to mh ekkoptesyai tav proseucav umwn

<seg id="b.1PE.3.10" type=verse>o gar yelwn zwhn agapan kai idein hmerav agayav pausatw thn glwssan autou apo kakou kai ceilh autou tou mh lalhsai dolon

<seg id="b.1PE.3.12" type=verse>oti oi ofyalmoi kuriou epi dikaiouv kai wta autou eiv dehsin autwn proswpon de kuriou epi poiountav kaka

<seg id="b.1PE.3.13" type=verse>kai tiv o kakwswn umav ean tou agayou mimhtai genhsye
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.3.15" type=verse>kurion de ton yeon agiasate en taiv kardiaiv umwn etoimoi de aei prov apologian panti tw aitounti umav logon peri thv en umin elpidov meta prauthtov kai fobou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.3.16" type=verse>suneidhsin econtev agayhn ina en w katalalwsin umwn wv kakopoiwn kataiscunywsin oi ephreazontev umwn thn agayhn en cristw anastrofhn

</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.3.20" type=verse>apeiyhsasin pote ote apax exedeceto h tou yeou makroyumia en hmeraiv nwe kataskeuazomenhv kibwtou eiv hn oligai toutestin oktw qucai dieswyhsan di udatov
</seg>
<seg id="b.1PE.3.21" type=verse>o kai hmav antitupon nun swzei baptisma ou sarkov apoyesiv rupou alla suneidhsewv agayhv eperwthma eiv yeon di anastasewv ihsou cristou

<div id="b.1PE.4" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.1PE.4.11" type=verse>ei tiv lalei wv logia yeou ei tiv diakonei wv ex iscuov hv corhgei o yeov ina en pasin doxazhtai o yeov dia ihsou cristou w estin h doxa kai to kratov eiv touv aiwnav twn aiwnwn amhn

<seg id="b.1PE.4.14" type=verse>ei oneidizesye en onomati cristou makarioi oti to thv doxhv kai to tou yeou pneuma ef umav anapauetai kata men autouv blasfhmeitai kata de umav doxazetai
