<div id="b.2PE" type=book>
<div id="b.2PE.1" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.1" type=verse>sumewn petrov doulov kai apostolov ihsou cristou toiv isotimon hmin lacousin pistin en dikaiosunh tou yeou hmwn kai swthrov ihsou cristou
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.2" type=verse>cariv umin kai eirhnh plhyunyeih en epignwsei tou yeou kai ihsou tou kuriou hmwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.3" type=verse>wv panta hmin thv yeiav dunamewv autou ta prov zwhn kai eusebeian dedwrhmenhv dia thv epignwsewv tou kalesantov hmav dia doxhv kai arethv
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.4" type=verse>di wn ta megista hmin kai timia epaggelmata dedwrhtai ina dia toutwn genhsye yeiav koinwnoi fusewv apofugontev thv en kosmw en epiyumia fyorav
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.5" type=verse>kai auto touto de spoudhn pasan pareisenegkantev epicorhghsate en th pistei umwn thn arethn en de th areth thn gnwsin
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.6" type=verse>en de th gnwsei thn egkrateian en de th egkrateia thn upomonhn en de th upomonh thn eusebeian
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.7" type=verse>en de th eusebeia thn filadelfian en de th filadelfia thn agaphn
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.8" type=verse>tauta gar umin uparconta kai pleonazonta ouk argouv oude akarpouv kayisthsin eiv thn tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou epignwsin
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.9" type=verse>w gar mh parestin tauta tuflov estin muwpazwn lhyhn labwn tou kayarismou twn palai autou amartiwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.10" type=verse>dio mallon adelfoi spoudasate bebaian umwn thn klhsin kai ekloghn poieisyai tauta gar poiountev ou mh ptaishte pote
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.11" type=verse>outwv gar plousiwv epicorhghyhsetai umin h eisodov eiv thn aiwnion basileian tou kuriou hmwn kai swthrov ihsou cristou
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.12" type=verse>dio ouk amelhsw umav aei upomimnhskein peri toutwn kaiper eidotav kai esthrigmenouv en th paroush alhyeia
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.13" type=verse>dikaion de hgoumai ef oson eimi en toutw tw skhnwmati diegeirein umav en upomnhsei
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.14" type=verse>eidwv oti tacinh estin h apoyesiv tou skhnwmatov mou kaywv kai o kuriov hmwn ihsouv cristov edhlwsen moi
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.15" type=verse>spoudasw de kai ekastote ecein umav meta thn emhn exodon thn toutwn mnhmhn poieisyai
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.16" type=verse>ou gar sesofismenoiv muyoiv exakolouyhsantev egnwrisamen umin thn tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou dunamin kai parousian all epoptai genhyentev thv ekeinou megaleiothtov
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.17" type=verse>labwn gar para yeou patrov timhn kai doxan fwnhv enecyeishv autw toiasde upo thv megaloprepouv doxhv outov estin o uiov mou o agaphtov eiv on egw eudokhsa
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.18" type=verse>kai tauthn thn fwnhn hmeiv hkousamen ex ouranou enecyeisan sun autw ontev en tw orei tw agiw
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.19" type=verse>kai ecomen bebaioteron ton profhtikon logon w kalwv poieite prosecontev wv lucnw fainonti en aucmhrw topw ewv ou hmera diaugash kai fwsforov anateilh en taiv kardiaiv umwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.20" type=verse>touto prwton ginwskontev oti pasa profhteia grafhv idiav epilusewv ou ginetai
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.1.21" type=verse>ou gar yelhmati anyrwpou hnecyh pote profhteia all upo pneumatov agiou feromenoi elalhsan oi agioi yeou anyrwpoi
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.2PE.2" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.1" type=verse>egenonto de kai qeudoprofhtai en tw law wv kai en umin esontai qeudodidaskaloi oitinev pareisaxousin aireseiv apwleiav kai ton agorasanta autouv despothn arnoumenoi epagontev eautoiv tacinhn apwleian
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.2" type=verse>kai polloi exakolouyhsousin autwn taiv apwleiaiv di ouv h odov thv alhyeiav blasfhmhyhsetai
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.3" type=verse>kai en pleonexia plastoiv logoiv umav emporeusontai oiv to krima ekpalai ouk argei kai h apwleia autwn ou nustazei
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.4" type=verse>ei gar o yeov aggelwn amarthsantwn ouk efeisato alla seiraiv zofou tartarwsav paredwken eiv krisin tethrhmenouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.5" type=verse>kai arcaiou kosmou ouk efeisato all ogdoon nwe dikaiosunhv khruka efulaxen kataklusmon kosmw asebwn epaxav
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.6" type=verse>kai poleiv sodomwn kai gomorrav tefrwsav katastrofh katekrinen upodeigma mellontwn asebein teyeikwv
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.7" type=verse>kai dikaion lwt kataponoumenon upo thv twn ayesmwn en aselgeia anastrofhv errusato
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.8" type=verse>blemmati gar kai akoh o dikaiov egkatoikwn en autoiv hmeran ex hmerav quchn dikaian anomoiv ergoiv ebasanizen
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.9" type=verse>oiden kuriov eusebeiv ek peirasmou ruesyai adikouv de eiv hmeran krisewv kolazomenouv threin
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.10" type=verse>malista de touv opisw sarkov en epiyumia miasmou poreuomenouv kai kuriothtov katafronountav tolmhtai auyadeiv doxav ou tremousin blasfhmountev
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.11" type=verse>opou aggeloi iscui kai dunamei meizonev ontev ou ferousin kat autwn para kuriw blasfhmon krisin
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.12" type=verse>outoi de wv aloga zwa fusika gegenhmena eiv alwsin kai fyoran en oiv agnoousin blasfhmountev en th fyora autwn katafyarhsontai
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.13" type=verse>komioumenoi misyon adikiav hdonhn hgoumenoi thn en hmera trufhn spiloi kai mwmoi entrufwntev en taiv apataiv autwn suneuwcoumenoi umin
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.14" type=verse>ofyalmouv econtev mestouv moicalidov kai akatapaustouv amartiav deleazontev qucav asthriktouv kardian gegumnasmenhn pleonexiaiv econtev katarav tekna
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.15" type=verse>katalipontev thn euyeian odon eplanhyhsan exakolouyhsantev th odw tou balaam tou bosor ov misyon adikiav hgaphsen
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.16" type=verse>elegxin de escen idiav paranomiav upozugion afwnon en anyrwpou fwnh fyegxamenon ekwlusen thn tou profhtou parafronian
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.17" type=verse>outoi eisin phgai anudroi nefelai upo lailapov elaunomenai oiv o zofov tou skotouv eiv aiwna tethrhtai
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.18" type=verse>uperogka gar mataiothtov fyeggomenoi deleazousin en epiyumiaiv sarkov aselgeiaiv touv ontwv apofugontav touv en planh anastrefomenouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.19" type=verse>eleuyerian autoiv epaggellomenoi autoi douloi uparcontev thv fyorav w gar tiv htthtai toutw kai dedoulwtai
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.20" type=verse>ei gar apofugontev ta miasmata tou kosmou en epignwsei tou kuriou kai swthrov ihsou cristou toutoiv de palin emplakentev httwntai gegonen autoiv ta escata ceirona twn prwtwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.21" type=verse>kreitton gar hn autoiv mh epegnwkenai thn odon thv dikaiosunhv h epignousin epistreqai ek thv paradoyeishv autoiv agiav entolhv
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.2.22" type=verse>sumbebhken de autoiv to thv alhyouv paroimiav kuwn epistreqav epi to idion exerama kai uv lousamenh eiv kulisma borborou
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.2PE.3" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.1" type=verse>tauthn hdh agaphtoi deuteran umin grafw epistolhn en aiv diegeirw umwn en upomnhsei thn eilikrinh dianoian
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.2" type=verse>mnhsyhnai twn proeirhmenwn rhmatwn upo twn agiwn profhtwn kai thv twn apostolwn hmwn entolhv tou kuriou kai swthrov
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.3" type=verse>touto prwton ginwskontev oti eleusontai ep escatou twn hmerwn empaiktai kata tav idiav autwn epiyumiav poreuomenoi
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.4" type=verse>kai legontev pou estin h epaggelia thv parousiav autou af hv gar oi paterev ekoimhyhsan panta outwv diamenei ap archv ktisewv
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.5" type=verse>lanyanei gar autouv touto yelontav oti ouranoi hsan ekpalai kai gh ex udatov kai di udatov sunestwsa tw tou yeou logw
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.6" type=verse>di wn o tote kosmov udati kataklusyeiv apwleto
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.7" type=verse>oi de nun ouranoi kai h gh autou logw teyhsaurismenoi eisin puri throumenoi eiv hmeran krisewv kai apwleiav twn asebwn anyrwpwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.8" type=verse>en de touto mh lanyanetw umav agaphtoi oti mia hmera para kuriw wv cilia eth kai cilia eth wv hmera mia
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.9" type=verse>ou bradunei o kuriov thv epaggeliav wv tinev braduthta hgountai alla makroyumei eiv hmav mh boulomenov tinav apolesyai alla pantav eiv metanoian cwrhsai
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.10" type=verse>hxei de h hmera kuriou wv klepthv en nukti en h oi ouranoi roizhdon pareleusontai stoiceia de kausoumena luyhsontai kai gh kai ta en auth erga katakahsetai
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.11" type=verse>toutwn oun pantwn luomenwn potapouv dei uparcein umav en agiaiv anastrofaiv kai eusebeiaiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.12" type=verse>prosdokwntav kai speudontav thn parousian thv tou yeou hmerav di hn ouranoi puroumenoi luyhsontai kai stoiceia kausoumena thketai
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.13" type=verse>kainouv de ouranouv kai ghn kainhn kata to epaggelma autou prosdokwmen en oiv dikaiosunh katoikei
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.14" type=verse>dio agaphtoi tauta prosdokwntev spoudasate aspiloi kai amwmhtoi autw eureyhnai en eirhnh
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.15" type=verse>kai thn tou kuriou hmwn makroyumian swthrian hgeisye kaywv kai o agaphtov hmwn adelfov paulov kata thn autw doyeisan sofian egraqen umin
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.16" type=verse>wv kai en pasaiv taiv epistolaiv lalwn en autaiv peri toutwn en oiv estin dusnohta tina a oi amayeiv kai asthriktoi streblousin wv kai tav loipav grafav prov thn idian autwn apwleian
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.17" type=verse>umeiv oun agaphtoi proginwskontev fulassesye ina mh th twn ayesmwn planh sunapacyentev ekpeshte tou idiou sthrigmou
</seg>
<seg id="b.2PE.3.18" type=verse>auxanete de en cariti kai gnwsei tou kuriou hmwn kai swthrov ihsou cristou autw h doxa kai nun kai eiv hmeran aiwnov amhn
</seg>
</div>
</div>
<div id="b.1JO" type=book>
<div id="b.1JO.1" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.1JO.1.1" type=verse>o hn ap archv o akhkoamen o ewrakamen toiv ofyalmoiv hmwn o eyeasameya kai ai ceirev hmwn eqhlafhsan peri tou logou thv zwhv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.1.2" type=verse>kai h zwh efanerwyh kai ewrakamen kai marturoumen kai apaggellomen umin thn zwhn thn aiwnion htiv hn prov ton patera kai efanerwyh hmin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.1.3" type=verse>o ewrakamen kai akhkoamen apaggellomen umin ina kai umeiv koinwnian echte mey hmwn kai h koinwnia de h hmetera meta tou patrov kai meta tou uiou autou ihsou cristou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.1.4" type=verse>kai tauta grafomen umin ina h cara hmwn h peplhrwmenh
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.1.5" type=verse>kai auth estin h epaggelia hn akhkoamen ap autou kai anaggellomen umin oti o yeov fwv estin kai skotia en autw ouk estin oudemia
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.1.6" type=verse>ean eipwmen oti koinwnian ecomen met autou kai en tw skotei peripatwmen qeudomeya kai ou poioumen thn alhyeian
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.1.7" type=verse>ean de en tw fwti peripatwmen wv autov estin en tw fwti koinwnian ecomen met allhlwn kai to aima ihsou cristou tou uiou autou kayarizei hmav apo pashv amartiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.1.8" type=verse>ean eipwmen oti amartian ouk ecomen eautouv planwmen kai h alhyeia ouk estin en hmin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.1.9" type=verse>ean omologwmen tav amartiav hmwn pistov estin kai dikaiov ina afh hmin tav amartiav kai kayarish hmav apo pashv adikiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.1.10" type=verse>ean eipwmen oti ouc hmarthkamen qeusthn poioumen auton kai o logov autou ouk estin en hmin
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.1JO.2" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.1" type=verse>teknia mou tauta grafw umin ina mh amarthte kai ean tiv amarth paraklhton ecomen prov ton patera ihsoun criston dikaion
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.2" type=verse>kai autov ilasmov estin peri twn amartiwn hmwn ou peri twn hmeterwn de monon alla kai peri olou tou kosmou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.3" type=verse>kai en toutw ginwskomen oti egnwkamen auton ean tav entolav autou thrwmen
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.4" type=verse>o legwn egnwka auton kai tav entolav autou mh thrwn qeusthv estin kai en toutw h alhyeia ouk estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.5" type=verse>ov d an thrh autou ton logon alhywv en toutw h agaph tou yeou teteleiwtai en toutw ginwskomen oti en autw esmen
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.6" type=verse>o legwn en autw menein ofeilei kaywv ekeinov periepathsen kai autov outwv peripatein
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.7" type=verse>adelfoi ouk entolhn kainhn grafw umin all entolhn palaian hn eicete ap archv h entolh h palaia estin o logov on hkousate ap archv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.8" type=verse>palin entolhn kainhn grafw umin o estin alhyev en autw kai en umin oti h skotia paragetai kai to fwv to alhyinon hdh fainei
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.9" type=verse>o legwn en tw fwti einai kai ton adelfon autou miswn en th skotia estin ewv arti
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.10" type=verse>o agapwn ton adelfon autou en tw fwti menei kai skandalon en autw ouk estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.11" type=verse>o de miswn ton adelfon autou en th skotia estin kai en th skotia peripatei kai ouk oiden pou upagei oti h skotia etuflwsen touv ofyalmouv autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.12" type=verse>grafw umin teknia oti afewntai umin ai amartiai dia to onoma autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.13" type=verse>grafw umin paterev oti egnwkate ton ap archv grafw umin neaniskoi oti nenikhkate ton ponhron grafw umin paidia oti egnwkate ton patera
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.14" type=verse>egraqa umin paterev oti egnwkate ton ap archv egraqa umin neaniskoi oti iscuroi este kai o logov tou yeou en umin menei kai nenikhkate ton ponhron
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.15" type=verse>mh agapate ton kosmon mhde ta en tw kosmw ean tiv agapa ton kosmon ouk estin h agaph tou patrov en autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.16" type=verse>oti pan to en tw kosmw h epiyumia thv sarkov kai h epiyumia twn ofyalmwn kai h alazoneia tou biou ouk estin ek tou patrov all ek tou kosmou estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.17" type=verse>kai o kosmov paragetai kai h epiyumia autou o de poiwn to yelhma tou yeou menei eiv ton aiwna
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.18" type=verse>paidia escath wra estin kai kaywv hkousate oti o anticristov ercetai kai nun anticristoi polloi gegonasin oyen ginwskomen oti escath wra estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.19" type=verse>ex hmwn exhlyon all ouk hsan ex hmwn ei gar hsan ex hmwn memenhkeisan an mey hmwn all ina fanerwywsin oti ouk eisin pantev ex hmwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.20" type=verse>kai umeiv crisma ecete apo tou agiou kai oidate panta
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.21" type=verse>ouk egraqa umin oti ouk oidate thn alhyeian all oti oidate authn kai oti pan qeudov ek thv alhyeiav ouk estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.22" type=verse>tiv estin o qeusthv ei mh o arnoumenov oti ihsouv ouk estin o cristov outov estin o anticristov o arnoumenov ton patera kai ton uion
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.23" type=verse>pav o arnoumenov ton uion oude ton patera ecei
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.24" type=verse>umeiv oun o hkousate ap archv en umin menetw ean en umin meinh o ap archv hkousate kai umeiv en tw uiw kai en tw patri meneite
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.25" type=verse>kai auth estin h epaggelia hn autov ephggeilato hmin thn zwhn thn aiwnion
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.26" type=verse>tauta egraqa umin peri twn planwntwn umav
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.27" type=verse>kai umeiv to crisma o elabete ap autou en umin menei kai ou creian ecete ina tiv didaskh umav all wv to auto crisma didaskei umav peri pantwn kai alhyev estin kai ouk estin qeudov kai kaywv edidaxen umav meneite en autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.28" type=verse>kai nun teknia menete en autw ina otan fanerwyh ecwmen parrhsian kai mh aiscunywmen ap autou en th parousia autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.2.29" type=verse>ean eidhte oti dikaiov estin ginwskete oti pav o poiwn thn dikaiosunhn ex autou gegennhtai
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.1JO.3" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.1" type=verse>idete potaphn agaphn dedwken hmin o pathr ina tekna yeou klhywmen dia touto o kosmov ou ginwskei hmav oti ouk egnw auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.2" type=verse>agaphtoi nun tekna yeou esmen kai oupw efanerwyh ti esomeya oidamen de oti ean fanerwyh omoioi autw esomeya oti oqomeya auton kaywv estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.3" type=verse>kai pav o ecwn thn elpida tauthn ep autw agnizei eauton kaywv ekeinov agnov estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.4" type=verse>pav o poiwn thn amartian kai thn anomian poiei kai h amartia estin h anomia
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.5" type=verse>kai oidate oti ekeinov efanerwyh ina tav amartiav hmwn arh kai amartia en autw ouk estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.6" type=verse>pav o en autw menwn ouc amartanei pav o amartanwn ouc ewraken auton oude egnwken auton
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.7" type=verse>teknia mhdeiv planatw umav o poiwn thn dikaiosunhn dikaiov estin kaywv ekeinov dikaiov estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.8" type=verse>o poiwn thn amartian ek tou diabolou estin oti ap archv o diabolov amartanei eiv touto efanerwyh o uiov tou yeou ina lush ta erga tou diabolou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.9" type=verse>pav o gegennhmenov ek tou yeou amartian ou poiei oti sperma autou en autw menei kai ou dunatai amartanein oti ek tou yeou gegennhtai
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.10" type=verse>en toutw fanera estin ta tekna tou yeou kai ta tekna tou diabolou pav o mh poiwn dikaiosunhn ouk estin ek tou yeou kai o mh agapwn ton adelfon autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.11" type=verse>oti auth estin h aggelia hn hkousate ap archv ina agapwmen allhlouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.12" type=verse>ou kaywv kain ek tou ponhrou hn kai esfaxen ton adelfon autou kai carin tinov esfaxen auton oti ta erga autou ponhra hn ta de tou adelfou autou dikaia
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.13" type=verse>mh yaumazete adelfoi mou ei misei umav o kosmov
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.14" type=verse>hmeiv oidamen oti metabebhkamen ek tou yanatou eiv thn zwhn oti agapwmen touv adelfouv o mh agapwn ton adelfon menei en tw yanatw
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.15" type=verse>pav o miswn ton adelfon autou anyrwpoktonov estin kai oidate oti pav anyrwpoktonov ouk ecei zwhn aiwnion en autw menousan
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.16" type=verse>en toutw egnwkamen thn agaphn oti ekeinov uper hmwn thn quchn autou eyhken kai hmeiv ofeilomen uper twn adelfwn tav qucav tiyenai
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.17" type=verse>ov d an ech ton bion tou kosmou kai yewrh ton adelfon autou creian econta kai kleish ta splagcna autou ap autou pwv h agaph tou yeou menei en autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.18" type=verse>teknia mou mh agapwmen logw mhde glwssh all ergw kai alhyeia
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.19" type=verse>kai en toutw ginwskomen oti ek thv alhyeiav esmen kai emprosyen autou peisomen tav kardiav hmwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.20" type=verse>oti ean kataginwskh hmwn h kardia oti meizwn estin o yeov thv kardiav hmwn kai ginwskei panta
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.21" type=verse>agaphtoi ean h kardia hmwn mh kataginwskh hmwn parrhsian ecomen prov ton yeon
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.22" type=verse>kai o ean aitwmen lambanomen par autou oti tav entolav autou throumen kai ta aresta enwpion autou poioumen
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.23" type=verse>kai auth estin h entolh autou ina pisteuswmen tw onomati tou uiou autou ihsou cristou kai agapwmen allhlouv kaywv edwken entolhn hmin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.3.24" type=verse>kai o thrwn tav entolav autou en autw menei kai autov en autw kai en toutw ginwskomen oti menei en hmin ek tou pneumatov ou hmin edwken
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.1JO.4" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.1JO.4.1" type=verse>agaphtoi mh panti pneumati pisteuete alla dokimazete ta pneumata ei ek tou yeou estin oti polloi qeudoprofhtai exelhluyasin eiv ton kosmon
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.4.2" type=verse>en toutw ginwskete to pneuma tou yeou pan pneuma o omologei ihsoun criston en sarki elhluyota ek tou yeou estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.4.3" type=verse>kai pan pneuma o mh omologei ton ihsoun criston en sarki elhluyota ek tou yeou ouk estin kai touto estin to tou anticristou o akhkoate oti ercetai kai nun en tw kosmw estin hdh
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.4.4" type=verse>umeiv ek tou yeou este teknia kai nenikhkate autouv oti meizwn estin o en umin h o en tw kosmw
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.4.5" type=verse>autoi ek tou kosmou eisin dia touto ek tou kosmou lalousin kai o kosmov autwn akouei
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.4.6" type=verse>hmeiv ek tou yeou esmen o ginwskwn ton yeon akouei hmwn ov ouk estin ek tou yeou ouk akouei hmwn ek toutou ginwskomen to pneuma thv alhyeiav kai to pneuma thv planhv
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.4.7" type=verse>agaphtoi agapwmen allhlouv oti h agaph ek tou yeou estin kai pav o agapwn ek tou yeou gegennhtai kai ginwskei ton yeon
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.4.8" type=verse>o mh agapwn ouk egnw ton yeon oti o yeov agaph estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.4.9" type=verse>en toutw efanerwyh h agaph tou yeou en hmin oti ton uion autou ton monogenh apestalken o yeov eiv ton kosmon ina zhswmen di autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.4.10" type=verse>en toutw estin h agaph ouc oti hmeiv hgaphsamen ton yeon all oti autov hgaphsen hmav kai apesteilen ton uion autou ilasmon peri twn amartiwn hmwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.1JO.4.11" type=verse>agaphtoi ei outwv o yeov hgaphsen hmav kai hmeiv ofeilomen allhlouv agapan
</seg>

<seg id="b.REV.2.8" type=verse>kai tw aggelw thv ekklhsiav smurnaiwn graqon tade legei o prwtov kai o escatov ov egeneto nekrov kai ezhsen
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.9" type=verse>oida sou ta erga kai thn yliqin kai thn ptwceian plousiov de ei kai thn blasfhmian twn legontwn ioudaiouv einai eautouv kai ouk eisin alla sunagwgh tou satana
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.10" type=verse>mhden fobou a melleiv pascein idou mellei balein ex umwn o diabolov eiv fulakhn ina peirasyhte kai exete yliqin hmerwn deka ginou pistov acri yanatou kai dwsw soi ton stefanon thv zwhv
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.11" type=verse>o ecwn ouv akousatw ti to pneuma legei taiv ekklhsiaiv o nikwn ou mh adikhyh ek tou yanatou tou deuterou
</seg>

</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.13" type=verse>oida ta erga sou kai pou katoikeiv opou o yronov tou satana kai krateiv to onoma mou kai ouk hrnhsw thn pistin mou kai en taiv hmeraiv en aiv antipav o martuv mou o pistov ov apektanyh par umin opou katoikei o satanav
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.14" type=verse>all ecw kata sou oliga oti eceiv ekei kratountav thn didachn balaam ov edidasken en tw balak balein skandalon enwpion twn uiwn israhl fagein eidwloyuta kai porneusai
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.15" type=verse>outwv eceiv kai su kratountav thn didachn twn nikolaitwn o misw
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.16" type=verse>metanohson ei de mh ercomai soi tacu kai polemhsw met autwn en th romfaia tou stomatov mou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.17" type=verse>o ecwn ouv akousatw ti to pneuma legei taiv ekklhsiaiv tw nikwnti dwsw autw fagein apo tou manna tou kekrummenou kai dwsw autw qhfon leukhn kai epi thn qhfon onoma kainon gegrammenon o oudeiv egnw ei mh o lambanwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.18" type=verse>kai tw aggelw thv en yuateiroiv ekklhsiav graqon tade legei o uiov tou yeou o ecwn touv ofyalmouv autou wv floga purov kai oi podev autou omoioi calkolibanw
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.19" type=verse>oida sou ta erga kai thn agaphn kai thn diakonian kai thn pistin kai thn upomonhn sou kai ta erga sou kai ta escata pleiona twn prwtwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.20" type=verse>all ecw kata sou oliga oti eav thn gunaika iezabhl thn legousan eauthn profhtin didaskein kai planasyai emouv doulouv porneusai kai eidwloyuta fagein
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.21" type=verse>kai edwka auth cronon ina metanohsh ek thv porneiav authv kai ou metenohsen
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.22" type=verse>idou egw ballw authn eiv klinhn kai touv moiceuontav met authv eiv yliqin megalhn ean mh metanohswsin ek twn ergwn autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.23" type=verse>kai ta tekna authv apoktenw en yanatw kai gnwsontai pasai ai ekklhsiai oti egw eimi o ereunwn nefrouv kai kardiav kai dwsw umin ekastw kata ta erga umwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.2.24" type=verse>umin de legw kai loipoiv toiv en yuateiroiv osoi ouk ecousin thn didachn tauthn kai oitinev ouk egnwsan ta bayh tou satana wv legousin ou balw ef umav allo barov
</seg>

<div id="b.REV.3" type=chapter>

</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.3.2" type=verse>ginou grhgorwn kai sthrixon ta loipa a mellei apoyanein ou gar eurhka sou ta erga peplhrwmena enwpion tou yeou

<seg id="b.REV.3.3" type=verse>mnhmoneue oun pwv eilhfav kai hkousav kai threi kai metanohson ean oun mh grhgorhshv hxw epi se wv klepthv kai ou mh gnwv poian wran hxw epi se

</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.3.9" type=verse>idou didwmi ek thv sunagwghv tou satana twn legontwn eautouv ioudaiouv einai kai ouk eisin alla qeudontai idou poihsw autouv ina hxwsin kai proskunhswsin enwpion twn podwn sou kai gnwsin oti egw hgaphsa se
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.3.10" type=verse>oti ethrhsav ton logon thv upomonhv mou kagw se thrhsw ek thv wrav tou peirasmou thv melloushv ercesyai epi thv oikoumenhv olhv peirasai touv katoikountav epi thv ghv

</seg>

<seg id="b.REV.4.5" type=verse>kai ek tou yronou ekporeuontai astrapai kai brontai kai fwnai kai epta lampadev purov kaiomenai enwpion tou yronou ai eisin ta epta pneumata tou yeou

<seg id="b.REV.4.7" type=verse>kai to zwon to prwton omoion leonti kai to deuteron zwon omoion moscw kai to triton zwon econ to proswpon wv anyrwpov kai to tetarton zwon omoion aetw petwmenw

<seg id="b.REV.4.8" type=verse>kai tessara zwa en kay eauto eicon ana pterugav ex kukloyen kai eswyen gemonta ofyalmwn kai anapausin ouk ecousin hmerav kai nuktov legonta agiov agiov agiov kuriov o yeov o pantokratwr o hn kai o wn kai o ercomenov
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.4.9" type=verse>kai otan dwsousin ta zwa doxan kai timhn kai eucaristian tw kayhmenw epi tou yronou tw zwnti eiv touv aiwnav twn aiwnwn

<seg id="b.REV.4.11" type=verse>axiov ei kurie labein thn doxan kai thn timhn kai thn dunamin oti su ektisav ta panta kai dia to yelhma sou eisin kai ektisyhsan
</seg>

<div id="b.REV.7" type=chapter>

<seg id="b.REV.7.11" type=verse>kai pantev oi aggeloi esthkesan kuklw tou yronou kai twn presbuterwn kai twn tessarwn zwwn kai epeson enwpion tou yronou epi proswpon autwn kai prosekunhsan tw yew
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.7.12" type=verse>legontev amhn h eulogia kai h doxa kai h sofia kai h eucaristia kai h timh kai h dunamiv kai h iscuv tw yew hmwn eiv touv aiwnav twn aiwnwn amhn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.7.13" type=verse>kai apekriyh eiv ek twn presbuterwn legwn moi outoi oi peribeblhmenoi tav stolav tav leukav tinev eisin kai poyen hlyon
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.7.14" type=verse>kai eirhka autw kurie su oidav kai eipen moi outoi eisin oi ercomenoi ek thv yliqewv thv megalhv kai eplunan tav stolav autwn kai eleukanan stolav autwn en tw aimati tou arniou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.7.15" type=verse>dia touto eisin enwpion tou yronou tou yeou kai latreuousin autw hmerav kai nuktov en tw naw autou kai o kayhmenov epi tou yronou skhnwsei ep autouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.7.16" type=verse>ou peinasousin eti oude diqhsousin eti oude mh pesh ep autouv o hliov oude pan kauma
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.7.17" type=verse>oti to arnion to anameson tou yronou poimanei autouv kai odhghsei autouv epi zwsav phgav udatwn kai exaleiqei o yeov pan dakruon apo twn ofyalmwn autwn
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.REV.8" type=chapter>

</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.8.8" type=verse>kai o deuterov aggelov esalpisen kai wv orov mega puri kaiomenon eblhyh eiv thn yalassan kai egeneto to triton thv yalasshv aima

<seg id="b.REV.8.11" type=verse>kai to onoma tou asterov legetai aqinyov kai ginetai to triton eiv aqinyon kai polloi anyrwpwn apeyanon ek twn udatwn oti epikranyhsan
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.8.12" type=verse>kai o tetartov aggelov esalpisen kai eplhgh to triton tou hliou kai to triton thv selhnhv kai to triton twn asterwn ina skotisyh to triton autwn kai h hmera mh fainh to triton authv kai h nux omoiwv

<seg id="b.REV.9.2" type=verse>kai hnoixen to frear thv abussou kai anebh kapnov ek tou freatov wv kapnov kaminou megalhv kai eskotisyh o hliov kai o ahr ek tou kapnou tou freatov

<seg id="b.REV.9.3" type=verse>kai ek tou kapnou exhlyon akridev eiv thn ghn kai edoyh autaiv exousia wv ecousin exousian oi skorpioi thv ghv

</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.9.14" type=verse>legousan tw ektw aggelw ov eice thn salpigga luson touv tessarav aggelouv touv dedemenouv epi tw potamw tw megalw eufrath

<seg id="b.REV.9.15" type=verse>kai eluyhsan oi tessarev aggeloi oi htoimasmenoi eiv thn wran kai hmeran kai mhna kai eniauton ina apokteinwsin to triton twn anyrwpwn
</seg>

<seg id="b.REV.9.17" type=verse>kai outwv eidon touv ippouv en th orasei kai touv kayhmenouv ep autwn econtav ywrakav purinouv kai uakinyinouv kai yeiwdeiv kai ai kefalai twn ippwn wv kefalai leontwn kai ek twn stomatwn autwn ekporeuetai pur kai kapnov kai yeion

<seg id="b.REV.9.18" type=verse>upo twn triwn toutwn apektanyhsan to triton twn anyrwpwn ek tou purov kai ek tou kapnou kai ek tou yeiou tou ekporeuomenou ek twn stomatwn autwn

<seg id="b.REV.9.21" type=verse>kai ou metenohsan ek twn fonwn autwn oute ek twn farmakeiwn autwn oute ek thv porneiav autwn oute ek twn klemmatwn autwn

<seg id="b.REV.11.13" type=verse>kai en ekeinh th wra egeneto seismov megav kai to dekaton thv polewv epesen kai apektanyhsan en tw seismw onomata anyrwpwn ciliadev epta kai oi loipoi emfoboi egenonto kai edwkan doxan tw yew tou ouranou

<seg id="b.REV.12.13" type=verse>kai ote eiden o drakwn oti eblhyh eiv thn ghn ediwxen thn gunaika htiv eteken ton arrena

<seg id="b.REV.13.2" type=verse>kai to yhrion o eidon hn omoion pardalei kai oi podev autou wv arktou kai to stoma autou wv stoma leontov kai edwken autw o drakwn thn dunamin autou kai ton yronon autou kai exousian megalhn

<seg id="b.REV.13.7" type=verse>kai edoyh autw polemon poihsai meta twn agiwn kai nikhsai autouv kai edoyh autw exousia epi pasan fulhn kai glwssan kai eynov

<seg id="b.REV.13.8" type=verse>kai proskunhsousin autw pantev oi katoikountev epi thv ghv wn ou gegraptai ta onomata en th biblw thv zwhv tou arniou esfagmenou apo katabolhv kosmou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.13.9" type=verse>ei tiv ecei ouv akousatw
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.13.10" type=verse>ei tiv aicmalwsian sunagei eiv aicmalwsian upagei ei tiv en macaira apoktenei dei auton en macaira apoktanyhnai wde estin h upomonh kai h pistiv twn agiwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.13.11" type=verse>kai eidon allo yhrion anabainon ek thv ghv kai eicen kerata duo omoia arniw kai elalei wv drakwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.13.12" type=verse>kai thn exousian tou prwtou yhriou pasan poiei enwpion autou kai poiei thn ghn kai touv katoikountav en auth ina proskunhswsin to yhrion to prwton ou eyerapeuyh h plhgh tou yanatou autou

</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.13.15" type=verse>kai edoyh autw dounai pneuma th eikoni tou yhriou ina kai lalhsh h eikwn tou yhriou kai poihsh osoi an mh proskunhswsin thn eikona tou yhriou ina apoktanywsin
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.13.16" type=verse>kai poiei pantav touv mikrouv kai touv megalouv kai touv plousiouv kai touv ptwcouv kai touv eleuyerouv kai touv doulouv ina dwsh autoiv caragma epi thv ceirov autwn thv dexiav h epi twn metwpwn autwn

<seg id="b.REV.18.16" type=verse>kai legontev ouai ouai h poliv h megalh h peribeblhmenh bussinon kai porfuroun kai kokkinon kai kecruswmenh en crusw kai liyw timiw kai margaritaiv
</seg>

<seg id="b.REV.18.21" type=verse>kai hren eiv aggelov iscurov liyon wv mulon megan kai ebalen eiv thn yalassan legwn outwv ormhmati blhyhsetai babulwn h megalh poliv kai ou mh eureyh eti
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.18.22" type=verse>kai fwnh kiyarwdwn kai mousikwn kai aulhtwn kai salpistwn ou mh akousyh en soi eti kai pav tecnithv pashv tecnhv ou mh eureyh en soi eti kai fwnh mulou ou mh akousyh en soi eti
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.18.23" type=verse>kai fwv lucnou ou mh fanh en soi eti kai fwnh numfiou kai numfhv ou mh akousyh en soi eti oti oi emporoi sou hsan oi megistanev thv ghv oti en th farmakeia sou eplanhyhsan panta ta eynh
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.18.24" type=verse>kai en auth aima profhtwn kai agiwn eureyh kai pantwn twn esfagmenwn epi thv ghv
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.REV.19" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.REV.19.1" type=verse>kai meta tauta hkousa fwnhn oclou pollou megalhn en tw ouranw legontov allhlouia h swthria kai h doxa kai h timh kai h dunamiv kuriw tw yew hmwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.2" type=verse>oti alhyinai kai dikaiai ai kriseiv autou oti ekrinen thn pornhn thn megalhn htiv efyeiren thn ghn en th porneia authv kai exedikhsen to aima twn doulwn autou ek thv ceirov authv
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.3" type=verse>kai deuteron eirhkan allhlouia kai o kapnov authv anabainei eiv touv aiwnav twn aiwnwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.4" type=verse>kai epesan oi presbuteroi oi eikosi kai tessarev kai ta tessara zwa kai prosekunhsan tw yew tw kayhmenw epi tou yronou legontev amhn allhlouia
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.5" type=verse>kai fwnh ek tou yronou exhlyen legousa aineite ton yeon hmwn pantev oi douloi autou kai oi foboumenoi auton kai oi mikroi kai oi megaloi
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.6" type=verse>kai hkousa wv fwnhn oclou pollou kai wv fwnhn udatwn pollwn kai wv fwnhn brontwn iscurwn legontav allhlouia oti ebasileusen kuriov o yeov o pantokratwr
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.7" type=verse>cairwmen kai agalliwmeya kai dwmen thn doxan autw oti hlyen o gamov tou arniou kai h gunh autou htoimasen eauthn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.8" type=verse>kai edoyh auth ina peribalhtai bussinon kayaron kai lampron to gar bussinon ta dikaiwmata estin twn agiwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.9" type=verse>kai legei moi graqon makarioi oi eiv to deipnon tou gamou tou arniou keklhmenoi kai legei moi outoi oi logoi alhyinoi eisin tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.10" type=verse>kai epeson emprosyen twn podwn autou proskunhsai autw kai legei moi ora mh sundoulov sou eimi kai twn adelfwn sou twn econtwn thn marturian tou ihsou tw yew proskunhson h gar marturia tou ihsou estin to pneuma thv profhteiav
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.11" type=verse>kai eidon ton ouranon anewgmenon kai idou ippov leukov kai o kayhmenov ep auton kaloumenov pistov kai alhyinov kai en dikaiosunh krinei kai polemei
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.12" type=verse>oi de ofyalmoi autou wv flox purov kai epi thn kefalhn autou diadhmata polla ecwn onoma gegrammenon o oudeiv oiden ei mh autov
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.13" type=verse>kai peribeblhmenov imation bebammenon aimati kai kaleitai to onoma autou o logov tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.14" type=verse>kai ta strateumata en tw ouranw hkolouyei autw ef ippoiv leukoiv endedumenoi bussinon leukon kai kayaron
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.15" type=verse>kai ek tou stomatov autou ekporeuetai romfaia oxeia ina en auth patassh ta eynh kai autov poimanei autouv en rabdw sidhra kai autov patei thn lhnon tou oinou tou yumou kai thv orghv tou yeou tou pantokratorov
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.16" type=verse>kai ecei epi to imation kai epi ton mhron autou to onoma gegrammenon basileuv basilewn kai kuriov kuriwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.17" type=verse>kai eidon ena aggelon estwta en tw hliw kai ekraxen fwnh megalh legwn pasin toiv orneoiv toiv petwmenoiv en mesouranhmati deute kai sunagesye eiv to deipnon tou megalou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.18" type=verse>ina faghte sarkav basilewn kai sarkav ciliarcwn kai sarkav iscurwn kai sarkav ippwn kai twn kayhmenwn ep autwn kai sarkav pantwn eleuyerwn kai doulwn kai mikrwn kai megalwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.19" type=verse>kai eidon to yhrion kai touv basileiv thv ghv kai ta strateumata autwn sunhgmena poihsai polemon meta tou kayhmenou epi tou ippou kai meta tou strateumatov autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.20" type=verse>kai epiasyh to yhrion kai meta toutou o qeudoprofhthv o poihsav ta shmeia enwpion autou en oiv eplanhsen touv labontav to caragma tou yhriou kai touv proskunountav th eikoni autou zwntev eblhyhsan oi duo eiv thn limnhn tou purov thn kaiomenhn en tw yeiw
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.19.21" type=verse>kai oi loipoi apektanyhsan en th romfaia tou kayhmenou epi tou ippou th ekporeuomenh ek tou stomatov autou kai panta ta ornea ecortasyhsan ek twn sarkwn autwn
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.REV.20" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.REV.20.1" type=verse>kai eidon aggelon katabainonta ek tou ouranou econta thn kleida thv abussou kai alusin megalhn epi thn ceira autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.2" type=verse>kai ekrathsen ton drakonta ton ofin ton arcaion ov estin diabolov kai satanav kai edhsen auton cilia eth
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.3" type=verse>kai ebalen auton eiv thn abusson kai ekleisen auton kai esfragisen epanw autou ina mh planhsh ta eynh eti acri telesyh ta cilia eth kai meta tauta dei auton luyhnai mikron cronon
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.4" type=verse>kai eidon yronouv kai ekayisan ep autouv kai krima edoyh autoiv kai tav qucav twn pepelekismenwn dia thn marturian ihsou kai dia ton logon tou yeou kai oitinev ou prosekunhsan tw yhriw oute thn eikona autou kai ouk elabon to caragma epi to metwpon autwn kai epi thn ceira autwn kai ezhsan kai ebasileusan meta cristou ta cilia eth
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.5" type=verse>oi de loipoi twn nekrwn ouk anezhsan ewv telesyh ta cilia eth auth h anastasiv h prwth
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.6" type=verse>makariov kai agiov o ecwn merov en th anastasei th prwth epi toutwn o yanatov o deuterov ouk ecei exousian all esontai iereiv tou yeou kai tou cristou kai basileusousin met autou cilia eth
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.7" type=verse>kai otan telesyh ta cilia eth luyhsetai o satanav ek thv fulakhv autou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.8" type=verse>kai exeleusetai planhsai ta eynh ta en taiv tessarsin gwniaiv thv ghv ton gwg kai ton magwg sunagagein autouv eiv polemon wn o ariymov wv h ammov thv yalasshv
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.9" type=verse>kai anebhsan epi to platov thv ghv kai ekuklwsan thn parembolhn twn agiwn kai thn polin thn hgaphmenhn kai katebh pur apo tou yeou ek tou ouranou kai katefagen autouv
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.10" type=verse>kai o diabolov o planwn autouv eblhyh eiv thn limnhn tou purov kai yeiou opou to yhrion kai o qeudoprofhthv kai basanisyhsontai hmerav kai nuktov eiv touv aiwnav twn aiwnwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.11" type=verse>kai eidon yronon leukon megan kai ton kayhmenon ep autou ou apo proswpou efugen h gh kai o ouranov kai topov ouc eureyh autoiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.12" type=verse>kai eidon touv nekrouv mikrouv kai megalouv estwtav enwpion tou yeou kai biblia hnewcyhsan kai biblion allo hnewcyh o estin thv zwhv kai ekriyhsan oi nekroi ek twn gegrammenwn en toiv biblioiv kata ta erga autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.13" type=verse>kai edwken h yalassa touv en auth nekrouv kai o yanatov kai o adhv edwkan touv en autoiv nekrouv kai ekriyhsan ekastov kata ta erga autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.14" type=verse>kai o yanatov kai o adhv eblhyhsan eiv thn limnhn tou purov outov estin o deuterov yanatov
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.20.15" type=verse>kai ei tiv ouc eureyh en th biblw thv zwhv gegrammenov eblhyh eiv thn limnhn tou purov
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.REV.21" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.REV.21.1" type=verse>kai eidon ouranon kainon kai ghn kainhn o gar prwtov ouranov kai h prwth gh parhlyen kai h yalassa ouk estin eti
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.2" type=verse>kai egw iwannhv eidon thn polin thn agian ierousalhm kainhn katabainousan apo tou yeou ek tou ouranou htoimasmenhn wv numfhn kekosmhmenhn tw andri authv
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.3" type=verse>kai hkousa fwnhv megalhv ek tou ouranou legoushv idou h skhnh tou yeou meta twn anyrwpwn kai skhnwsei met autwn kai autoi laoi autou esontai kai autov o yeov estai met autwn yeov autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.4" type=verse>kai exaleiqei o yeov pan dakruon apo twn ofyalmwn autwn kai o yanatov ouk estai eti oute penyov oute kraugh oute ponov ouk estai eti oti ta prwta aphlyon
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.5" type=verse>kai eipen o kayhmenov epi tou yronou idou kaina panta poiw kai legei moi graqon oti outoi oi logoi alhyinoi kai pistoi eisin
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.6" type=verse>kai eipen moi gegonen egw eimi to a kai to w h arch kai to telov egw tw diqwnti dwsw ek thv phghv tou udatov thv zwhv dwrean
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.7" type=verse>o nikwn klhronomhsei panta kai esomai autw yeov kai autov estai moi o uiov
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.8" type=verse>deiloiv de kai apistoiv kai ebdelugmenoiv kai foneusin kai pornoiv kai farmakeusin kai eidwlolatraiv kai pasin toiv qeudesin to merov autwn en th limnh th kaiomenh puri kai yeiw o estin deuterov yanatov
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.9" type=verse>kai hlyen prov me eiv twn epta aggelwn twn econtwn tav epta fialav tav gemousav twn epta plhgwn twn escatwn kai elalhsen met emou legwn deuro deixw soi thn numfhn tou arniou thn gunaika
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.10" type=verse>kai aphnegken me en pneumati ep orov mega kai uqhlon kai edeixen moi thn polin thn megalhn thn agian ierousalhm katabainousan ek tou ouranou apo tou yeou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.11" type=verse>ecousan thn doxan tou yeou kai o fwsthr authv omoiov liyw timiwtatw wv liyw iaspidi krustallizonti
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.12" type=verse>ecousan te teicov mega kai uqhlon ecousan pulwnav dwdeka kai epi toiv pulwsin aggelouv dwdeka kai onomata epigegrammena a estin twn dwdeka fulwn twn uiwn israhl
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.13" type=verse>ap anatolhv pulwnev treiv apo borra pulwnev treiv apo notou pulwnev treiv apo dusmwn pulwnev treiv
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.14" type=verse>kai to teicov thv polewv econ yemeliouv dwdeka kai en autoiv onomata twn dwdeka apostolwn tou arniou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.15" type=verse>kai o lalwn met emou eicen kalamon crusoun ina metrhsh thn polin kai touv pulwnav authv kai to teicov authv
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.16" type=verse>kai h poliv tetragwnov keitai kai to mhkov authv tosouton estin oson kai to platov kai emetrhsen thn polin tw kalamw epi stadiwn dwdeka ciliadwn to mhkov kai to platov kai to uqov authv isa estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.17" type=verse>kai emetrhsen to teicov authv ekaton tessarakonta tessarwn phcwn metron anyrwpou o estin aggelou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.18" type=verse>kai hn h endomhsiv tou teicouv authv iaspiv kai h poliv crusion kayaron omoia ualw kayarw
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.19" type=verse>kai oi yemelioi tou teicouv thv polewv panti liyw timiw kekosmhmenoi o yemeliov o prwtov iaspiv o deuterov sapfeirov o tritov calkhdwn o tetartov smaragdov
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.20" type=verse>o pemptov sardonux o ektov sardiov o ebdomov crusoliyov o ogdoov bhrullov o enatov topazion o dekatov crusoprasov o endekatov uakinyov o dwdekatov ameyustov
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.21" type=verse>kai oi dwdeka pulwnev dwdeka margaritai ana eiv ekastov twn pulwnwn hn ex enov margaritou kai h plateia thv polewv crusion kayaron wv ualov diafanhv
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.22" type=verse>kai naon ouk eidon en auth o gar kuriov o yeov o pantokratwr naov authv estin kai to arnion
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.23" type=verse>kai h poliv ou creian ecei tou hliou oude thv selhnhv ina fainwsin en auth h gar doxa tou yeou efwtisen authn kai o lucnov authv to arnion
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.24" type=verse>kai ta eynh twn swzomenwn en tw fwti authv peripathsousin kai oi basileiv thv ghv ferousin thn doxan kai thn timhn autwn eiv authn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.25" type=verse>kai oi pulwnev authv ou mh kleisywsin hmerav nux gar ouk estai ekei
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.26" type=verse>kai oisousin thn doxan kai thn timhn twn eynwn eiv authn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.21.27" type=verse>kai ou mh eiselyh eiv authn pan koinoun kai poioun bdelugma kai qeudov ei mh oi gegrammenoi en tw bibliw thv zwhv tou arniou
</seg>
</div>
<div id="b.REV.22" type=chapter>
<seg id="b.REV.22.1" type=verse>kai edeixen moi kayaron potamon udatov zwhv lampron wv krustallon ekporeuomenon ek tou yronou tou yeou kai tou arniou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.2" type=verse>en mesw thv plateiav authv kai tou potamou enteuyen kai enteuyen xulon zwhv poioun karpouv dwdeka kata mhna ena ekaston apodidoun ton karpon autou kai ta fulla tou xulou eiv yerapeian twn eynwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.3" type=verse>kai pan katanayema ouk estai eti kai o yronov tou yeou kai tou arniou en auth estai kai oi douloi autou latreusousin autw
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.4" type=verse>kai oqontai to proswpon autou kai to onoma autou epi twn metwpwn autwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.5" type=verse>kai nux ouk estai ekei kai creian ouk ecousin lucnou kai fwtov hliou oti kuriov o yeov fwtizei autouv kai basileusousin eiv touv aiwnav twn aiwnwn
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.6" type=verse>kai eipen moi outoi oi logoi pistoi kai alhyinoi kai kuriov o yeov twn agiwn profhtwn apesteilen ton aggelon autou deixai toiv douloiv autou a dei genesyai en tacei
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.7" type=verse>idou ercomai tacu makariov o thrwn touv logouv thv profhteiav tou bibliou toutou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.8" type=verse>kai egw iwannhv o blepwn tauta kai akouwn kai ote hkousa kai ebleqa epesa proskunhsai emprosyen twn podwn tou aggelou tou deiknuontov moi tauta
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.9" type=verse>kai legei moi ora mh sundoulov sou gar eimi kai twn adelfwn sou twn profhtwn kai twn thrountwn touv logouv tou bibliou toutou tw yew proskunhson
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.10" type=verse>kai legei moi mh sfragishv touv logouv thv profhteiav tou bibliou toutou oti o kairov egguv estin
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.11" type=verse>o adikwn adikhsatw eti kai o rupwn rupwsatw eti kai o dikaiov dikaiwyhtw eti kai o agiov agiasyhtw eti
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.12" type=verse>kai idou ercomai tacu kai o misyov mou met emou apodounai ekastw wv to ergon autou estai
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.13" type=verse>egw eimi to a kai to w arch kai telov o prwtov kai o escatov
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.14" type=verse>makarioi oi poiountev tav entolav autou ina estai h exousia autwn epi to xulon thv zwhv kai toiv pulwsin eiselywsin eiv thn polin
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.15" type=verse>exw de oi kunev kai oi farmakoi kai oi pornoi kai oi foneiv kai oi eidwlolatrai kai pav o filwn kai poiwn qeudov
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.16" type=verse>egw ihsouv epemqa ton aggelon mou marturhsai umin tauta epi taiv ekklhsiaiv egw eimi h riza kai to genov tou dabid o asthr o lamprov kai oryrinov
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.17" type=verse>kai to pneuma kai h numfh legousin elye kai o akouwn eipatw elye kai o diqwn elyetw kai o yelwn lambanetw to udwr zwhv dwrean
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.18" type=verse>summarturoumai gar panti akouonti touv logouv thv profhteiav tou bibliou toutou ean tiv epitiyh prov tauta epiyhsei o yeov ep auton tav plhgav tav gegrammenav en bibliw toutw
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.19" type=verse>kai ean tiv afairh apo twn logwn biblou thv profhteiav tauthv afairhsei o yeov to merov autou apo biblou thv zwhv kai ek thv polewv thv agiav kai twn gegrammenwn en bibliw toutw
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.20" type=verse>legei o marturwn tauta nai ercomai tacu amhn nai ercou kurie ihsou
</seg>
<seg id="b.REV.22.21" type=verse>h cariv tou kuriou hmwn ihsou cristou meta pantwn umwn amhn
</seg>
</div>
